tika-s0203t:5_5: puññānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotenti vāti devā vuccanti rājāno.
tika-s0203t:5_6: Tathā hi te catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjayantā sayaṃ yathāvuttehi visesehi rājanti dibbanti sobhantīti ca,
tika-s0203t:5_15: Katakammapaccayāti katassa kammassa paccayabhāvato jātaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca.
tika-s0203t:5_16: Tena sabbāpi vedanā kammaphalabhūtā eva anubhavitabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:5_20: eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino”ti evaṃ ime nāmāti avisesetvā vuttamatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:6_6: Ye kammaṃ kataṃ akataṃ vāti na jānanti,
tika-s0203t:6_8: Ye ca kammaṃ pabhedato na jānanti,
tika-s0203t:6_11: ye ca pāpassa kammassa paṭipakkhameva na jānanti;
tika-s0203t:6_12: te kathaṃ tassa pahānaṃ kusalakammassa ca sampādanavidhiṃ jānissantīti imamatthaṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:7_2: “evaṃ sante”ti iminā tesaṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ ajānanabhāvo eva ujukaṃ pakāsito heṭṭhā desanāya tathā pavattattā.
tika-s0203t:7_5: tathāpi tattha uparidesanāya sambaddho evamattho vuccamāno yujjati,
tika-s0203t:9_2: Tena evaṃ jānituṃ tehi sakkā siyā,
tika-s0203t:9_13: “sallena viddhassa hi viddhakāle vedanāya pākaṭakālo viyā”ti imāya ekāya upamāya.
tika-s0203t:9_14: Tayo atthāti pubbe ahuvamhā vā no vā,
tika-s0203t:9_16: evarūpaṃ vā pāpakammaṃ akarimhāti ime tayo atthā.
tika-s0203t:9_20: So hi dukkhanijjīraṇabhāvasāmaññā eko atthoti vutto.
tika-s0203t:11_3: nigaṇṭhā pubbe pāpakammaṃ kata”nti evaṃ atītaṃsaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa vādaṃ saddahantānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:11_4: Bhūtattāti yathābhūtattā kiṃ aviparītameva atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāti pucchati.
tika-s0203t:12_5: Sāmaṃyeva opakkamikā etarahi attano upakkamahetu dukkhavedanaṃ vediyamānaṃ –
tika-s0203t:13_4: Payogenāti kāyikena payogena vā vācasikena vā payogena.
tika-s0203t:13_10: Sā pana vipākavedanābhāvato ekantato iṭṭhārammaṇā eva hotīti āha “iṭṭhārammaṇavipākadāyaka”nti.
tika-s0203t:13_14: Evaṃ santepīti kāmaṃ paripakkavedanīyanti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyameva vuccati,
tika-s0203t:13_15: tathāpi atthettha atisayo diṭṭhadhammavisesabhāvato paripakkavedanīyassāti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:14_3: “ussūre bhattaṃ āharīyitthā”ti domanassaṃ anuppādetvā yathā katapuññaṃ anumodati.
tika-s0203t:15_2: Rañño ācikkhitvāti taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ācikkhitvā.
tika-s0203t:15_3: Mallikāya vatthu dhammapadavatthumhi āgatena nayena kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:16_1: pageva tato puretaraṃ atītattabhāvesu ca kataṃ.
tika-s0203t:16_7: Sabbalahuṃ phaladāyikāti etena phaluppādanasamatthatāyogena kammassa paripakkavedanīyatāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:17_9: Avipākaṃ kammanti paccayavekallena vipaccituṃ asamatthaṃ ahosikammādibhedaṃ.
tika-s0203t:18_1: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnanti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnaṃ dasannaṃ kammānaṃ upakkamena kammānaṃ aññāthābhāvassa
tika-s0203t:18_5: Parehi vuttakāraṇehīti yehi kāraṇehi nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādesu dosaṃ dassenti.
tika-s0203t:18_7: Na hi lakkhaṇayuttena hetunā vinā paravādesu dosaṃ dassetuṃ sakkā.
tika-s0203t:18_9: Nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādā ca anuvādā cāti nigaṇṭhehi vuccamānā sakasakasamayappavedikā vādāceva sāvakehi vuccamānā tesaṃ anuvādā ca.
tika-s0203t:18_11: “ayamettha doso”ti tattha tattha viññūhi paṇḍitehi garahārahaṃ kāraṇaṃ upagacchanti,
tika-s0203t:18_14: “vuttanayena parehi vuttena kāraṇena sakāraṇā hutvā dosadassanavasena nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādā anuppattā,
tika-s0203t:18_15: tato eva taṃ vādaṃ appasādanīyabhāvadassanena sosentā hetusampattivohārasukkhanena milāpentā dukkaṭakammakārinotiādayo
tika-s0203t:19_4: Chaḷabhijātihetūti kaṇhābhijāti nīlābhijāti lohitābhijāti haliddābhijāti sukkābhijāti paramasukkābhijātīti imāsu abhijātīsu jātinimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:20_5: Yathā āpāyiko attabhāvo mahatā dukkhena abhibhuyyati,
tika-s0203t:20_9: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ dhutaṅgadharāti āha “ye panā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:20_10: Niyyānikasāsanasmiñhi vīriyanti vivaṭṭasannissitaṃ katvā pavattiyamānaṃ vīriyaṃ sarīraṃ khedantampi sammāvāyāmo nāma hoti ñāyāraddhabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:21_4: khure sīsaggato apanīte evāti adhippāyo. Ayanti,
tika-s0203t:21_6: Na sabbe eva sakkārapubbakaṃ pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇantīti āha “yo dāsikucchiya”ntiādi.
tika-s0203t:22_4: Idāni taṃ anajjhāpannataṃ tassa ca phalaṃ dassetuṃ “dhammikaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:22_6: So hi pañcakkhandhassa dukkhassa kāraṇabhūtattā āsanno paccakkho katvā vutto.
tika-s0203t:22_8: Saṅkhāranti yathāraddhāya sātisayaṃ karaṇato saṅkhāranti laddhanāmaṃ balavavīriyaṃ ussoḷhiṃ.
tika-s0203t:22_10: Maggena virāgo hotīti ariyamaggena dukkhanidānassa virajjanā hoti.
tika-s0203t:22_12: Iminā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā kathitā akasireneva sīghataraṃ maggapajānatāya bodhitattā.
tika-s0203t:22_14: Saṅkhāraṃ tattha padahatīti padhānasaṅkhāraṃ tattha dukkhanidānassa virajjananimittaṃ virajjanatthaṃ padahati. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0203t:22_15: Maggappadhānena catukiccappadhāne ariyamagge vāyāmena padahati vāyamati.
tika-s0203t:22_16: Ajjhupekkhatoti vīriyassa anaccāraddhanātisithilatāya vīriyasamatāyojane byāpārākaraṇena ajjhupekkhato.
tika-s0203t:22_18: Upekkhābhāvanā ca nāmettha tathāpavattā ariyamaggabhāvanā evāti āha –
tika-s0203t:23_0: Ettha ca evaṃ pāḷiyā padayojanā veditabbā, –
tika-s0203t:23_2: Saṅkhāraṃ me padahato saṅkhārapadahanā imassa dukkhanidānassa virāgo hoti,
tika-s0203t:23_3: ajjhupekkhato me upekkhanā imassa dukkhanidānassa virāgo hotī”ti.
tika-s0203t:23_5: Tattha saṅkhārappadhānāti sammasanapadena sukheneva khippataraṃ bhāvanāussukkāpanavīriyaṃ dassitanti sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā dassitā.
tika-s0203t:23_6: Ajjhupekkhatoti ettha kassaci nātidaḷhaṃ katvā pavattitavīriyenapi dukkhanidānassa virāgo hoti vipassanamanuyuñjatīti dassitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:23_7: Ubhayatthāpi catutthīyeva paṭipadā vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni,
tika-s0203t:23_9: upekkhaṃ tattha bhāvetī”ti vārehi tāsaṃyeva paṭipadānaṃ vasena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ paṭipatti dassitā.
tika-s0203t:23_10: Vaṭṭadukkhanidānassa parijiṇṇaṃ imehi vārehi dukkhakkhayo vibhāvito.
tika-s0203t:25_0: 12. Pesentassāti vāyamantassa. Taṃ sandhāyāti dukkhāya paṭipadāya niyyānataṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0203t:26_0: Usukāro viya yogī tejanassa viya cittassa ujukaraṇato.
tika-s0203t:26_7: Namanadaṇḍako viya lokuttaramaggo nibbānārammaṇe cittassa nāmanato.
tika-s0203t:26_9: Antadvayavajjitā majjhimā paṭipattīti katvā kilesagaṇavijjhanaṃ pahānābhisamayo.
tika-s0203t:26_10: Itarā pana paṭipadā dandhābhiññāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imāsu dvīsu yathāvuttāsu khippābhiññāsu kathitāsu,
tika-s0203t:26_14: “Āgamanīyapaṭipadā pana na kathitā”ti idaṃ savisesaṃ ajjhupekkhassa akathitataṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:29_6: tato ca nesaṃ micchāgahaṇato sithilakaraṇavivecanehi attano desanāya kiccakāritā avitathatā ca dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0203t:29_10: Yasmā tehi aparantaṃ purimatarasiddhehi taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi kappetvā āsevanabalavatāya ca vikappetvā aparabhāgasiddhehi
tika-s0203t:29_18: Diṭṭiyā vā upanissayabhūtāya sahajātāya abhinandanakāya ca taṇhāya sassatādiākārena abhinivisantassa micchāgāhassa ca vasena.
tika-s0203t:29_19: Anāgatadhammavisayāya adhippetattā anāgatakālavācako idha apara- saddo.
tika-s0203t:29_23: Kappetvāti ca tasmiṃ aparante taṇhāya nābhinivesānaṃ samattanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpanamāha.
tika-s0203t:30_0: Anugatāti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anu anu gatā aparante pavattā.
tika-s0203t:30_3: Visayabhāvato eva hi so tassā āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo cāti vuttaṃ “āgamma paṭiccā”ti.
tika-s0203t:30_5: dāsādīsu sirivaḍḍhakādisaddo viya vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā adhivacanaṃ paññatti.
tika-s0203t:30_16: Adhikañhi sabhāvadhammesu sassatādiṃ pakatiādiṃ drabyādiṃ jīvādiṃ kāyādiñca abhūtamatthaṃ ajjhāropetvā diṭṭhiyo pavattantīti.
tika-s0203t:31_1: Natthi etassa rogo bhaṅgoti arogoti arogasaddassa niccapariyāyatā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:31_2: Rogarahitatāsīsena vā nibbikāratāya niccataṃ paṭijānāti diṭṭhigatikoti āha “arogoti nicco”ti. Imināti,
tika-s0203t:31_3: “saññī attā arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti iminā vacanena.
tika-s0203t:31_9: imesaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasa saññīvādā kathitā.
tika-s0203t:31_10: Imesuyeva purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena aṭṭha saññīvādā aṭṭha ca nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:31_11: Satta ucchedavādāti manussattabhāve kāmāvacaradevattabhāve rūpāvacaradevattabhāve catubbidhāruppattabhāve
tika-s0203t:31_12: cavitvā sattassa ucchedapaññāpanavasena satta ucchedavādā kathitā.
tika-s0203t:31_13: Asato vināsāsambhavato atthibhāvanibandhano ucchedavādoti vuttaṃ “satoti vijjamānassā”ti.
tika-s0203t:31_15: tāva vijjati evāti gahaṇato nirudayavināso idha ucchedoti adhippetoti āha “upaccheda”nti.
tika-s0203t:31_22: Bhavavigamanti sabhāvāpagamanaṃ yo hi nirudayavināsavasena ucchijjati,
tika-s0203t:32_0: Pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti pañcakāmaguṇasukhamanubhogavasena catubbidharūpajjhānasukhaparibhogavasena ca diṭṭhadhamme nibbānappattipaññāpanavādā.
tika-s0203t:32_3: sopi supākaṭabhāvena indriyavisayo viya hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:32_7: Saññīti ādivasena tīhākārehi santanti saññī asaññī nevasaññīnāsaññīti imehi ākārehi vijjamānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:32_10: Santaatthavasena ekanti sassatassa attano vasena ekaṃ dassanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:32_14: “santaatthavasena eka”nti saṅgahavasena vuttassa saññīti ādivibhāgavasena vuttattā suviññeyyanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0203t:33_1: Rūpīṃ vāti ettha yadi rūpaṃ assa atthīti rūpīti ayamattho adhippeto.
tika-s0203t:33_2: Evaṃ sati rūpavinimuttena attanā bhavitabbaṃ saññāya viya rūpassapi attaniyattā.
tika-s0203t:33_3: Na hi saññī attāti ettha saññā attā.
tika-s0203t:33_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ “tattha pavattasaññañcassa saññāti gahetvāti vutta”nti.
tika-s0203t:33_11: sā ca natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ parittavipulatādivisesasabbhāvato.
tika-s0203t:33_12: Yadi evaṃ imassa vādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yujjatīti?
tika-s0203t:33_13: No na yujjati kāyabhedato uddhaṃ attano nibbikāratāya tena adhippetattā.
tika-s0203t:33_15: Atha vā “rūpaṃ assa atthīti rūpī”ti vuccamānepi na doso.
tika-s0203t:33_16: Kappanāsiddhenapi hi bhedena sāminiddesadassanato yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-s0203t:33_20: Evañca katvā rūpasabhāvattā attano “rūpaṃ attā”ti vacanaṃ ñāyāgatamevāti “kasiṇarūpaṃ attāti gaṇhātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:33_21: Arūpinti ettāpi vuttanayānusārena yathārahaṃ attho vattabbo.
tika-s0203t:33_22: Santasukhumaṃ muñcitvā tabbiparītassa gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthīti lābhī,
tika-s0203t:33_25: Anussutitakkikopi suddhatakkikopi vā niraṅkusattā takkanassa kasiṇarūpampi attāti kadācipi gaṇheyyāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:34_3: Ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhanti idaṃ saññāya attaniyataṃ hadaye katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:34_4: “Rūpiṃ vā”ti ettha vuttanayena pana atthe vuccamāne saññākkhandhaṃ bahiddhā akatvā “arūpadhamme”icceva vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-s0203t:34_9: Ayañhi diṭṭhigatiko rūpārūpasamāpattilābhitāya taṃnimittaṃ rūpabhāvena arūpabhāvena ca gahetvā upatiṭṭhati, tasmā,
tika-s0203t:34_10: “rūpī arūpī cā”ti abhinivesaṃ janeti ajjhattavādino viya takkamatteneva vā rūpārūpadhamme missakavasena gahetvā,
tika-s0203t:34_12: Takkagāhenevāti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattadhammā viya ca accantasukhumabhāvapattiyā sakiccasādhanāsamatthatāya
tika-s0203t:34_15: Lābhivasenapi vā antānantikacatutthavāde vakkhamānanayena aññamaññapaṭipakkhavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:34_16: Kevalaṃ pana tattha desakālabhedavasena tatiyacatutthavādā icchitā;
tika-s0203t:34_18: Kālabhedavasena cettha tatiyavādassa pavatti rūpārūpanimittānaṃ saha anupaṭṭhānato;
tika-s0203t:34_19: catutthavādassa pana vatthubhedavasena pavatti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samūhato,
tika-s0203t:35_0: Yadipi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino diṭṭhigatikassa vasena samāpattibhedena saññānānattasambhavato dutiyadiṭṭhipi samāpannakavasena labbhati;
tika-s0203t:35_4: Ekasamāpattilābhino eva vā vasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:35_5: Samāpatti bhedena saññābhedasambhavepi bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe saññānānattena oḷārikena nānattasaññīti,
tika-s0203t:35_11: aṇumatto vā attā”tiādidassanavasena paritto saññīti parittasaññī.
tika-s0203t:35_12: Kapilakaṇādādayo viya attano sabbagatabhāvapaṭijānanavasena appamāṇo saññīti appamāṇasaññīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:36_8: Tattha “saññaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni tīṇī”ti idaṃ saññāya catukkampi paripuṇṇameva gahetvā,
tika-s0203t:36_15: atthato pana satta saññā hontī”ti. Etthāti,
tika-s0203t:36_17: Samatikkamituṃ sakkonti tattha ādīnavadassanena taduddhaṃ ānisaṃsadassanena ca brūhitasaddhādi guṇattā,
tika-s0203t:36_20: teva gahitā tesaṃyeva vasena vakkhamānassa visesassa vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0203t:36_21: Sakkontānañca nesaṃ upātivattanaṃ attano ñāṇabalānurūpanti imamatthaṃ upamāya dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:36_24: appamāṇārammaṇatā cassa āgamanavasena veditabbā anantārammaṇato vā.
tika-s0203t:36_25: Na hi ārammaṇe anantanti paramānantassa pamāṇaṃ vā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0203t:36_26: Sukhadukkhehi aniñjanato rūpavirāgabhāvanāvisesatāya ca āneñjaṃ patvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0203t:36_28: Viññāṇakasiṇameketi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ eke diṭṭhigatikā attāti vadanti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:36_30: Tassa pana ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaviññāṇanti apare.
tika-s0203t:37_2: Diṭṭhigatanti yathā vuttaṃ “saññī attā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ diṭṭhiṃ.
tika-s0203t:37_11: Tattha avijjāpi hi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upanissayādibhāvato. Yathāha –
tika-s0203t:37_23: “tassevaṃ manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-s0203t:37_24: atthi me attāti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti.
tika-s0203t:37_27: Rūpavedanādivinimuttassa diṭṭhiyā ārammaṇassa abhāvato anādiyitvā idameva dasseti –
tika-s0203t:37_29: Iminā paccayenāti vā ettha paccayaggahaṇena ārammaṇampi gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:38_10: Ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya visuṃ vuccamānattā catutthāruppasaññāya ca imasmiṃ saññīvāde anotaraṇato,
tika-s0203t:38_16: Samāpannakavāro ca tathā idha kathitoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:38_18: Ekattasaññīpadaṃ ṭhapetvā atthato pana satta saññā honti aggahitaggahaṇenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:39_4: Paccayehi samāgantvā katanti saha kāraṇabhūtehi paccayehi teneva saha kāraṇabhāvena samāgantvā nibbattitaṃ;
tika-s0203t:39_10: taṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvato passantassa pākaṭabhūtavikāraṃ oḷārikaṃ siyā.
tika-s0203t:39_11: Na cettha maggaphaladhammā nidassetabbā tesaṃ tathā ananupassitabbato;
tika-s0203t:39_13: Tathā hi “asesavirāganirodhā”ti vacanato maggassapi nissaraṇabhāvena “atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodho”ti
tika-s0203t:39_17: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asaṅkhata”nti suttapadaṃ ānetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:39_19: tato eva itarābhisamayatthasiddhiyā taṃ saṅkhataṃ atikkanto.
tika-s0203t:40_1: Aṭṭhasu asaññīvādesūti idaṃ brahmajāle āgatanayena vuttameva hi sandhāya heṭṭhā,
tika-s0203t:40_3: Idha pana cattāro vādā eva uddhaṭā.
tika-s0203t:40_6: Saññāya sati tāya vedanāgāhasabbhāvato “ābādhanaṭṭhena saññā rogo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:40_7: Dukkhatāsūlayogato kilesāsucipaggharaṇato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkapabhijjanato ca saññā gaṇḍo;
tika-s0203t:40_10: Pīḷājananato antotudanato duruddharaṇato ca saññā sallaṃ;
tika-s0203t:40_11: svāyamattho attabhāvaṃ anupavisitvā avaṭṭhānenāti āha “anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena salla”nti.
tika-s0203t:40_12: Paṭisandhiggahaṇe viññāṇaṃ kutoci āgataṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “paṭisandhivasena āgati”nti.
tika-s0203t:40_14: Sā pana tāsu tāsu gatīsu vutti hotīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:40_19: itaraṃ khandhattayaṃ vā nissāya abhivuddhiṃ patiṭṭhaṃ mahantañca pāpuṇātīti.
tika-s0203t:40_23: indriyaparipākavasena vuḍḍhiṃ tassa tassa kammassa katūpacitabhāvena viruḷhiṃ;
tika-s0203t:41_0: Kāmañcātiādinā “aññatra rūpā”tiādikā codanā lakkhaṇavasena vuttāti dassetvā ayañca nayo codanāya avisiṭṭhavisayatāya siyā;
tika-s0203t:41_3: Ettake khandheti yathāvutte rūpavedanādike cattāro khandhe.
tika-s0203t:41_4: Aññatra rūpāti iminā yattha katthaci rūpena vinā viññāṇassa pavatti natthīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:41_5: Bhavavisesacodanāya sabhāvato eva viññāṇena vinā rūpassapi pavatti natthīti dīpitaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:41_9: Byañjanacchāyāya ce atthaṃ paṭibāhasīti yadi saddatthameva gahetvā adhippāyaṃ na gaṇhasi neyyatthaṃ suttanti.
tika-s0203t:41_11: saññaṃ attato samanupassatīti ettha vuttanayena saññaṃyeva attāti gahetvā tassa kiñcanabhāvena ṭhitāya
tika-s0203t:41_12: aññāya saññāya abhāvato asaññīti pavatto dutiyavādo;
tika-s0203t:41_13: tathā saññāya saha rūpadhamme sabbe eva vā rūpārūpadhamme attāti gahetvā pavatto tatiyavādo;
tika-s0203t:41_18: sabbattha vā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthāya sukhumāya saññāya atthibhāvapaṭijānanavasena paṭhamavādo;
tika-s0203t:41_19: asaññīvāde vuttanayena sukhumāya saññāya vasena sañjānanasabhāvatāpaṭijānanavasena ca dutiyavādādayo pavattāti.
tika-s0203t:42_2: tattha ñāṇassa sambhavo eva natthīti āha –
tika-s0203t:42_5: Yathā niyyantīti niyyāniyāti bahulaṃ vacanato kattusādhano niyyāniyasaddo,
tika-s0203t:42_9: Tena diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbamattenāti diṭṭhasutamutaviññāṇappamāṇenāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:42_15: asaññibhāve ca dosaṃ disvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ vaṇṇentāpi rūpajjhānapaṭilābhamattena tassa sampādanaṃ paṭilābhaṃ adhigamaṃ paññapenti,
tika-s0203t:42_20: Oḷārikasaṅkhārappavattiyā antamaso ākiñcaññāyatanasaṅkhārappavattiyāpi pattabbanti na akkhāyati tepi samatikkamitvā pattabbato.
tika-s0203t:42_22: Avasesāti ito paraṃ sukhumabhāvo nāma natthīti sukhumabhāvāpattiyā avasesā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:43_1: “Ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī”ti vakkhamānattā sabuddhiyaṃ viparivattamāne ekajjhaṃ gahetvā,
tika-s0203t:43_4: Uddhaṃ saranti uddhaṃ gataṃ sarantāti taṃ dassento āha “uddhaṃ vuccatī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:43_15: Abbhanti ākāsaṃ mā undriyi mā bhijjitvā pati.
tika-s0203t:43_17: Daḷhathambho viya khīlo viya ca sakkāyo dummocanīyato.
tika-s0203t:44_1: Bhagavā attano desanāvilāsena veneyyajjhāsayavasena (catucattārīsa aparantakappikavādā tattha tattha
tika-s0203t:44_2: antogadhāti) uddesavasena pañceva saṅgahetvā yathuddesaṃ nigamento,
tika-s0203t:44_4: Tattha dukkhassa nimittabhāvato diṭṭhigatānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena āyatanatthoti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:44_8: Sarūpato abhājitattā yathābhājitesu vādesu kattha antogadhanti pucchati.
tika-s0203t:45_7: “Kappetvā”ti ca tasmiṃ pubbante taṇhāyanābhinivisānaṃ samatthanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpanaṃ vadati.
tika-s0203t:45_10: Ekekasmiñca attāti āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti katvā,
tika-s0203t:45_11: lokoti lokiyanti ettha puññapāpāni tabbipākā cāti katvā,
tika-s0203t:45_12: taṃ taṃ gahaṇavisesaṃ upādāya paññāpanaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:45_13: “rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0203t:45_20: Ayañca attho “rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
tika-s0203t:45_21: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imissā pañcavidhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vasena vutto.
tika-s0203t:45_22: “Rūpavanta”ntiādikāya pana pañcadasavidhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vasena cattāro cattāro khandhe,
tika-s0203t:45_26: “attā”ti gahetvā tadaññe “loko”ti paññapentīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:45_27: Eseva nayoti iminā yathā “rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā sassato…pe…
tika-s0203t:45_29: evaṃ asassato anicco adhuvo ucchijjati vinassati na hoti paraṃ maraṇā;
tika-s0203t:45_30: nicco ca anicco ca nevanicco nāniccoti evamādimatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0203t:46_6: So evaṃ anussaranto attā ca loko cāti abhivadati.
tika-s0203t:46_7: Takkī pana takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ sassato attā ca loko cāti abhivadati.
tika-s0203t:46_11: Eteneva ca adhiccasamuppattikavādo viya sassatavādo kasmā duvidhena na vibhattoti ce?
tika-s0203t:47_1: “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vāde ayamayuttatāvibhāvanā –
tika-s0203t:47_4: tassa nibbikāratāya purimarūpāvijahanato kassaci visesādhānassa kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ahitato nivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0203t:47_5: hite ca paṭipattiatthaṃ upadeso eva nippayojano siyā sassatavādino.
tika-s0203t:47_6: Kathaṃ vā so upadeso pavattīyati vikārābhāvato;
tika-s0203t:47_7: evañca attano ajaṭākāsassa viya dānādikiriyā hiṃsādikiriyā ca na sambhavati;
tika-s0203t:47_8: tathā sukhassa dukkhassa ca anubhavananibandho eva sassatavādino na yujjati kammabaddhābhāvato,
tika-s0203t:47_10: Atha pana dhammamattaṃ tassa uppajjati ceva vinassati ca,
tika-s0203t:47_12: Evampi purimarūpāvijahanena avaṭṭhitassa attano dhammamattanti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ;
tika-s0203t:47_13: te vā panassa dhammā avatthābhūtā tato aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā,
tika-s0203t:47_15: na tāhi tassa uppannāhipi koci viseso atthi.
tika-s0203t:47_16: Yo hi karoti paṭisaṃvedeti cavati upapajjati cāti icchitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:47_20: uppādavināsavantīhi avatthāhi anaññassa attano tāsaṃ viya uppādavināsasambhavāpattito kuto niccatāvakāso.
tika-s0203t:47_21: Tāsampi vā attano viya niccatāti bandhanavimokkhānaṃ asambhavo evāti na yujjati eva sassatavādo;
tika-s0203t:47_22: na cettha koci vādī dhammānaṃ sassatabhāve parisuddhaṃ yuttiṃ vattuṃ samattho atthi;
tika-s0203t:47_23: yuttirahitañca vacanaṃ na paṇḍitānaṃ cittamārādhetīti viññūhi chaḍḍito evāyaṃ sassatavādoti.
tika-s0203t:48_0: Satta ucchedavādāti ettha te sarūpamattato heṭṭhā dassitā eva,
tika-s0203t:48_1: tattha dve janā ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti lābhī ca alābhī ca.
tika-s0203t:48_2: Tattha lābhī nāma dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī dibbena cakkhunā arahato cutiṃ disvā upapattiṃ apassanto.
tika-s0203t:48_3: Yo vā puthujjanānampi cutimattameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0203t:48_4: pubbayogābhāvena parikammākaraṇena vā upapātaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0203t:48_5: So “tattha tattheva attā ucchijjatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Alābhī –
tika-s0203t:48_8: yāva indriyagocaro”ti attano dhītuyā hatthaggaṇhanakarājā viya kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā,
tika-s0203t:48_11: jalabubbuḷakūpamā sattā”ti takkamattavasena vā ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0203t:48_15: Tattha yuttaṃ tāva purimesu tīsu vādesu “kāyassa bhedā”ti vuttaṃ;
tika-s0203t:48_16: pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ attabhāvaṃ ārabbha pavattattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:48_17: na yuttaṃ catuvokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ attabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattesu catutthādīsu catūsu vādesu,
tika-s0203t:48_21: rūpabhave pavattavohāreneva diṭṭhigatiko arūpabhavepi kāyavohāramāropetvā āha “kāyassa bhedā”ti.
tika-s0203t:48_24: Arūpakāyabhāvato vā phassādidhammasamūhabhūte arūpattabhāve kāyaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:49_1: “kāmāvacaradevattabhāvādiniravasesavibhavapatiṭṭhāpakānaṃ dutiyavādādīnaṃ yutto aparantakappikabhāvo anāgataddhavisayattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ;
tika-s0203t:49_7: purimapurimavādasaṅgahitasseva attano uttaruttarabhavopapattiyā samucchedanato yujjati aparantakappikatā,
tika-s0203t:49_9: ayaṃ attā ettāvatā sammā samucchinno hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:49_10: Evaṃ anāgatasseva manussattabhāvasamucchedassa adhippetattā paṭhamavādassapi aparantakappikatā yujjati.
tika-s0203t:49_11: Evaṃ sabbassapi pubbantato āgatassa ucchedapaññāpanavasena idha pubbantakappikesu desanā gatā.
tika-s0203t:49_12: Ete ucchedavādā heṭṭhā aparantakappikesu desanā gatā.
tika-s0203t:49_13: Ete ucchedavādā heṭṭhā aparantakappikesu tattha tattheva ucchijjati,
tika-s0203t:49_14: na tato uddhaṃ pavatti atthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0203t:50_2: Evaṃ anāgate anuppattidassanaparānaṃ ucchedavādānaṃ aparantakappikesu gahaṇaṃ;
tika-s0203t:50_3: pubbantato pana āgatassa attano idheva ucchedadassanaparānaṃ pubbantakappikesu gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:50_4: Ito paraṃ na gacchatīti pana idaṃ atthato āpannassa atthassa dassanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:50_5: Sattesu saṅkhāresu ca ekaccasassatanti pavatto ekaccasassatavādo.
tika-s0203t:50_8: manopadosikattabhāvato cavitvā idhāgatānaṃ takkino ca uppajjanavasena catubbidhoti āha “cattāro ekaccasassatavādā”ti.
tika-s0203t:50_9: “Saṅkhārekaccasassatikā”ti idaṃ tehi sassatabhāvena gayhamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:50_13: “cittanti vā manoti vā viññāṇanti vā ayaṃ attā nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti.
tika-s0203t:50_14: Na hi yassa bhāvassa paccayehi abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti;
tika-s0203t:50_15: tasseva niccadhuvādibhāvo anummattakena na sakkā paṭiññātuṃ. Etena,
tika-s0203t:50_18: siyā na vattabbā”tiādinā pavattassa sattabhaṅgavādassa ayuttatā vibhāvitā hoti.
tika-s0203t:51_2: teneva sabhāvena so dhammo natthī”tiādinā vucceyya,
tika-s0203t:51_6: na cettha desantarādisambaddhabhāvo yutto vattuṃ tassa sabbalokasiddhattā vivādābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:51_21: Tassa vohāramattassa atthitā natthitā niccatā vā na vattabbā.
tika-s0203t:51_22: Tassa paramatthasabhāvena anupalabbhanatoti anekantavādo na siyā.
tika-s0203t:51_23: Dhammā ca dhammito aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā.
tika-s0203t:51_25: na tesaṃ aniccatāya dhammī anicco aññattā.
tika-s0203t:51_28: kiñca dhammakappanāpi niratthikā siyā dhammino niccāniccatāya asijjhanato atha anaññe;
tika-s0203t:51_29: uppādavināsavantehi anaññassa dhammino tesaṃ viya uppādavināsasabbhāvato kuto niccatāvakāso,
tika-s0203t:51_30: tesampi vā dhammino viya niccatāpatti siyā.
tika-s0203t:51_31: Apica niccāniccanavattabbarūpo attā ca loko ca paramatthato vijjamānatāpaṭijānanato yathā niccādīnaṃ aññataraṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-s0203t:51_33: Na hi dīpādīnaṃ udayabbayasabhāvānaṃ niccāniccanavattabbasabhāvatā sakkā vattuṃ jīvassa niccādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-s0203t:51_34: rūpaṃ viyāti evaṃ sattabhaṅgassa viya sesabhaṅgānampi asambhavoyevāti sattabhaṅgavādassa ayuttatā veditabbāti.
tika-s0203t:52_2: aññe sattā aniccā”ti evaṃ pavattavādā sattekaccasassatavādā;
tika-s0203t:52_9: etasmiṃ vāde cakkhādīnaṃ asassatatāsanniṭṭhānaṃ yathāsabhāvāvabodho eva,
tika-s0203t:52_13: Asassatesuyeva pana kesañci dhammānaṃ sassatabhāvābhiniveso idha micchādassanaṃ;
tika-s0203t:52_14: tena pana ekavāre pavattamānena cakkhādīnaṃ asassatabhāvāvabodho vidūsito saṃsaṭṭhabhāvato;
tika-s0203t:52_15: visasaṃsaṭṭho viya sappimaṇḍo sakiccakāraṇāsamattatāya sammādassanapakkhe ṭhapetabbataṃ nārahati.
tika-s0203t:52_16: Atha vā asassatabhāvena nicchitāpi cakkhuādayo samāropitajīvasabhāvā eva diṭṭhigati kehi gayhantīti tadavabodhassa
tika-s0203t:52_21: Evañca katvā asaṅkhatāya saṅkhatāya ca dhātuyā vasena yathākkamaṃ ekacce dhammā sassatā;
tika-s0203t:52_22: ekacce asassatāti evaṃ pavatto vibhajjavādopi ekaccasassatavādo āpajjatīti evaṃpakārā codanā anokāsā hoti aviparītadhammasabhāvasampaṭipattibhāvato.
tika-s0203t:53_1: “Evantipi me no”tiādinā nayena pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhi ca vācā ca,
tika-s0203t:53_2: amarāya diṭṭhiyā vācāya vividho khepoti amarāvikkhepo.
tika-s0203t:53_5: sā ummujjananimmujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gāhaṃ na gacchati;
tika-s0203t:53_6: evamevaṃ ayampi vādo ito cito ca sandhāvati,
tika-s0203t:53_9: Svāyaṃ vādo musāvādaanuyogachandarāgamohahetukatāya catudhā pavattoti āha –
tika-s0203t:53_11: Nanu cettha catubbidhopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādike dhamme paralokattikādīni ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno,
tika-s0203t:53_12: tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchāya vikkhepanamattaṃ āpajjatīti tassa kathaṃ diṭṭhigatikabhāvo.
tika-s0203t:53_13: Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitamatthaṃ ajānantassa vikkhepakaraṇamattena diṭṭhigatikatā yuttāti?
tika-s0203t:53_14: Na hevaṃ pucchāvikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā icchitā,
tika-s0203t:53_16: Sassatavasena micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva hi mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme paralokattikādīni ca,
tika-s0203t:53_17: yāthāvato appaṭipajjamāno attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ viññāpetuṃ asamatthatāya musāvādādibhayena ca vikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti.
tika-s0203t:53_23: khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa uppannā visuṃyevekā esā diṭṭhi sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0203t:53_29: ‘evameva’nti pana saddantarena dhamme nijjhānanā anādikālikā loke”ti gāhavasena sassatalesopettha labbhatiyeva.
tika-s0203t:54_0: Amati gacchati ettha sabhāvo osānanti anto, mariyādo,
tika-s0203t:54_7: Ete eva cattāro vādino sandhāya brahmajāle –
tika-s0203t:54_8: “antānantikā antānantaṃ lokassa paññapenti catūhi vatthūhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:54_9: Tattha yuttaṃ tāva purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vādīnaṃ antattañca anantattañca antānantattañca ārabbha pavattavādattā antānantikattaṃ.
tika-s0203t:54_12: Yasmā paṭisedhavādopi antānantavisayo eva taṃ ārabbha pavattattā.
tika-s0203t:54_14: “yathā tatiyavāde sambhedavasena etasseva antavantatā anantatā ca sambhavati,
tika-s0203t:54_15: evaṃ takkīvādepi kālabhedavasena ubhayasambhavato aññamaññapaṭisedhena ubhayaññeva vuccati. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0203t:54_19: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yasmā ayaṃ lokasaññito attā jhāyīhi adhigatavisesehi ananto kadāci sakkhi diṭṭho anusuyyati;
tika-s0203t:54_21: Yasmā pana tehi eva kadāci antavā sakkhi diṭṭho anusuyyati,
tika-s0203t:54_25: Ayañhi takkiko avaḍḍhitabhāvapubbakattā paṭibhāganimittānaṃ vaḍḍhitabhāvassa vaḍḍhitakālavasena apaccakkhakāritāya anussavādimatte ṭhatvā –
tika-s0203t:54_28: Na pana antavantatānantatānaṃ accantamabhāvena yathā taṃ “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti,
tika-s0203t:54_31: Na hi antavantatānantatātadubhayavinimutto attano pakāro atthi,
tika-s0203t:54_33: kālabhedavasena ca tadubhayampi ekasmiṃ na na yujjatīti.
tika-s0203t:55_1: Taṃ panassa sukhaṃ dukkhena avomissaṃ hotīti āha “nirantarasukhī”ti.
tika-s0203t:55_3: Atītāsu sattasu jātīsūti idaṃ tato paraṃ jātissarañāṇena anussarituṃ na sakkāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:55_5: “Evaṃ sukhasamaṅgī”ti taṃ anussarantassa jātissarassa atītajātiyampi idha viya dukkhaphuṭṭhassa taṃ anussarantassa.
tika-s0203t:56_2: Kāmāvacaraṃ nāma adukkhamasukhaṃ anuḷāraṃ avibhūtanti āha “catutthajjhānavasenā”ti.
tika-s0203t:56_10: Adhiccasamuppannavādo sassatavādasamuddiṭṭhoti katvā “dve adhiccasamuppannikā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:57_4: Suvaṇṇassa viya dosāpagamena upakkilesavigamena ñāṇassa visuddhanti āha “parisuddhanti nirupakkilesa”nti.
tika-s0203t:57_7: Mayamidaṃ jānāmāti “sassato attā ca loko ca idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti ca micchāgāhavasena aññāṇabhāgameva
tika-s0203t:57_8: paribrūhetvā tato eva yathāgahitaṃ gāhaṃ sandhāya –
tika-s0203t:57_9: “mayamidaṃ atthaṃ tattha jānāmā”ti evaṃ tattha micchāgāhe avijjamānaṃ ñāṇakoṭṭhāsaṃ otārentiyeva anuppavesentiyeva.
tika-s0203t:57_13: Sassato attā ca loko cātiādinā micchābhinivesabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:57_18: Ñāṇampi hi diṭṭhiyā upanissayo hotiyeva lābhino itarassa ca tathā tathā micchābhinivesato.
tika-s0203t:57_20: Asādhāraṇato na upātivattanti etenāti anupātivattanaṃ, tato.
tika-s0203t:57_23: Yadi brahmajāle āgatā sabbāpi diṭṭhiyo idha kathitā honti,
tika-s0203t:57_24: evaṃ sante idaṃ suttaṃ brahmajālasuttena ekasadisanti āha –
tika-s0203t:57_26: “Aññatra rūpaṃ aññatra vedanā sakkāyaṃyeva anuparidhāvantī”ti vacanato idha sakkāyadiṭṭhi āgatā.
tika-s0203t:57_27: Brahmajālaṃ kathitameva hoti tattha āgatānaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyāpi diṭṭhīnaṃ idhāgatattā.
tika-s0203t:58_7: Catutthajjhānanirodhā tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti ettha na parihīnacatutthajjhānassa tatiyajjhānaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0203t:58_8: tatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhitassa pana catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhitassa ca tatiyaṃ paṭilomanayena sambhavati.
tika-s0203t:58_11: “nirāmisasukhassanirodhā”ti ettha viya vuṭṭhānanirodhavasena vuttanti veditabbanti attho.
tika-s0203t:58_14: Kammanīyabhāvoti samāpattiṃ patto viya samāpattisamāpajjanabhāve kammakkhamabhāvo.
tika-s0203t:58_16: “Uppajjati pavivekā pītī”ti puna vuttā pīti jhānadvayapīti.
tika-s0203t:58_17: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ chāyā jahatīti yaṃ padesaṃ ātapena abhibhuyyamānaṃ chāyā jahati.
tika-s0203t:58_18: Tattha ātape chāyāti padesena ātapasaññitānaṃ bhūtasaṅkhatānaṃ pahānaṭṭhānamāha.
tika-s0203t:60_0: 32. Adukkhamasukhanti catutthajjhānavedanaṃ, na yaṃ kiñci upekkhāvedanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:61_7: Sabbattha nikantiyā asukkhāpitattā kathaṃ nibbānassa upakārapaṭipadā nāma jātaṃ?
tika-s0203t:61_12: tattha diṭṭhimānaggāhā sukkhā viya honti tadekaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:61_13: Tādisassa nibbānagāminī paṭipadā eva āsanne, na dūre.
tika-s0203t:61_16: Tādisassa ca santohamasmītiādikā samanupassanā adhimānapakkhe tiṭṭhatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:61_20: Diṭṭhupādāne sati sesaupādānasambhavo avuttasiddhoti tadeva uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0203t:62_0: Se āyatane veditabbeti nirodhassa kāraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:64_4: Sabbato pabhanti kilesandhakārābhāvato ca samantato pabhassaraṃ.
tika-s0203t:64_7: Cattārīsakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātehi titthehi otaritvā anupavisitabbaṃ amatasaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:64_8: Anupādā kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā vimuccanti etthāti anupādāvimokkho, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:67_6: tasmā bhavābhavahetūti khuddakassa mahantassa vā bhavassa hetu,
tika-s0203t:68_1: Lokuttarabodhipakkhiyadhamme uddissa puthujjanānaṃ vivādo sambhavatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:68_3: Lokiyāpi hi bodhipakkhiyadhammā lokuttaradhammādhigamassa āsannakāraṇattā visesakāraṇanti yāva aññehi lokiyadhammehi abhivisiṭṭhoti katvā,
tika-s0203t:68_5: Atthato nānaṃ hotīti atthato bhedo hoti bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ samadhigatattā.
tika-s0203t:68_17: Atthañca byañjanañca viññāpanakāraṇamevāti aviparītatthassa saddassa ca bujjhanahetutāya.
tika-s0203t:69_2: atthato sameti nāma yāthāvato atthassa gahitattā.
tika-s0203t:69_3: Asabhāvaniruttibhāvato byañjanato nānattanti taṃ liṅgabhedena vacanabhedena ca dassento,
tika-s0203t:69_4: “satipaṭṭhānoti vā satipaṭṭhānāti vā micchā ropethā”ti āha.
tika-s0203t:69_6: na garutaraṃ adhanitaṃ katvā vattabbampi dhanitaṃ ghosavantaṃ katvā ropite vuttadosābhāvatoti tenāha –
tika-s0203t:70_0: Byañjanassa micchāropanaṃ na visesantarāyakaraṃ hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0203t:71_2: Yāvatā nesaṃ vacanaṃ atthato ceva sameti byañjanato cāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:71_3: Saññāya vivādoti kiñcāpi sameti atthato ceva byañjanato ca,
tika-s0203t:71_5: tāya saññāya vasena vivādo jātoti dassento “aha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:71_7: ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānoti vadatīti evaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ hotīti imamatthaṃ,
tika-s0203t:72_1: Na codanatthāya vegāyitabbanti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ na codanā kātabbāti attho.
tika-s0203t:72_2: Tasmāti yasmā ekacco kodhanabhāvena evaṃ paṭipphari, tasmā.
tika-s0203t:73_1: Vaṇaghaṭṭitassa viyāti vaṇe ghaṭṭitassa viya dukkhuppatti cittadukkhuppatti.
tika-s0203t:73_2: Dve vāre vatvāpi visajjetīti suppaṭinissaggī evaṃ pageva coditamatte vissajjeti ceti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:73_4: Evarūpoti sahasā avissajjentena codakassa vihesāvādo hutvāpi akkodhanādisabhāvo.
tika-s0203t:74_0: Upekkhāti sakena kammena paññāyissatīti tasmiṃ puggale ajjhupekkhaṇā.
tika-s0203t:74_1: Upekkhaṃ atimaññati nāma tassa anācārassa anajjhupekkhaṇato.
tika-s0203t:75_3: Sā pana cittassa anārādhaniyabhāvo satthucittassa anārādhakabhāvo.
tika-s0203t:75_4: Kalahoti adhikaraṇuppādavasena pavatto viggaho bhaṇḍanassa pubbabhāgo.
tika-s0203t:76_4: Dhammoti sambuddhassa tassa tathā pavattaṃ byākaraṇaṃ yathā vivādāpannā saññattiṃ gacchanti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:76_6: Tadeva byākaraṇaṃ anudhammoti bhikkhunā vuccamāno anupavatto dhammo. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:76_12: tassa paṭipatti na kenaci garahaṇīyā hotīti attho.
tika-s0203t:79_8: Sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ pubbāparasambandhaṃ atthayuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:80_9: Samussitaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāhetubhāvato thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāti āha –
tika-s0203t:80_13: So nigaṇṭhassa samaye kehici abhinnasammatopi bhinno vinaṭṭhoyeva sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti bhinnathūpo.
tika-s0203t:80_14: So eva niyyānabhāvo vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:80_16: tasmiṃ bhinnathūpe appaṭisaraṇeti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:81_2: “Vivādo na uppajjī”ti vatvā tassa anuppattikāraṇaṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:81_4: avivādakāraṇaṃ katvāva parinibbāyī”ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ “bhagavatā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:81_6: “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsana”nti vinicchayane mahāpadesā,
tika-s0203t:81_8: yasmā tesu patiṭṭhāya te avassāya dhammavinayadharā ca nicchayaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0203t:81_9: Tathā hi suttantamahāpadesato vinaye kenaci pucchito attho catunnaṃ pañhabyākaraṇānaṃ vasena suvinicchitarūpo,
tika-s0203t:81_10: tasmā dhammavinayo idha satthu kiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:82_7: tesaṃ tāva so ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattatu,
tika-s0203t:83_1: Abhiññā desitāti abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitvā bodhitā.
tika-s0203t:83_2: Patissayamānarūpāti apadissa patissayamānā garukavasena nissayamānasabhāvā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:83_10: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyā”ti vibhaṅgapāṭhavaseneva hi tāni bhagavatā paññattāni.
tika-s0203t:83_11: Tāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbasikkhāpadāni adhipātimokkhaṃ nāmāti,
tika-s0203t:83_12: idaṃ gobalībaddañāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ tesampi adhipātimokkhabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:84_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti tasmiṃ suppajahanāya appamattakabhāve ayaṃ vakkhamāno.
tika-s0203t:84_2: Yo kocīti bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā.
tika-s0203t:85_3: Tattha pana so maggasaññibhāvena maggo ca catubbidhoti sutattā,
tika-s0203t:85_5: Evanti evaṃ asandiddhaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ pariccattaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0203t:86_0: Cetiyaṃ na diṭṭhanti tassa kataṃ thūpaṃ vadati.
tika-s0203t:86_1: Nindiye puthujjanabhāve ṭhitaṃ pāsaṃsaṃ ariyabhāvaṃ āropetvā taṃ micchāladdhiṃ abhinivissa paggayha voharaṇato saggopi maggopi vāritoyevāti.
tika-s0203t:87_0: “Yo nindiyaṃ pasaṃsati, taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyo;
tika-s0203t:88_0: Vicināti mukhena so kaliṃ, kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindatī”ti. ;
tika-s0203t:89_0: “Khaṇeneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samatthakammaṭṭhānakathaṃ ācikkhissāmī”ti hi iminā tattha kohaññampi dissati;
tika-s0203t:89_5: ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”ti vacanaṃ duggahitaṃ gaṇhāpetvā,
tika-s0203t:89_6: “ettāvatā vo amataṃ paribhuttaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti āha.
tika-s0203t:90_3: Tena imināva kāraṇena ca yo vivādo uppajjeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:90_4: Garusmiṃ garūti pavattaṃ cittaṃ garuvisayattā taṃsahacaritattā garu,
tika-s0203t:90_9: Garussa gāravavasena patissayanaṃ patissoti vuccati nīcavuttitā,
tika-s0203t:90_12: Ettha yathāyaṃ puggalo satthari agāravo nāma hoti,
tika-s0203t:90_15: Tattha tīsukālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yātītiādi samudāyakittanaanavasesadassanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:90_16: avayavato pana agāravasiddhi yathā taṃ sāmaññato sikkhāpadasamādānaṃ tabbiseso bhedo.
tika-s0203t:91_0: Sakkaccaṃ na gacchatīti ādaravasena na gacchati.
tika-s0203t:91_2: yathā saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ ekena bhikkhunā paṭiggahitaṃ saṅghassa dinnameva hoti.
tika-s0203t:91_6: Attano parisāya uppannaṃ vivādamūlaṃ visesato attanā vūpasametabbato attano ca anatthāvahato “ajjhatta”ntveva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:92_7: Samathā vā samanavasena adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇāni,
tika-s0203t:93_0: Vivādo uppannamattova hutvā parato kakkhaḷatthāya saṃvattanato yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya paṭhamaṃ uppanno vivādānusārena
tika-s0203t:93_1: mūlakaṃ viya anubandharogo tameva tadaññaṃ vā vatthuṃ katvā pavaḍḍhanto vivādādhikaraṇaṃ patvā upari
tika-s0203t:93_3: anuvādāpattikiccādhikaraṇaṃ patvā vivādassa ca vaḍḍhanaṃ pākaṭameva.
tika-s0203t:93_5: “cattāri adhikaraṇāni patvā upari vaḍḍhanto so vivādo”ti.
tika-s0203t:94_0: Aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhīti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā “yadi me byādhī dāheyyuṃ.
tika-s0203t:95_1: Sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yebhuyyasikakammassa karaṇaṃ yebhuyyasikā.
tika-s0203t:95_8: tassa tassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamāya bhagavatā vuttavidhi,
tika-s0203t:96_2: Guḷhakādīsu alajjussannāya parisāya guḷhako salākaggāho kātabbo;
tika-s0203t:97_0: Evaṃ vinicchitanti āpattiṃ dassetvā ropanavasena vinicchitaṃ,
tika-s0203t:99_0: Yathānurūpanti “dvīhi catūhi tihi ekenā”ti evaṃ vuttanayena yathānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0203t:100_6: evamādinā iminā pakārenāti vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:100_8: bhagavato desitākāraṃ hāpetvā vaḍḍhetvā vā kathanaṃ yathādhammaṃ akatanti katvā adhammabhāvoti dassento āha –
tika-s0203t:101_5: Ayaṃ vinayo nāma rāgādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato pahānato paṭisaṅkhānato ca.
tika-s0203t:101_9: Vatthusampattiādinā eva sabbesaṃ vinayakammānaṃ akuppatāti āha –
tika-s0203t:102_0: Sammāpaṭipattiyā nayanaṭṭhena yathāvutto dhammo eva netti,
tika-s0203t:102_1: tato eva sattassa viya rajju asithilapavattihetutāya dhammarajjūti attho vutto.
tika-s0203t:102_2: Suttantapariyāyena tāva dasa kusalakammapathā dhammoti evaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0203t:102_5: “chattiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā”tiādinā dhammena ca vinayena ca vutto,
tika-s0203t:102_6: so eva vā dhammanetti hotūti ānetvā yojanā.
tika-s0203t:102_7: Tāya dhammanettiyā sameti tāya yathāvuttāya dhammanettiyā saṃsandati,
tika-s0203t:102_12: avinayo ce “avinayo”ti nicchinantena ekaccānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇameva dassitaṃ tassa vūpasamadhammānaṃ apariyosāpitattā.
tika-s0203t:105_2: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ tattheva visesato paṭiññāya kāretabbatāya icchitabbattā.
tika-s0203t:106_1: Kammassa vatthu dassitaṃ na samathoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:106_3: samathassa pana kāraṇe dassite samatho dassitova hotīti dassetuṃ “evarūpassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:108_4: Pāpakammassa appatā mahantatā sāvajjabhāvassa mudutikkhabhāvena veditabbāti āha “aṇunti appasāvajjaṃ.
tika-s0203t:111_4: taṃsahagatā sammāsaṅkappādayo ca “aññā”ti vuttāti āha “aññāti arahatta”nti.
tika-s0203t:111_7: “Lokuttaro dhammo adhigato mayā”ti maññanāmattaṃ adhimānoti dassento,
tika-s0203t:112_1: Idaṃ ṭhānanti idaṃ obhāsādisammutihetubhūtaṃ uḷārataraṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:112_2: Uḷāratarabhāvena hi taṃ maggaphalapaññāya paccayo hutvā yāthāvato dubbiññeyyatāya vipassakaṃ visaṃvādeti.
tika-s0203t:112_4: Imaṃ pañhanti imaṃ suttaṃ gambhīraṃ lokuttarapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ attanā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ atthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:112_9: Evamassāti evaṃ vuttanayena tesaṃ karaṇahetu assa cittassa dhammadesanāvasena pavattassa.
tika-s0203t:113_2: lokepariyāpannaṃ āmisanti idha pañca kāmaguṇā adhippetāti tesu vaṭṭāmisabhāvepi labhite kāmāmisabhāvo siddhoti āha –
tika-s0203t:113_8: Āneñjasamāpattipaṭisaṃyuttāyāti kilesiñjanarahitatāya idha āneñjāti adhippetāhi heṭṭhimāhi arūpasamāpattīhi paṭisaṃyuttāya.
tika-s0203t:113_9: Evarūpoti lokāmisabhūtesu paccayesu adhimutto tanninno taggaruko tappabbhāro.
tika-s0203t:113_10: Ettāvatāti evaṃ saddhānaṃ manussānaṃ dassanena tesaṃ pavattitāsayena ca.
tika-s0203t:113_11: Sīsaṃ nikkhantaṃ hotīti lābhāsāya sīsaṃ bahi nikkhantaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0203t:113_12: Udaraṃ phalitanti atibahubhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiyamānaṃ pasibbakaṃ viya laddhabbassa atipahūtabhāvena udaraṃ phītaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:114_1: Yathā purimā dve arūpasamāpattiyo attano paccanīkakilesehi aniñjanato “aniñjā”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0203t:115_4: Taṃ bhinnanti āneñjasaṃyojanaṃ bhinnaṃ vidhamitaṃ samatikkantaṃ tāsu samāpattīsu apekkhābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:118_4: “sammā nibbānādhimutto purisapuggalo”ti arahattakittanena niṭṭhāpitāti tato paraṃ,
tika-s0203t:118_11: Tassa paṭikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “samāpattilābhino hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:118_12: Yathā sukkhavipassako adhimāniko samāpattilābhino samānayogakkhamo appatte pattasaññitāya bhedābhāvato,
tika-s0203t:118_13: evaṃ sukkhavipassako khīṇāsavo samānayogakkhamo khīṇāsavabhāvena visesābhāvato,
tika-s0203t:118_14: tasmā “samāpattilābhimhi kathite itaropi kathitova hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:118_15: Dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnanti samāpattilābhino adhimānikassa khīṇāsavassa ca.
tika-s0203t:119_1: Yadipi khīṇāsavassa asappāyārammaṇaṃ kilesānaṃ uppattiyā paccayo na hoti tesaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattā.
tika-s0203t:119_8: evaṃ pariññātampi vattu atthavisesābhāvena ekarūpamevāti taṃ pariharitabbamevā”ti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:119_11: Yuttapayuttenevāti sabhāgārammaṇassa ālokanādīsu yutteneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0203t:120_3: visasaṅkhātassa dukkhassa mūlabhāvato ca “avijjāsaṅkhāto visadoso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:120_6: Rāgo hi uppajjamānova kusalacittappavattiyā okāsaṃ adento taṃ vibādhati;
tika-s0203t:120_7: tathābhūto saddhāsinehassa samathavipassanābhivuḍḍhiyā vamanena ca taṃ visoseti milāpeti.
tika-s0203t:121_0: Saupādānasalluddhāro viya appahīno avijjāvisadoso daṭṭhabbo mahānatthuppādanato.
tika-s0203t:121_3: Maraṇaṃ viya sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattanaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātassa āyuno apetattā.
tika-s0203t:121_4: Maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ viya āpattiyā āpajjanaṃ yathāvuttassa āyuno upapīḷanakabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:121_5: Imināva nayena opammasaṃsandananti ettha anupādisesasalluddhāro viya pahīno avijjāvisadoso;
tika-s0203t:121_8: tadubhayena vaṇe puthuttaṃ na gate maraṇābhāvo viya sikkhāya apaccakkhānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:121_9: maraṇamattadukkhābhāvo viya aññatarāya saṃkiliṭṭhāya āpattiyā anāpajjananti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:122_1: Satiyāti ettha yasmā “ariyāyā”ti na visesitanti āha –
tika-s0203t:123_0: Khīṇāsavassa balanti uḷāratamesu dibbasadisesupi ārammaṇesu manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ anupanamanahetubhūtaṃ
tika-s0203t:123_5: Evaṃ jānitvāti “upadhi dukkhassa mūla”nti evaṃ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya jānitvā.
tika-s0203t:123_9: Tato eva upādīyati dukkhaṃ etehīti kilesā “upādānā”tipi vuccantīti āha –
tika-s0203t:123_14: Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇaṃ katvā tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimutto.
tika-s0203t:123_15: Kāmupadhismiṃ kāyaṃ upasaṃharissatīti “kāmesevissāmī”ti tattha kāyaṃ upanāmessati;
tika-s0203t:123_17: tathā cittaṃ vā uppādessatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti.
tika-s0203t:126_1: Khaṇapabhaṅgutāya na niccā na dhuvāti aniccā.
tika-s0203t:126_2: Tato eva paṇḍitehi na iccā na upagantabbātipi aniccā.
tika-s0203t:126_3: So cāyaṃ aniccattho udayavayaparicchinnatāya veditabboti dassento,
tika-s0203t:126_6: Ayañca aniccatā vakkhamānā ca tucchāditā dvinnampi kāmānaṃ sādhāraṇoti āha –
tika-s0203t:126_9: tesaṃ niccasārādīnaṃ attani abhāvato tehi visuṃbhūtā.
tika-s0203t:126_10: Yathā pana sabbaso sabhāvarahitamākāsaṃ “tucchaṃ ritta”nti vuccati,
tika-s0203t:126_12: Ete pana kevalaṃ niccasārādivirahato eva tucchā rittāti dassento “na panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:126_13: “Na hi tucchamuṭṭhi nāma natthī”ti idaṃ lokasamaññāvasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:127_0: Musāti ittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya na dissatīti āha “musāti nāsanakā”ti.
tika-s0203t:127_2: Ete hi asubhādisabhāvāpi bālānaṃ subhādibhāvena upaṭṭhahantā subhādiggahaṇassa paccakkhabhāvena satte visaṃvādenti.
tika-s0203t:127_3: Nassanasabhāvāti khaṇabhaṅgattā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya dissamānā viyapi hutvā apaññāyanakapakatikā.
tika-s0203t:127_9: Māyākatanti māyāya kataṃ udakādimaṇiādiākārena māyādinā upaṭṭhāpitaṃ;
tika-s0203t:127_10: māyākataṃ viya māyākataṃ aññasabhāvā hutvā atathā upaṭṭhahanato.
tika-s0203t:128_0: Evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvena kāmānaṃ māyākatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni tato aññenapi pakārena dassetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:128_2: Bālānaṃ lāpanatoti apariññātavatthukānaṃ andhabālānaṃ puggalānaṃ vipallāsahetuto.
tika-s0203t:128_3: Manussaloke ṭhatvā manussānaṃ vā vasena bhagavatā bhāsitattā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:128_5: Tato eva ca “samparāyikāti te ṭhapetvā avasesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:128_6: Tattha diṭṭhadhammā paccakkhasabhāvā ārammaṇabhūtā etāsaṃ atthīti diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-s0203t:128_8: Te samecca dhīyati ettha āṇāti dheyyaṃ,
tika-s0203t:128_14: Tattha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gahaṇaṃ nāma “idaṃ mayha”nti avibhāgena pariggahakaraṇaṃ;
tika-s0203t:128_15: ārammaṇavasena pana gahaṇaṃ bhāgaso ārammaṇānubhavananti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:128_20: tadaggena devaputtamāropi te attano vasaṃ vatteti.
tika-s0203t:129_0: Appahīnavipallāsā hi puggalā kāmādhimuttā mārassa issariyavattanaṭṭhānatāya “māradheyya”nti vuttā,
tika-s0203t:129_1: tathā mārassa nivāpagocarapariyāyehipi te evaṃ vuttāti dassento,
tika-s0203t:130_2: Evañhi lohitasannissayo pubbo viya anurodhūpanissayo virodhoti dassento,
tika-s0203t:130_9: Cittena adhiṭṭhahitvāti jhānārammaṇaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ bhāvanācittena uppādetvā.
tika-s0203t:130_10: Parittaṃ nāma vikkhambhanaasamatthattā kilesehi parito khaṇḍitaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0203t:130_12: Pamāṇantipi kāmāvacarameva pāpakānaṃ pamāṇakaraṇadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena appajahanato.
tika-s0203t:130_15: Samucchedavasena kilesānaṃ appahānena mahaggatajjhānampi subhāvitaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-s0203t:131_1: Arahatte tassa upāyabhūtāya vipassanāya vā catutthajjhāne tassa upāyabhūte upacāre vā sati cittaṃ pasannameva hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:131_4: Adhimokkhasampasādoti “ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vā vipassanāya vīthipaṭipannattā;
tika-s0203t:131_5: “ajjeva catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti vā upacārasamādhinā cittassa samāhitattā adhimuccanabhūto sampasādo.
tika-s0203t:131_6: Paṭilābhasampasādoti arahattassa catutthajjhānassa vā adhigamasaṅkhāto sampasādo.
tika-s0203t:131_7: Paṭilābhopi hi kilesakālusiyābhibhavanato cittassa suppasannabhāvāvahattā “sampasādo”ti vutto.
tika-s0203t:131_9: Sabbathāti samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇatoti sabbappakārena.
tika-s0203t:132_1: Kilesā sannisīdantīti nīvaraṇasahagatā eva kilesā vikkhambhanavasena vūpasamanti.
tika-s0203t:132_5: bhāvanācittuppādapariyāpannaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0203t:132_7: Lepapiṇḍeti silesapiṇḍe laggamāno viya appito viya hoti.
tika-s0203t:132_9: Ayanti ayaṃ duvidhopi adhimuccanākāro adhimokkhasampasādo nāma.
tika-s0203t:132_12: Yo pana arahattaṃ vā paṭilabhati catutthajjhānaṃ vā,
tika-s0203t:133_4: Arahattasacchikiriyā nāma aggamaggabhāvanāya sati atthato āpannā hoti,
tika-s0203t:133_7: Tattha yathā nāma pāsādassa atthāya samānītadabbasambhārāvayave appahonte kūṭāgāraṃ kātuṃ na pahontiyeva,
tika-s0203t:133_10: Catusaccaṃ vā sacchikaroti heṭṭhimamaggādhigamanavasena āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjati ubhayassapi hetupariggahitattā.
tika-s0203t:134_1: āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatī”ti yathāvutte visesādhigame ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno yojanānayo.
tika-s0203t:134_2: Evaṃ hotīti idāni vuccamānākārena cittābhinīhāro hoti.
tika-s0203t:134_6: Antarā na tiṭṭhatīti asamāhitabhūmiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0203t:134_9: yathā tassa purisassa vanamahiṃsaṃ gahetuṃ ussāhavato osakkantassa sasagodhādiggahaṇe vattabbameva natthi,
tika-s0203t:134_10: evaṃ imassapi bhikkhuno arahattaṃ gahetuṃ ussāhavato tato osakkitvā catutthajjhānasamāpajjane vattabbameva natthīti.
tika-s0203t:134_11: Eseva nayoti yathāvuttaṃ upamaṃ upamāsaṃsandanañca maggabhāvanāyojanāyaṃ catusaccasacchikiriyāyojanāyañca atidisati.
tika-s0203t:135_1: karaṇe vā etaṃ paccattavacananti āha “yena kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0203t:135_7: evaṃ taṃ vipākaviññāṇampi āneñjasabhāvaṃ upagataṃ assa bhaveyya. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:135_10: Kusalaviññāṇanti vipākaviññāṇampi taṃ kusalaṃ viya vadanti.
tika-s0203t:135_14: So panāyamatthoti āneñjasadisatāya vipākakālepi taṃnāmakameva assāti yathāvutto attho.
tika-s0203t:135_16: Ettha hi āneñjābhisaṅkhārahetuvipākaviññāṇaṃ “āneñjūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti vuttattā taṃnāmakameva katvā dīpitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:135_17: Arahattassāpīti apisaddena aggamaggabhāvanāyapi heṭṭhimamaggabhāvanāyapīti attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:135_18: Samādhivasena osakkanā kathitāti “vipulena mahaggatena cetasā vihareyya”nti samathanayaṃ dassetvā desanā kathitā.
tika-s0203t:136_1: Ayañhi bhikkhūti yaṃ uddissa ayaṃ dutiyāneñjasappāyadesanāya bhikkhu vutto.
tika-s0203t:136_4: Heṭṭhimassa hi “ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā”tiādinā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāneva rūpamukhena vipassanābhiniveso kato,
tika-s0203t:136_6: Bhagavā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento kammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno kāraṇabalānurūpameva paṭhamaṃ bhāvanābhinivesaṃ dasseti;
tika-s0203t:136_7: so pacchā ñāṇe vipulaṃ gacchante anavasesato dhammaṃ pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0203t:137_1: Tiṇṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvāti kāmaguṇā sabbarūpadhammā kāmasaññāti evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ kammaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0203t:137_8: Kāmarūpasaññāvasena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhedato aṭṭha ekekakoṭṭhāsāti evaṃ kataṃ ubhayanti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0203t:137_14: eso me attā”ti abhinandituṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā ṭhātunti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0203t:137_19: taṃsamatikkamena saheva sabbe tā vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā “ubhayametaṃ anicca”ntiādivacanato.
tika-s0203t:139_2: Sati samathabhāvanāyaṃ suññatāmanasikārassa idha sātisayattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:140_10: vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā paraparikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:140_11: Tattha parassāti “parā pajā”ti “paro puriso”ti ca evaṃ gahitassa.
tika-s0203t:140_12: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-
tika-s0203t:140_16: tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ ijjhatī”ti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena paraṃ attānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:140_17: tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento,
tika-s0203t:140_19: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano abhāvaṃ passati.
tika-s0203t:140_20: Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti sakaattano eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati. Na ca,
tika-s0203t:140_23: “Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthī”ti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0203t:140_24: “tassa parassa attano mama kismiñci kiñcanatā na catthī”ti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati.
tika-s0203t:140_25: Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena diṭṭhā hoti.
tika-s0203t:141_1: Sabbasaññāti rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā nānattasaññā heṭṭhimā tisso arūpasaññāti evaṃ sabbasaññā anavasesā nirujjhantīti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:141_2: “Heṭṭhā vuttā”ti pana visesitattā imasmiṃ āgatā catutthajjhānasaññādayo api saññāti apare.
tika-s0203t:141_3: Tanti sammutimattaṃ kāmasaññāpaṭibāhanavaseneva tesaṃ nānattasaññādinirodhassa atthasiddhattā.
tika-s0203t:142_1: Pubbe pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭanti purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nikantitaṇhā upagamanaṃ
tika-s0203t:142_2: upādānaṃ cetanā bhavoti evamāgato saparikkhāro kammappabandho.
tika-s0203t:142_3: Na āyūhitaṃ assāti na cetitaṃ pakappitaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-s0203t:142_4: Etarahi evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭanti viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāsaṅkhāto paccuppanno vipākappabandho
tika-s0203t:142_6: Sace āyūhitaṃ na bhavissatīti yadi cetitaṃ pakappitaṃ na siyā.
tika-s0203t:142_10: Taṃ pajahāmīti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena tato eva āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanavasena pajahāmi pariccajāmi.
tika-s0203t:143_3: Na kiñci kathitanti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena ñāṇuttarasseva visayabhāvato sarūpato na kiñci kathitaṃ,
tika-s0203t:143_6: “imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno ānando anusandhikusalatāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa
tika-s0203t:143_7: bhikkhuno paṭisandhiṃ arahattañca sandhāya pañhaṃ pucchissati,
tika-s0203t:143_9: Osakkanāya ca idhādhippetattā bhinnarasadesanā hotīti pucchānusandhi pucchitā.
tika-s0203t:144_1: Nissāyāti bhavapariyāpannaṃ nāma dhammaṃ nissāya tappariyāpannaṃ nāma nissāya oghanittharaṇā bhagavatā akkhātā;
tika-s0203t:145_0: Navasupi ṭhānesu samathayānikasseva vasena desanāya āgatattā,
tika-s0203t:145_1: idha ca kassacipi pādakajjhānassa anāmaṭṭhattā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:145_3: Navannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasatīti idaṃ jhānadhammepi anussavaladdhe gahetvā sammasanaṃ sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ;
tika-s0203t:145_4: tebhūmakasaṅkhāragataṃ idha vuttanti anavasesato pariggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:146_0: Etaṃ amatanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattiyā etaṃ arahattaṃ amatarasaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:146_3: “Anupādāya kiñcipi aggahetvā cittaṃ vimuccī”ti vuttattāpi anupādā cittassa vimokkho nibbānaṃ aññattha sutte vuccati.
tika-s0203t:147_1: Pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa osakkanāya abhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:147_2: Samodhānetvāti sammadeva odahitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne asaṅkarato vavatthapetvā.
tika-s0203t:147_3: Sukathitaṃ nāma hoti kathetabbassa anavasesetvā kathitattā.
tika-s0203t:150_1: Yathā heṭṭhimasopānaphalakaṃ orohantassa pacchimaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0203t:150_2: evaṃ ārohantassa paṭhamaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:150_4: Vatthuṃ sodhetvāti vatthuvijjācariyena vuttavidhinā pāsādavatthuno sodhanavidhiṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:150_6: Sattadhā bhinnassa vālaggassa aṃsukoṭivedhako vālavedhi nāma.
tika-s0203t:150_12: cattāri catukkāni soḷasātiādinā evaṃ gaṇanaṃ sikkhāpema.
tika-s0203t:151_1: Kerāṭikā hontīti samayassa anupakkiliṭṭhakaraṇamāyāsāṭheyyena samannāgatā honti.
tika-s0203t:152_2: Nanu ca khīṇāsavā sativepullappattā paññāvepullappattā ca,
tika-s0203t:152_3: kathaṃ tassa satisampajaññaṃ payogasādhanīyaṃ pavattanti āha “dve hī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:153_2: kiṃ nu kho tassa bhavissatī”ti taṃ vitakkento.
tika-s0203t:153_4: Ime dhammeti imasmiṃ sutte āgate sīlādidhamme.
tika-s0203t:153_5: Āvajjitvāvāti attano parisuddhasīlatādiāvajjanahetu eva samāpajjituṃ sakkhissati.
tika-s0203t:155_1: Takkanamattāni hi tehi kappetvā sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ viracitāni.
tika-s0203t:155_2: Purātanatāya paripuṇṇatāya ekantaniyyānikatāya ca paramo uttamo. Tenāha – “tesu…pe…
tika-s0203t:158_11: Yopi ahosīti yopi kosambivāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena kosambiyaṃ kalaho ahosi.
tika-s0203t:158_13: Parinibbutakāle panassāti assa sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakāle pana.
tika-s0203t:158_17: Anusaṃyāyamānoti anu anu sammadeva jānanto vicārento vosāsamāno.
tika-s0203t:159_3: “atthi koci tumhākaṃ sāsanassa sārabhūto bhikkhū”ti pucchi.
tika-s0203t:159_7: Tathāgatena pavedito dhammo paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti dhammapaṭisaraṇā.
tika-s0203t:160_8: saddo avadhāraṇe “na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0203t:161_1: “Yathā taṃ tumhādisehi rakkhakehi gopakehī”ti evaṃ pasannavesena attānaṃ ukkaṃsāpetukāmo.
tika-s0203t:161_2: Ariyūpavādapāpaṃ khamāpane sati antarāyāya na hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:162_1: Ayaṃ ukkaṃsāpetuṃ icchitaṃ yathāraddhamatthaṃ visaṃvādeti avaṇṇitampi vaṇṇitaṃ katvā kathento;
tika-s0203t:162_2: imassa vacanassa paṭikkhepena iminā dātabbapiṇḍapātassa antarāyo mā hotūti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ rakkhituṃ na kho pana sakkāti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:162_6: antaraṃ vā tassa nijjhānassa kāraṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:162_9: Sabbasaṅgāhikajjhānanti lokiyalokuttarassa antarāyo mā hotūti evaṃ katvāpi rūpāvacarassa maggajhānassa
tika-s0203t:162_10: phalajhānassāti sabbassapi saṅgaṇhanavasena desitattā sabbasaṅgāhakajjhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:163_0: Yaṃ no mayanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-s0203t:163_1: Taṃ noti ettha pana noti amhākanti attho.
tika-s0203t:163_3: Mandapaññatāya vassakāragataissābhibhūtacittatāya paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttampi atthaṃ anupadhārento āha –
tika-s0203t:166_1: Tasmiṃ ahūti tasmiṃ ahanīti āha “tasmiṃ divase”ti.
tika-s0203t:166_2: Anasanenāti sabbaso āhārassa abhuñjanena sāsanikasīlena bāhirakaanasanena upetā hutvāti yojanā. Vā-
tika-s0203t:166_6: Upetena samannāgatena hutvā vasitabbato santāne vāsetabbato uposatho, sīlaṃ.
tika-s0203t:166_7: Anasanādidhammādiṃ vā upecca vasanaṃ upavāso uposatho.
tika-s0203t:166_14: Tāya hi rattiyā vasena māso anavasesato puṇṇo hoti.
tika-s0203t:166_15: Māsaddhamāsādibhedaṃ kālaṃ māti minanto viya hotīti ca “mā”iti cando vuccati.
tika-s0203t:167_2: Sabbaṃ kathenti sabbaṃ attanā pariggahitappakāraṃ kathenti.
tika-s0203t:168_1: Ime nu khoti ettha nūti saṃsayajotanoti āha –
tika-s0203t:168_7: Yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ jānanto viya pucchati kohaññe ṭhatvā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:168_8: “thero evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ karissatī”ti kāraṇassa suppahīnattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:169_4: suvisuddhavipulodāraviññāṇo vāti imamatthaṃ “saññādīsupi eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
tika-s0203t:169_5: Kasmā panettha anāgatakālavaseneva desanā āgatāti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:170_0: Khandhānaṃ khandhapaṇṇattīti khandhasaddābhidheyyānaṃ ruppanānubhavanasañjānanābhisaṅkharavijānanasabhāvānaṃ atthānaṃ “khandho”ti ayaṃ samaññā.
tika-s0203t:171_1: Yo hi lobhādīnaṃ sahajātadhammesu mūlaṭṭhenupakārakabhāvo nippariyāyena hetuttho;
tika-s0203t:171_2: so pathavīādīsupi paccayabhāvamattena hetupariyāyadassanato dutiyena hetu-
tika-s0203t:171_5: “atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipāka”nti ettha vijjamānesupi aññesu paccayesu
tika-s0203t:171_8: “Mahābhūtā hetū”ti ayamevattho “mahābhūtā paccayo”ti imināpi vuttoti hetusaddapaccayasaddānaṃ samānatthattā paccayo eva hetu paccayahetu,
tika-s0203t:171_10: so eva tassa paññāpanāya paccayoti vuttoti āha –
tika-s0203t:171_12: Yadaggena paccayadhammo attano paccayuppannassa uppādāya ṭhitiyā ca paccayo,
tika-s0203t:171_13: tadaggena tassa bhāvato samaññāto paññāpanāyapi so paccayoti vattabbataṃ arahatīti.
tika-s0203t:171_17: Taṃ pana sabbodhanaṃ ñāṇena dassanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “dassanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0203t:172_2: Nibbatto hi phasso tathārūpāya vedanāya paccayo hotīti.
tika-s0203t:172_5: Phasse sati vedeti phassapaccayā vedanāicceva vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:172_7: Yatheva hi vedanāya evaṃ saññāya saṅkhārānampi phasso visesapaccayo tasmiṃ asati abhāvato.
tika-s0203t:172_9: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhabhājanīye ca “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0203t:172_10: Viññāṇakkhandhassāti ettha ekasmiṃ bhave ādibhūtaviññāṇassa nāmarūpapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:172_12: Tattha gabbhaseyyakassa sabhāvakassa rūpapavattiṃ sandhāya “uparimaparicchedenā”ti vuttaṃ samatiṃsato
tika-s0203t:172_17: kasmā tayo eva khandhā phassapaccayā vuttāti?
tika-s0203t:172_19: yathā pana viññāṇasahito phasso vedanādīnaṃ paccayo,
tika-s0203t:172_22: “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti phasso viya nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa visesapaccayo yathā nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇanti.
tika-s0203t:172_23: Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ nāmarūpasseva viññāṇapaccayatā vuttā,
tika-s0203t:173_2: tāva vaṭṭassa pariyanto natthevāti appahīnasakkāyadiṭṭhiko vaṭṭe paribbhamatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:174_1: Ayaṃ rūpe assādoti yāthāvato dassanaṃ pariññābhisamayo,
tika-s0203t:174_5: so cassa paccayādhīnavuttitāya paccayo samudayasaccanti samudayappahānena ādīnavasamatikkamoti ādīnavaggahaṇena siddhamatthamāha –
tika-s0203t:174_9: Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti yathāvuttesu dukkhādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu.
tika-s0203t:174_10: Ye sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammāti ye ariyamaggasaññitā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha,
tika-s0203t:175_5: Tāni pana indriyabaddhānipi anindriyabaddhānipi taṃsabhāvānīti āha “anindriyabaddhampi saṅgaṇhātī”ti.
tika-s0203t:176_1: Anattani ṭhatvāti attarahite anattasabhāve khandhakoṭṭhāse ṭhatvā taṃ ādhāraṃ katvā katāni kammāni.
tika-s0203t:176_2: Katarasmiṃ attani ṭhatvāti kīdise attani nissayavipākaṃ dassanti vipaccissanti.
tika-s0203t:176_3: Etena kārakavedakarahitattā attapakkhakammakāni na yujjantīti dasseti,
tika-s0203t:176_4: khandhānaṃ khaṇikattā ca katanāsaakatabbhāgamadoso ca āpajjatīti.
tika-s0203t:177_2: khaṇe khaṇe hi nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti,
tika-s0203t:177_8: so acetanattā kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipātāpuññaṃ pasavati yathā matasarīre.
tika-s0203t:177_9: Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādiko atītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya,
tika-s0203t:177_12: tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato,
tika-s0203t:177_13: paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā,
tika-s0203t:177_14: vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:177_15: nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo?
tika-s0203t:178_4: Vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya rūpasantāne parena payojitajīvitindriyupacchedakapayogavasena
tika-s0203t:178_5: tannibbattitavibandhakavisadirūpuppattiyā vigate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo;
tika-s0203t:178_7: na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katappayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito.
tika-s0203t:178_8: Khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ;
tika-s0203t:178_9: na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano
tika-s0203t:178_13: Na ca kevalassa vacādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato;
tika-s0203t:178_14: santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyasiddhi dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammunā baddho;
tika-s0203t:178_15: tato eva yasmiṃ santāne pāṇātipātacetanā pavattā;
tika-s0203t:178_16: tattheva santāne paccayantarasamavāyena bhavantare nirayādīsu tassā phalappavattīti nattheva katavināso akatabbhāgamo ca.
tika-s0203t:178_17: Iminā nayena adinnādānādīnañca vasena yathārahaṃ kammapathasambandhavibhāvanā veditabbāti.
tika-s0203t:179_2: Pakatikammaṭṭhānanti tassa therassa santike gahetvā parihariyamānakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:179_3: Aññaṃ navakammaṭṭhānanti bhagavato desanānusārena gahitaṃ aññaṃ navaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:182_1: Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti āmeḍitavacanaṃ byāpanicchāvasena vuttanti āha –
tika-s0203t:182_3: Anuviloketvāti ettha anusaddopi byāpanicchāyamevāti anu anu viloketvāti attho.
tika-s0203t:182_9: Tanti asappurisaṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti asappurisadhammānaṃ yāthāvato ajānanato.
tika-s0203t:183_1: yathā pana sā attano balavataradukkhatthāya hoti,
tika-s0203t:183_4: Yathā asuko asukantiādīhi pāpako pāpavipākekadesaṃ balavaṃ garutaraṃ vā paccanubhontopi yathā paro paccanubhoti,
tika-s0203t:184_8: Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipatti cittīkaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:184_14: Rogaṃ pakkhipanto viyāti rogikasarīraṃ odanādīhi pamajjitvā vammike rogaṃ pakkhipanto viya.
tika-s0203t:184_15: Addhā imassa dānassa phalaṃ mameva āgacchatīti evaṃ yassa tathā diṭṭhi atthi,
tika-s0203t:184_17: ayaṃ pana na tādisoti āha “anāgamanadiṭṭhiko”ti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:185_1: tehi pana sabbehipi micchādassanaṃ mahāsāvajjanti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:185_3: Vuttapaṭipakkhanayenāti kaṇhapakkhe vuttassa atthassa vipariyāyena sukkapakkhe attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:185_6: Tattha brahmānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā kāmāvacaradevaggahaṇanti ce?
tika-s0203t:185_9: Tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampattīti khattiyamahattādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampatti,
tika-s0203t:185_11: atha kho tattha āyuvaṇṇayasabhogaissariyādisampadāpi adhippetāti daṭṭhabbaṃ uḷārassa dānamayapuññassa vasena tesampi samijjhanato.
tika-s0203t:185_12: Suddhavaṭṭavaseneva kathitaṃ sukkapakkhepi sabbaso vivaṭṭassa anāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0203t:190_1: Iddhimāti guṇo pākaṭo paratoghosena vinā pāsādakampanadevacārikādīhi sayameva pakāsabhāvato;
tika-s0203t:190_2: dhutavādādiguṇānampi tathābhāve eteneva nayena tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pākaṭayogato ca paresaṃ nicchitabhāvato ca.
tika-s0203t:190_3: Paññavato guṇāti paññāpabhedapabhāvite guṇavisese sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0203t:190_4: Te hi yebhuyyena paresaṃ avisayā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:190_7: te pana appahīnarāgadosatāya parassa vijjamānampi guṇaṃ makkhetvā avijjamānaṃ avaṇṇameva ghosentīti āha –
tika-s0203t:191_0: Yā aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato yathābhūtaṃ pajānanā,
tika-s0203t:191_5: idaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇanti evaṃ ṭhānañca ṭhānato,
tika-s0203t:191_8: Yo pana imesu dhātuādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena nissaṅgagatiyā paṇḍāti laddhanāmena ñāṇena ito gato pavatto,
tika-s0203t:191_11: Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti mahāpañño.
tika-s0203t:192_0: Nānattanti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatattā thero “mahāpañño”tiādinā kittīyati,
tika-s0203t:192_1: tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā.
tika-s0203t:192_2: Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā dassento,
tika-s0203t:192_4: Tattha hetumahantatāya paccayamahantatāya nissayamahantatāya pabhedamahantatāya kiccamahantatāya phalamahantatāya
tika-s0203t:192_14: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu ca āgatanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:192_15: Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā veditabbā,
tika-s0203t:192_17: Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasutte sayameva āgamissati.
tika-s0203t:192_21: Sāmaññaphalānaṃ mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato
tika-s0203t:192_23: Abhiññānaṃ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito ca.
tika-s0203t:193_5: evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t:193_12: bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādibhedavasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t:193_16: dve catubhūmakā”ti evaṃ āyatananānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t:194_3: dve catubhūmakā”ti evaṃ nānādhātūsu paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t:194_5: Paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ upādiṇṇakadhātūsuyeva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t:194_10: “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti,
tika-s0203t:194_15: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ,
tika-s0203t:194_16: phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ,
tika-s0203t:194_17: kaṇṭako tikhiṇo atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo lohito odāto hotī”ti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t:195_1: Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato santānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu.
tika-s0203t:195_5: tato eva itthipurisaattaattaniyādivasena anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-
tika-s0203t:195_11: “imāni idamatthajotakānī”ti tathā tathā paṭibhānato paṭibhānānīti laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu.
tika-s0203t:195_12: Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva.
tika-s0203t:196_0: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena hāsabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0203t:196_6: Sīlaṃ paripūretīti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā pītisahagatāya paññāya.
tika-s0203t:196_7: Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena ārammaṇe phullā vikasitā viya pavattati;
tika-s0203t:196_8: na upekkhāsahagatāti pātimokkhasīlaṃ ṭhapetvā hāsanīyaṃ paraṃ tividhampi sīlaṃ paripūretīti attho.
tika-s0203t:197_0: Rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti rūpakkhandhaṃ aniccanti sīghaṃ vegena pavattiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena
tika-s0203t:197_1: pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhantī adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe
tika-s0203t:197_5: Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:197_13: Vibhāvayitvāti yāthāvato pakāsetvā pañcakkhandhaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:198_0: Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindanena veditabboti,
tika-s0203t:198_1: “khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā”ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento,
tika-s0203t:199_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti
tika-s0203t:199_4: Tattha ubbegabahuloti vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhaṃ pavattasaṃvego.
tika-s0203t:199_9: Bahimukhoti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho,
tika-s0203t:200_3: Padaṃ vā sammasanupagā dhammā vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:200_7: tasmā anupadaṃ anukkamenāti ayamettha atthoti āha “anupaṭipāṭiyā”ti.
tika-s0203t:200_9: Vipassatīti samāpattiyo jhānamukhena te te dhamme yāthāvato pariggahetvā,
tika-s0203t:200_11: Addhamāsena arahattaṃ patto ukkaṃsagatassa sāvakānaṃ sammasanacārassa nippadesena pavattiyamānattā,
tika-s0203t:200_13: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi mahāmoggallānatthero na cirasseva arahattaṃ patto;
tika-s0203t:200_22: Ekadesamevāti sakaattabhāve saṅkhāre anavasesato pariggahetuñca sammasituñca asakkontaṃ attano abhinīhārasamudāgatañāṇabalānurūpaṃ
tika-s0203t:200_26: anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti vacanato vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmena sabbaṃ pariññeyyaṃ parijānitabbameva?
tika-s0203t:200_30: parasantānagate ca tesaṃ santānavibhāgaṃ akatvā bahiddhābhāvasāmaññato sammasanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:200_32: Thero pana bahiddhādhammepi santānavibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā sammasi,
tika-s0203t:200_36: Tattha ñāṇena nāma yāvatā neyyaṃ pavattitabbaṃ,
tika-s0203t:201_3: Tathā hi addhattayavasena paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ osaritvā chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena buddhānaṃ mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pavattaṃ.
tika-s0203t:201_4: Paccekabuddhānaṃ sasantānagatehi saddhiṃ majjhimadesavāsisattasantānagatā anindriyabaddhā ca sammasanacāroti vadanti,
tika-s0203t:201_7: Tattha pana thero sātisayaṃ niravasesaṃ anupadadhammaṃ vipassi.
tika-s0203t:202_0: Tattha “sāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmī”ti ettha sukkhavipassakā lokiyābhiññappattā pakatisāvakā aggasāvakā
tika-s0203t:202_1: paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti chasu janesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ jhānābhiññāhi anadhigatapaññānepuññattā
tika-s0203t:202_2: andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ vipassanākāle icchikicchitadhammavipassanā natthi.
tika-s0203t:202_4: Lokiyābhiññappattā pana pakatisāvakā yena mukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhanti;
tika-s0203t:202_5: tato aññena vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti vipulañāṇattā.
tika-s0203t:202_6: Mahāsāvakā abhinīhārasampannattā tato sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-s0203t:202_7: Aggasāvakesu dutiyo abhinīhārasampattiyā samādhānassa sātisayattā vipassanaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t:202_8: Paṭhamo pana tato mahāpaññatāya sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vitthārikaṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t:202_9: Paccekabuddho tehipi mahābhinīhāratāya attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ tatopi vitthārikavipassanaṃ karonti.
tika-s0203t:202_14: Yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayena sarabhaṅgasadisena dhanuggahena khitto saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkhaṇeyeva patati;
tika-s0203t:202_16: evaṃ antarā asajjamānā avirajjhamānā vipassanā sammasanīyadhammesu yāthāvato nānānayehi pavattati.
tika-s0203t:203_6: Tathā sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gamanasadiso,
tika-s0203t:204_2: Patvā aññāsi attano vipassanācārassa mahāvisayattā tikkhavisadasūrabhāvassa ca sallakkhaṇena.
tika-s0203t:204_3: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ mahāthero dandhaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇanto sīghaṃ arahattaṃ pattato paññāya attānaṃ sātisayaṃ katvā aññāsīti āha –
tika-s0203t:204_6: Yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati veṇuggahaṇe anuccinitvā veṇussa gahitattā.
tika-s0203t:204_7: Evaṃsampadanti yathā tesu purisesu eko veḷuggahaṇe anuccinitvā veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0203t:205_0: Sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇānīti paṭisambhidāmagge āgatesu tesattatiyā ñāṇesu ṭhapetvā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sutamayañāṇādīni
tika-s0203t:206_1: Idaṃ hotīti idaṃ dāni vuccamānaṃ anupubbasammasanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:207_2: tasmā ye paṭhame jhāne dhammāti ye paṭhamajjhānasaṃsaṭṭhā dhammāti attho.
tika-s0203t:207_3: Antosamāpattiyanti ca samāpattisahagate cittuppāde samāpattisamaññaṃ āropetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:207_5: Paricchinnāti ñāṇena paricchinnā salakkhaṇato paricchijja ñātā.
tika-s0203t:207_13: Phusanaṃ indriyavisayaviññāṇassa tato uppajjitvā ārammaṇe phusanākārena viya pavatti.
tika-s0203t:207_21: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ paggāho,
tika-s0203t:207_25: Samappavattesu assesu sārathi viya sakiccapasutesu sampayuttesu ajjhupekkhanaṃ majjhattatā.
tika-s0203t:207_28: Soḷasannaṃ eva cettha dhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tesaṃyeva therena vavatthāpitabhāvato,
tika-s0203t:207_33: alobhādosā ca saṅgahitā jhānacittuppādapariyāpannattā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:207_35: Te na upaṭṭhahiṃsūti na sakkā vattunti apare.
tika-s0203t:208_0: Viditā uppajjantīti uppādepi nesaṃ vedanānaṃ pajānanaṃ hotiyevāti attho.
tika-s0203t:208_12: Ekekameva ñāṇaṃ uppajjati tasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva āvajjanassa uppajjanato,
tika-s0203t:208_13: na ca āvajjanena vinā cittuppatti atthi.
tika-s0203t:210_0: Na tveva tepi jīvanti, dvīhi cittehi saṃyutā”ti. ca,
tika-s0203t:212_0: Vatthārammaṇānaṃ pariggahitatāyāti yasmiñca ārammaṇe ye jhānadhammā pavattanti,
tika-s0203t:212_1: tesaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ pageva ñāṇena paricchijja gahitattā.
tika-s0203t:212_2: Yathā nāma migasūkarādīnaṃ āsayepariggahite tatra ṭhitā migā vā sūkarā vā tato uṭṭhānatopi āgamanatopi nesādassa sukhaggahaṇā honti,
tika-s0203t:212_8: Uppādaṃ āvajjantassātiādinā uppādādīsu yaṃ yadeva ārabbha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati;
tika-s0203t:212_9: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa tasseva cassa pākaṭabhāvo dīpito.
tika-s0203t:212_10: Na hi āvajjanena vinā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
tika-s0203t:212_11: Ahutvā sambhontīti pubbe avijjamānā hutvā sambhavanti,
tika-s0203t:212_15: Pubbe abhāvabodhako hi attalābho dhammānaṃ udayo.
tika-s0203t:213_0: Tesu dhammesu natthi etassa upayo rāgavasena upagamananti anupayo,
tika-s0203t:213_3: Tathā natthi etassa apāyo paṭighavasena apagamananti anapāyo, avirodho.
tika-s0203t:213_5: eso me atthā”ti tassa taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesābhāvato taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito.
tika-s0203t:213_6: Appaṭibaddhoti anupayānissitabhāvato vipassanāya paribandhavasena chandarāgena na paṭibaddho na vibandhito.
tika-s0203t:213_7: Vippamuttoti tato eva vikkhambhanavimuttivasena kāmarāgato vimutto.
tika-s0203t:214_0: Kilesamariyādā tena katā bhaveyyāti antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme ārabbha pavattamānaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ bhinditvā sace rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ;
tika-s0203t:214_6: Vuttākārena ekaccānaṃ anāpāthagamane sati vipassanā na tesu dhammesu nirantarappavattāti ārammaṇamariyādā bhaveyya.
tika-s0203t:214_7: Vikkhambhitapaccanīkattāti vipassanāya paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ pageva vikkhambhitattā idānipi vikkhambhetabbā kilesā natthīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:216_1: tassa vicārakkhobhavigamena vā cetaso sammadeva pāsādikabhāvena.
tika-s0203t:217_4: Passaddhattāti samadhuracetayitabhāvena ārammaṇe visaṭavitthatabhāvato yo so cetaso ābhogo vutto.
tika-s0203t:217_6: sā thana atthato sativinimuttā natthīti āha “parisuddhāsatiyevā”ti.
tika-s0203t:218_1: Īdisesu ṭhānesu satiyā na kadācipi ñāṇaviraho atthīti āha –
tika-s0203t:218_4: “satimā sukhavihārī”ti ettha sampajānoti ayamattho vutto eva hoti.
tika-s0203t:218_5: Na sāvakānaṃ anupadadhammavipassanā hoti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumappavattiyā duviññeyyattā vinibbhujitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:219_1: Paññāya cassadisvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti dassanasamakālaṃ khīyamānā āsavā,
tika-s0203t:223_1: Hetuattho vā ayaṃ disvāsaddo asamānakattuko yathā –
tika-s0203t:223_4: Dassanahetuko hi āsavānaṃ parikkhayo pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamaye sati pahānābhisamayassa labbhanato.
tika-s0203t:223_5: Yuganaddhaṃ āharitvāti paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha jhānadhamme sammasanto samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti.
tika-s0203t:223_6: Evaṃ yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha sammasanto samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā yathā thero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0203t:223_11: Tadā ca anāgāmī hutvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjatīti vacanaavasaro natthi,
tika-s0203t:223_15: “sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti?
tika-s0203t:223_16: There vijjamāne paṇḍitaguṇe anavasesato dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ.
tika-s0203t:224_1: Tattha “nirodhaṃ samāpajjissāmī”ti ābhogena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā ṭhitassa nirodhasamāpatti sīsaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0203t:224_5: Phalasamāpatti sīsaṃ hotīti etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:224_7: Jambudīpavāsino therā panātiādi aṭṭhakathāruḷhameva taṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:225_6: Tassa hi adhigamena ariyāya jātiyā jāto nibbattoti katvā,
tika-s0203t:228_1: Khīṇā jātīti attano jātikkhayaṃ paṭijānantena arahattaṃ byākataṃ hoti arahato tadabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:228_2: Tathā vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyavāso me pariyositoti paṭijānantenapi.
tika-s0203t:228_3: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūhi maggehi catūsu saccesu pariññādivasena soḷasavidhassapi kiccassa attanā niṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ paṭijānantenapi.
tika-s0203t:228_7: Dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ pana subaddhaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:228_8: Idha pana aññābyākaraṇaṃ catūhi padehi āgataṃ,
tika-s0203t:228_14: Paramappicchatāya ariyā attano guṇe anāvikarontāpi sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvapavedanatthañceva sabrahmacārīnaṃ
tika-s0203t:228_15: sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhajananatthañca tādisānaṃ parinibbānasamayeyeva āvikarontīti adhippāyenāha –
tika-s0203t:229_6: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena samannāgamanavasena ca yathārahaṃ upenti upagacchantīti upayā,
tika-s0203t:229_8: eso me attā”ti upādiyanti daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhantīti upādānā.
tika-s0203t:229_15: eso me attā”ti ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati etāhi abhinivesāhi,
tika-s0203t:229_16: tathā sakkāyadhammesu cittaṃ anuseti etāhīti anusayā,
tika-s0203t:229_21: Khayā virāgāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti “khayena virāgenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavasena attho vutto.
tika-s0203t:230_3: Nhānīyacuṇṇaṃ bāhiraudakaṃ viya sesabhūtattayaṃ ābandhatīti ābandhanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:230_4: Pacanīyabhattaṃ bāhiratejo viya sesabhūtattayaṃ paripācetīti paripācanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:230_10: “rūpadhammo me attā”ti attakoṭṭhāsena attabhāvena na upagamiṃ na gaṇhiṃ.
tika-s0203t:230_14: Tathāpi taṃ nissitaṃ hotiyevāti taṃ na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0203t:230_16: Tena ca tathā paricchinnattā sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma.
tika-s0203t:230_17: Taṃ nissāya pavattiyā upādārūpaṃ viya bhūtarūpāni,
tika-s0203t:230_27: nissitanti idaṃ nippariyāyasiddhaṃ nissayattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:230_29: “pacchājātapaccayoti pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato sabbaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ,
tika-s0203t:231_1: Ruppati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpanti ayamattho cakkhudvāre āpāthagate rūpāyatane nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-s0203t:231_3: Cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbabhāvo pana āpāthamanāgatepi tasmiṃ labbhateva taṃsabhāvānativatthanato.
tika-s0203t:231_5: Thero pana āpāthaṃ anāgatassāpi rūpāyatanassa rūpabhāvaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti dvidhākaraṇaṃ nānujānanto channovādaṃ nidasseti,
tika-s0203t:231_10: na cettha cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgatameva rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbapadena gahitaṃ,
tika-s0203t:231_11: na āpāthaṃ anāgatanti sakkā viññātuṃ aviseseneva rūpāyatanena taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhābhāvassa jotitattā.
tika-s0203t:231_14: Yadi evaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesū”ti padaṃ kathaṃ netabbanti āha –
tika-s0203t:231_16: Cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ viññātabbesūti yena manoviññāṇena cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccantiādinā cakkhuviññāṇena
tika-s0203t:231_20: Rajjanavasenāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātaṃ cittassa anurañjanavasena.
