tika-s0203t:232_5: Evaṃ catutthajjhāne niddiṭṭhe sabbāsu lokiyābhiññāsu vuccamānāsu heṭṭhā vijjādvayaṃ vattabbanti adhippāyena,
tika-s0203t:232_7: Itaro idha sabbavāresupi lokuttaradhammapucchā adhikatā tasmā “so evaṃ samāhite”tiādinā tatiyā vijjā kathitāti dassento,
tika-s0203t:232_11: “chabbisodhanantipissa nāma”nti vatvā tesu dhammesu bhedaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:232_14: Ekameva katvāti ekavāravaseneva pāḷiyaṃ ekajjhaṃ āgatattā ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:232_15: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ vā chabbisodhanatāti āha –
tika-s0203t:232_16: “catūhi āhārehi saddhi”nti kathaṃ panettha cattāro āhārā gahetabbāti?
tika-s0203t:232_18: “sādhūti bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttari pañho pucchitabbo”ti heṭṭhā āgatena nayena āhāravāro āharitvā vattabboti.
tika-s0203t:232_19: “Bahiddhā sabbanimittesū”ti ettha āhārānampi saṅgahitattā āhārā atthato āgatā evāti aññe.
tika-s0203t:233_0: “Chabbisodhana”nti imassa suttassa samaññāya anvatthataṃ dassetvā āyatimpi tādisena byākaraṇena bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipattimpi dassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0203t:235_0: Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti idaṃ pana pubbe “kiṃ te adhigata”nti aniddhāritabhedā jhānādivisesā
tika-s0203t:235_2: Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttehi ākārehi adhigamabyākaraṇaṃ sodhetabbaṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0203t:235_3: Ettāvatāvāti ettakena byākaraṇamatteneva na sakkāro kātabbo.
tika-s0203t:235_5: yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpaṃ jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti jātarūpaṃ nighaṃsanatāpanachedanehi sodhetabbaṃ
tika-s0203t:235_6: evamevaṃ imesu idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo vimokkhādīsūti ādi-
tika-s0203t:236_5: Sodhetabbāti suddhā udāhu asuddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā.
tika-s0203t:236_10: Paññāyatīti ettha “yadī”ti padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya yadi paññāyatīti sambandho.
tika-s0203t:237_1: Maddamānoti badarasāḷavaṃ sarasaṃ patte pakkhitto hutvā maddamāno.
tika-s0203t:240_2: So pana yasmā sappurisānaṃ paveṇiko dhammo hoti.
tika-s0203t:240_6: Evaṃ padhānaṃ anuṭṭhātabbañca sappurisadhammaṃ ādiṃ katvā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayathānupubbiyā niddisanto “katamo ca,
tika-s0203t:240_9: Tathā pana niddisanto udāharaṇapubbakaṃ hetuṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:240_12: tasmā sappurisadhammā sampādetabbāti dīpento satthā ayathānupubbiyā niddhārīyatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:240_16: Tathāhi antimabhavikā bodhisattā tattheva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-s0203t:241_3: Ādhipateyyābhāvato paresaṃ uparinatti etesaṃ īso īsanaṃ issariyanti akkhātabbāti appesakkhā.
tika-s0203t:242_1: Naveva dhutaṅgāni āgatānīti ettha yathā ukkaṭṭhapaṃsukūlikassa tecīvarikatā sukarā.
tika-s0203t:242_4: “paṃsukūliko hotī”tiādivacaneneva pāḷiyā anāgatānampi āgatabhāvo veditabbo pariharaṇasukaratāya tesampi samādānasambhavato.
tika-s0203t:243_6: Taṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvāti paṭhamajjhānepi taṇhāpahānaṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:243_7: Citte uppādetvāti atammayatāpariyāyena vutte taṇhāya paṭipakkhadhamme sampādetvā.
tika-s0203t:243_8: Na maññatīti maññanānaṃ ariyamaggena sabbaso samucchinnattā kismiñci okāse kāmabhavādike kenaci vatthunā
tika-s0203t:243_9: hatthiassakhettavatthādinā pattacīvaravihārapariveṇādinā ca puggalaṃ na maññati.
tika-s0203t:246_4: Pajjati etena yathādhippeto atthoti padaṃ, vākyaṃ.
tika-s0203t:247_4: na gahitā kammapathappattānaṃ tesaṃ manosamācārabhāvena gahitattā.
tika-s0203t:247_5: Yadi evaṃ kasmā diṭṭhi cittuppādavāre na gahitāti?
tika-s0203t:247_7: tathāpi cittuppādakkhaṇe lokiyalokuttaracittuppādesu kammapathakoṭṭhāso na uddhaṭo.
tika-s0203t:248_3: evaṃ anabhijjhāabyāpādaavihiṃsāsaññā saṅgahitā paṭhamena ādisaddena “anabhijjhāsahagatāya saññāyā”tiādipāṭhassa saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0203t:249_1: Ti kāmabhavādīnaṃ apariyosānāya pariyosānaṃ icchatopi tādisassa bhavānaṃ apariyosānameva hoti.
tika-s0203t:249_4: Akusalā dhammā vaḍḍhantīti tesaṃ pahānāya appaṭipajjamānassāti adhippāyo,
tika-s0203t:249_6: Tenassa kilesadukkhena vipākadukkhena ca sadukkhameva attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti.
tika-s0203t:249_7: Orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pahāya suddhāvāsesu nibbattanāraho anāgāmī kathaṃ…pe…
tika-s0203t:249_10: yāya labbhamānaakusalābhivuddhiṃ kusalaparihāniñca gahetvā anāgāminopi sabyābajjhaattabhāvābhinibbattanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:249_11: Evaṃ yathālabbhamānaṃ akusalaparihāniṃ kusalābhivuddhiñca gahetvā puthujjanassapi antimabhavikassa abyābajjhaattabhāvābhinibbattanaṃ
tika-s0203t:249_14: Akusalameva hāyati,na kusalaṃ tassa buddhipakkhe ṭhitattā.
tika-s0203t:250_5: Bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṃ ajānantā tāva dīgharattaṃ hitasukhato paribāhirā hontu jānantānampi sabbesaṃ
tika-s0203t:250_6: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotīti anekaṃsikataṃ codento “evaṃ santepī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:250_7: Itaro sabbesampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotiyevāti,
tika-s0203t:253_5: Tato appatīkāravighātāpatti yasmā patīkārābhāvena vihaññamānassa kiñci kātuṃ asamatthassa osīdanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:254_0: Naḷehīti naḷacchannasaṅkhepena upari chādetvā tehiyeva dārukacchadananiyāmena paritopi chāditā.
tika-s0203t:254_4: Te hi nippitikā avinītā asaṃyatā akiccakārino honti.
tika-s0203t:255_0: Matthakaṃ apāpetvāva niṭṭhāpitāti kasmā bhagavā evamakāsīti?
tika-s0203t:255_3: Te kira saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ ajānantā andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya ṭhitā.
tika-s0203t:256_3: Idāni tato saccāni niddhāretvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:256_6: addhaṭṭhamā dhātuyo yathārahaṃ vedanādayo cattāro arūpino khandhāti evaṃ aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pañcakkhandhā honti.
tika-s0203t:256_11: Matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti sammasanassa bhūmiyā nipphattiyā ca kathitattā.
tika-s0203t:256_12: Jānāti passatīti iminā ñāṇadassanaṃ kathitaṃ taṃ pana lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti duvidhanti tadubhayampi dassento āha –
tika-s0203t:257_1: saddaggahaṇena aññena pariyāyena satthā dhātukosallaṃ desetukāmoti thero,
tika-s0203t:257_3: bhante”ti pucchatīti bhagavā pathavīdhātuādivasenapi dhātukosallaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0203t:257_8: “Viññāṇadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā”ti vatvā kathaṃ rūpadhātuyo nīharīyantīti codanaṃ sandhāya taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:257_10: Kāmañcettha kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbadhātupathavīdhātu ādivasena desanāruḷameva,
tika-s0203t:257_11: kāyadhātu pana nīharitabbāti ekaṃsameva nīharaṇavidhiṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:257_13: Purimapacchimavasena manodhātūti pacchimabhāgavasena kiriyāmanodhātu gahetabbā tassānurūpabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:257_14: Nanu cettha manodhātu nāmāyaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuyā asaṃsaṭṭhā,
tika-s0203t:257_17: cittavibhattiniddese chaviññāṇakāyadesanāyaṃ pana sā manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:257_18: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:258_0: Dhammānaṃ yāvadeva nissattanijjīvavibhāvanatthāya satthu dhātudesanāti aññesu sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthesu labbhamānesupi ayamettha attho padhānoti āha –
tika-s0203t:258_13: Na hi somanassādayo manodhātuyā vinā vattanti.
tika-s0203t:258_14: Upekkhādhātuto nīharitvāti ettha cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo catasso viññāṇadhātuyo tāsaṃ vatthārammaṇabhūtā cakkhudhātuādayo cāti aṭṭha rūpadhātuyo,
tika-s0203t:258_17: upekkhāsahagatā eva dhammadhātūti evaṃ pannarasa dhātuyo upekkhādhātuto nīharitabbā.
tika-s0203t:258_19: evaṃ sukhadhātuto kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā tassā vatthārammaṇabhūtānaṃ kāyadhātuphoṭṭhabbadhātūnañca nīharaṇā heṭṭhā dassitanayāti,
tika-s0203t:259_0: Kāmavitakkādayo idha kāmadhātuādipariyāyena vuttāti “kāmadhātuādīnaṃ dvedhāvitakke kāmavitakkādīsu vuttanayena attho veditabbo”ti āha.
tika-s0203t:259_7: so mettāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati.
tika-s0203t:259_9: so karuṇāya pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:259_10: Ayaṃ panattho abhidhamme vitthārato āgato evāti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:259_12: Kāmadhātuto nīharitvāti ettha kāmaggahaṇena gahitā rūpadhātuādayo cha,
tika-s0203t:259_14: tattha pañcannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ cakkhudhātuādayo pañcāti aṭṭhārasa.
tika-s0203t:260_8: te kāmāvacarādayoti evaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhādīnaṃ kāmataṇhādibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:260_9: Ādinā nayenāti etena “uparito paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā etthāvacarā”tiādipāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0203t:260_10: Etthāvacarāti avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:261_2: tattha tannibbattane samāgatā viya hoti vekalle tadanibbattanato.
tika-s0203t:261_3: Saṅkhatadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā dhammadhātuekadesabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:262_1: Evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ attāti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmāti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā,
tika-s0203t:262_4: Āyatanakathā paṭiccasamuppādakathā ca visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbāti na vitthāritā.
tika-s0203t:263_9: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ettha diṭṭhisampatti veditabbāti vuttaṃ “maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno”ti.
tika-s0203t:263_13: Catubhūmakesūti idaṃ catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārānaṃ ariyasāvakassa visayabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ;
tika-s0203t:263_14: na pana te ārabbha niccato upagamanasabbhāvato.
tika-s0203t:263_17: Lokuttarasaṅkhārānaṃ pana nivattane kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0203t:263_21: Akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti idaṃ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:263_22: Appahīnavipallāsānaṃ sattānaṃ kusaladhammānampi te ārammaṇaṃ na honti.
tika-s0203t:264_0: Asukhe “sukha”nti vipallāso ca idha sukhato upagamanassa ṭhānanti adhippetanti dassento,
tika-s0203t:264_4: Diṭṭhiyā nibbānassa avisayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto evāti “kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahattha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:264_6: Svāyaṃ yesaṃ niccādito upagamanaṃ bhavati tesaṃyeva vasena kātabboti dassento “sabbavāresū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:264_10: Yasmā yaṃ yaṃ saṅkhāraṃ niccādivasena puthujjanakāle upagacchati,
tika-s0203t:264_11: taṃ taṃ ariyamaggādhigamena aniccādivasena gaṇhanto yāthāvato jānanto taṃ gāhaṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ viniveṭheti vissajjeti.
tika-s0203t:264_12: Tasmā yattha gāho tattha vissajjanāti catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārā idha saṅkhāraggahaṇena na gayhatīti attho.
tika-s0203t:265_3: so ca kho pariyāyato nippariyāyasiddhaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:265_5: Tathā ānantariyakammassa adhippetattā “manussabhūtova khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:265_6: “Aṭṭhānameta”ntiādinā mātuādīnaṃyeva jīvitā voropane ariyasāvakassa abhabbabhāvadassanato tadaññaṃ ariyasāvako
tika-s0203t:265_7: jīvitā voropetīti idaṃ atthato āpannamevāti maññamāno vadati –
tika-s0203t:265_12: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0203t:265_17: Ariyamaggenāgatasaddhādibalavasena hi ariyasāvako tādisaṃ sāvajjaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0203t:266_0: Pañcahi kāraṇehīti idaṃ atthanipphādakāni tesaṃ pubbabhāgiyāni ca kāraṇāni kāraṇabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:266_5: evaṃ bhinditabbānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attano vacanassa sāvanena viññāpanena.
tika-s0203t:266_7: Kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvāti etena “pākaṭaṃ katvā bhedakaravatthudīpanaṃ vohāro,
tika-s0203t:266_8: tattha attano nicchitamatthaṃ rahassavasena viññāpanaṃ anussāvana”nti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:267_0: Kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇanti tehi saṅghabhedasiddhito vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:269_0: Yasmā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva ca kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti,
tika-s0203t:269_2: evaṃ manussabhāve ṭhitasseva akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpattīti āha “manussabhūtassevā”ti.
tika-s0203t:269_3: Pākatikamanussānampi ca kusaladhammānaṃ visesappatti vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:269_4: Yathā vutto ca attho samānajātiyassa vikopane kammaṃ garutaraṃ,
tika-s0203t:269_7: Liṅge parivatte ca so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho,
tika-s0203t:269_17: kammaṃ pana garutaraṃ ānantariyasadisaṃ bhāyitabbanti āha –
tika-s0203t:270_3: vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ jīvitindriyañca ānantariyanānantariyabhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:271_2: Puthujjanasseva dinnaṃ hotīti yasmā yathā vadhakacittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇampi pabandhavicchedavasena ca jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati,
tika-s0203t:271_4: sā hi cajitabbavatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cajanamattameva hoti,
tika-s0203t:272_0: Lohitaṃ samo saratīti abhighātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:273_1: Bhedo ca hotīti saṅghassa bhedo hoti.
tika-s0203t:273_2: Vaṭṭatīti saññāyāti īdisakaraṇaṃ saṅghassa bhedāya na hotīti saññāya.
tika-s0203t:275_3: “āpāyikoti idaṃ suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0203t:275_5: Kappavināseyevāti pana āyukappavināseyevāti atthe sati natthi virodho.
tika-s0203t:275_6: Ettha ca saṇṭhahanteti idampi “svevavinassissatī”ti viya abhūtaparikappavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:275_7: Ekadivasameva niraye paccati tato paraṃ kappābhāve āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0203t:276_2: evaṃ sati kathaṃ nesaṃ ānantariyatā cutianantaraṃ vipākadānābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:276_3: Atha sati phaladāne cutianantaro eva etesaṃ phalakālo,
tika-s0203t:276_6: evampi niyataphalakālānaṃ aññesampi upapajjavedanīyānaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānañca niyatatā āpajjeyya.
tika-s0203t:276_7: Tasmā vipākadhammadhammānaṃ paccayantaravikalatādīhi avipaccamānānampi attano sabhāvena vipākadhammatā
tika-s0203t:276_8: viya balavatā ānantariyena vipāke dinne avipaccamānānampi ānantariyānaṃ phaladāne niyatasabhāvā ānantariyasabhāvā
tika-s0203t:276_9: ca pavattīti attano sabhāvena phaladānaniyameneva niyatatā ānantariyatā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:276_10: Avassañca ānantariyasabhāvā tato eva niyatasabhāvā ca tesaṃ pavattīti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ aññassa balavato
tika-s0203t:277_0: Nanu evaṃ aññesampi upapajjavedanīyānaṃ aññasmiṃ vipākadāyake asati cutianantaramekantena phaladānato
tika-s0203t:277_3: Asamānajātikena cetopaṇidhivasena upaghātakena ca nivattetabbavipākattā anantare ekantaphaladāyakattābhāvā.
tika-s0203t:277_4: Na pana ānantariyakānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ dutiyajjhānādīni viya asamānajātikaṃ phalanivattakaṃ atthi sabbānantariyānaṃ avīciphalattā.
tika-s0203t:277_5: Na ca heṭṭhūpapattiṃ icchato sīlavato cetopaṇidhi viya uparūpapattijanakakammaphalaṃ ānantariyaphalaṃ
tika-s0203t:277_6: nivattetuṃ samattho cetopaṇidhi atthi anicchantasseva avīcipātanato,
tika-s0203t:277_7: na ca ānantariyopaghātakaṃ kiñci kammaṃ atthi,
tika-s0203t:277_9: Anekāni ca ānantariyāni katāni ekanteneva vipāke niyatasabhāvattā uparatāvipaccanasabhāvāsaṅkattā nicchitāni sabhāvato niyatāneva.
tika-s0203t:277_10: Tesu pana samānasabhāvesu ekena vipāke dinne itarāni attanā kātabbakiccassa teneva katattā na dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ karonti.
tika-s0203t:277_11: Na samatthatāvighātattāti natthi tesaṃ ānantariyakatā nivatti;
tika-s0203t:277_12: garutarabhāvo pana tesu labbhatevāti saṅghabhedassa siyā garutarabhāvoti, “yena…pe…
tika-s0203t:277_14: Ekassa pana aññāni upatthambhakāni hontīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-s0203t:277_15: Paṭisandhivasena vipaccatīti vacanena itaresaṃ pavattivipākadāyitā anuññātā viya dissati.
tika-s0203t:277_16: No vā tathā sīlavatīti yathā pitā sīlavā,
tika-s0203t:277_17: tathā sīlavatī no vā hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:278_0: Pakatattoti anukkhitto. Samānasaṃvāsakoti apārājiko. Samānasīmāyanti ekasīmāyaṃ.
tika-s0203t:279_0: Satthukiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthoti yaṃ satthārā kātabbakiccaṃ anusāsanādi,
tika-s0203t:280_1: Abhijātiādisu pakappanena devatūpasaṅkamanādinā jātacakkavāḷena samānayogakkhemaṃ dasasahassaparimāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ jātikhettaṃ,
tika-s0203t:280_4: Dasasahassī lokadhātūti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā dasasahassī lokadhātu.
tika-s0203t:280_7: “Sabbesampi buddhānaṃ tattakaṃ eva jātikhettaṃ tannivāsīnaṃyeva ca devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo”ti ca vadanti.
tika-s0203t:280_8: Mātukucchiokkamanakālādīnaṃ channaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi tassa pakampanassa labbhamānato.
tika-s0203t:280_9: Āṇākhettaṃ nāma yaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṃvaṭṭati ca vivaṭṭati ca.
tika-s0203t:280_10: Āṇā vattati āṇāya tannivāsīnaṃ devatānaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanena,
tika-s0203t:280_13: adhippāyavasena pana “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vacanato tato parampi āṇā pavatteyya.
tika-s0203t:281_2: sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādiṃ imissaṃ lokadhātuyaṃ ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā,
tika-s0203t:281_4: atthetarahi aññe samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiyanti,
tika-s0203t:281_9: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakhettabhūtaṃ
tika-s0203t:281_10: imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:282_2: So pana kālo kathaṃ paricchinnoti carimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dhātuparinibbānāti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:282_4: Parinibbānato paṭṭhāyāti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0203t:282_5: Etthantareti carimabhave bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ dhātuparinibbānanti etesaṃ antare.
tika-s0203t:283_2: Paṭipattiantaradhānena hi sāsanassa osakkitattā aparassa buddhassa uppatti laddhāvasarā hoti.
tika-s0203t:283_4: “Pariyatti pamāṇa”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ bodhisattaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:284_2: tāya antarahitāya nidānuddesasaṅkhāte pātimokkhuddese pabbajjāyupasampadākammesu ca sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho.
tika-s0203t:284_3: Atha vā pātimokkhe dharanteyeva pabbajjā upasampadā ca,
tika-s0203t:284_4: evaṃ sati tadubhayaṃ pātimokkhe antogadhaṃ tadubhayābhāve pātimokkhābhāvato,
tika-s0203t:284_5: tasmā tayidaṃ tayaṃ sāsanassa ṭhitihetūti āha –
tika-s0203t:284_12: pacchimasīlato ca paraṃ paṭipattisāsanaṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0203t:284_13: Osakkitaṃ nāmāti pacchimakapaṭivedhasīlabhedadvayaṃ ekato katvā tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
tika-s0203t:285_1: pariyatti pana paṭipattihetukāti paṭipattiyā asati appatiṭṭhā hoti,
tika-s0203t:285_2: tasmā paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ sāsanosakkanassa visesakāraṇanti dassetvā tayidaṃ sāsanosakkanaṃ dhātuparinibbānosānanti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:286_1: Jambudīpe dīpantaresu devanāgabrahmalokesu ca vippakiritvā ṭhitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ mahābodhipallaṅke ekajjhaṃ sannipatanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:286_4: ekajālībhāvo cāti sabbametaṃ satthu adhiṭṭhānavaseneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:287_1: Buddhā nāma majjhe bhinnaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti tesaṃ desanāpi ekarasā evāti āha –
tika-s0203t:287_4: Vivādabhāvatoti etena vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve ekato na uppajjantīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:288_3: yena dutiyabuddhaguṇe dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:288_4: Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi guṇadhammānaṃ bhāriyo viseso na sakkā dhāretunti,
tika-s0203t:288_5: “na dhāreyyā”ti vatvā tameva adhāraṇaṃ pariyāyantarenapi pakāsento “caleyyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:288_14: Tathābhūtā ca katthaci na tiṭṭheyyāti āha “na ṭhānamupagaccheyyā”ti.
tika-s0203t:289_2: Tattha samupādikāti samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjati pavattatīti samupādikā,
tika-s0203t:290_2: Anonamitadaṇḍajātoti yāvadatthaṃ bhojanena onamituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya anonamitadaṇḍo viya jāto.
tika-s0203t:290_3: Sakiṃ bhutto vameyyāti ekampi ālopaṃ ajjhoharitvā vameyyāti attho.
tika-s0203t:291_0: Atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti dhammena nāma pathavī tiṭṭheyya.
tika-s0203t:291_1: Sā kiṃ teneva calati vinassatīti adhippāyena pucchati.
tika-s0203t:291_2: Puna thero “ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ abhimatañca lokena attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0203t:291_3: Evaṃdhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅginaṃ dhārento abhimato ca viññūnaṃ gambhīrappameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā
tika-s0203t:291_4: atibhārabhūto pathavīcalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotī”ti dassento, “idha, mahārāja,
tika-s0203t:291_6: Eteneva tathāgatassa mātukucchiokkamanādikāle pathavīkampanakāraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:292_0: Osāritanti uccāritaṃ, vuttanti attho. Aggoti sabbasattehi aggo.
tika-s0203t:293_1: Kāraṇamahantatāyāti mahantehi buddhakārakadhammehi pāramitāsaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:293_3: mahantā ca sakkabhāvādayo attano attano visaye ekekā eva,
tika-s0203t:293_8: Evaṃ “ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā ekova hotī”ti vadanto paracakkavāḷesu dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:294_0: Imināva padenāti “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti iminā eva padena.
tika-s0203t:294_3: “imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjantī”ti vutte imasmimpi cakkavāḷe jambudīpeyeva,
tika-s0203t:294_5: evaṃ “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti jātikhette adhippetepi imināva cakkavāḷena paricchindituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0203t:295_3: Ekasmiṃ dīpetiādinā dīpantarepi ekajjhaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-s0203t:295_5: So parihāyethāti cakkavāḷassa padese eva vattitabbattā parihāyeyya.
tika-s0203t:296_13: vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāya vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:297_2: dutiyapakati ca nāma paṭhamapakatito nihīnā eva.
tika-s0203t:298_0: Idha purisassa tattha nibbattanatoti imasmiṃ manussaloke purisabhūtassa tattha brahmaloke brahmattabhāvena nibbattanato.
tika-s0203t:298_1: Tena asatipi purisaliṅge purisākārā brahmāno hontīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:298_5: Yadi evaṃ itthiyo brahmaloke na uppajjantīti āha “brahmatta”ntiādi.
tika-s0203t:299_11: kamme pana vipaccituṃ āraddhe vipākappavattivasena vipākasamaṅgitā.
tika-s0203t:299_13: Kusalākusalakammāyūhanakkhaṇeti kusalakammassa ca akusalakammassa ca samīhanakkhaṇe.
tika-s0203t:299_20: Ekena hi kammunā tajje nimitte upaṭṭhāpite paccayavisesavasena tato aññena kammunā aññassa nimittassa upaṭṭhānaṃ parivattanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:300_2: Āyūhanacetanākammasamaṅgitāvasenāti kāyaduccaritassa aparāparaṃ āyūhanena sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tasseva
tika-s0203t:300_3: pakappane kammakkhayakarañāṇena akhepitattā yathūpacitakammunā ca samaṅgibhāvassa vasena.
tika-s0203t:301_1: Evaṃ sassirikanti vuttappakārena anekadhātuvibhajanādinā nānānayavicittatāya paramanipuṇagambhīratāya ca atthato byañjanato ca sasobhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:302_6: Dhammo ca so pariyattibhāvato yathāvuttenatthena ādāsoti dhammādāso.
tika-s0203t:302_8: Yathā hi ādāsena sattānaṃ mukhe maladosaharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:302_9: evaṃ imināpi suttena yogīnaṃ mukhe maladosaharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:302_10: Tasmāti yasmā iminā suttena kilese madditvā samathādhigamena yogino jayappattā;
tika-s0203t:306_0: Samuṭṭhānaṃ tāva suttassa kathetvā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:306_1: Na pabbatehi atthoti na bhagavato pabbatehi kathitehi attho atthi.
tika-s0203t:307_2: Dvedhā katvāti pabbatassa abbhantare maṇḍapasaṅkhepena leṇaṃ nimminitvā dvedhā katvā tadā te tattha vasiṃsu.
tika-s0203t:308_0: Vasitakālañca kathento tesaṃ mātuyā yāva tatiyabhavato paṭṭhāya samudāgamaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:308_2: Patthesīti tassā kira khettakuṭiyā vīhayo bhajjantiyā tattha mahākarañjapupphappamāṇā mahantā manoharā pañcasatamattā lājā jāyiṃsu.
tika-s0203t:308_3: Sā tā gahetvā mahante paduminipatte ṭhapesi.
tika-s0203t:308_4: Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekabuddho tassā anuggahatthaṃ avidūre khettapāḷiyā gacchati.
tika-s0203t:308_5: Sā taṃ disvā pasannamānasā supupphitaṃ mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “imassa, bhante,
tika-s0203t:308_6: puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāvasampanne pañcasataputte labheyya”nti pañca puttasatāni patthesi.
tika-s0203t:308_7: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇeti yadā sā yathāvuttaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi;
tika-s0203t:308_8: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā sambhatasambhārā paripakkapaccekabodhiñāṇā tasseva paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā,
tika-s0203t:308_10: Atītāsu anekajātīsu tassā puttabhāvena āgatattā tathā tesaṃ ahosīti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:309_0: Gabbhamalaṃ nissāyāti bahi nikkhantaṃ gabbhamalaṃ nissayaṃ katvā saṃsedajabhāvena nibbattā.
tika-s0203t:309_6: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti sesalakkhaṇāni suviññeyyāneva honti.
tika-s0203t:309_7: Paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattayiṃsūti dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca paccekabodhipāramitāya parinipphannattā
tika-s0203t:309_8: ñāṇassa paripākattā vuttanayena sayameva vipassanaṃ pavattetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ adhigacchiṃsu.
tika-s0203t:309_9: Sabbepi te taṃyeva gāthaṃ abhāsiṃsūti āha –
tika-s0203t:310_2: Khuddakamahantakamaladalasaṅkhātāni vā padumapalāsapattāni ettha santīti padumapalāsapattaṃ,
tika-s0203t:310_7: Aniccatāyupagatanti khaṇe khaṇe vaṇṇabhedādivasena aniccatāya upagataṃ.
tika-s0203t:310_9: Eko careti tasmā aññopi mādiso hotukāmo evaṃ paṭipajjitvā eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
tika-s0203t:312_0: Etesaṃ ekanāmakāyevāti etesaṃ āgatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā aññe paccekabuddhā samānanāmakā eva.
tika-s0203t:312_2: Visuṃ visuṃ avatvāti paccekaṃ sarūpato avatvā.
tika-s0203t:315_3: Sā pana niddosatā lokuttarabhāvena savisesāti āha “lokuttara”nti.
tika-s0203t:315_4: Sammā sundaro pasattho niyyāniko samādhi sammāsamādhīti āha –
tika-s0203t:316_1: Purecārikāti vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvanā sahajātādipaccayavasena paccayattā purassarā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:316_5: Tattha parivīmaṃsaggahaṇaṃ tattha tattha cittuppāde vīmaṃsādhipateyyena pavattiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā pubbaṅgamabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:316_8: Bhūmiladdhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ samugghāṭayamānāti attano santāne dīgharattaṃ anusayitaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ samucchindanti.
tika-s0203t:316_10: Vūpasamayamānāti vā tato eva avasiṭṭhampi vaṭṭaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena vūpasamenti.
tika-s0203t:316_16: Idha adhippetā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya kiccassa dassitattā.
tika-s0203t:317_0: Lakkhaṇe paṭivijjhamāne lakkhaṇiko dhammo paṭividdho hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:317_8: Evaṃ pajānanāti micchādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti yāthāvato avabodho.
tika-s0203t:318_5: Puññassa eko bhāgo so eva puññabhāgiko, ka-
tika-s0203t:319_6: Maggabhāvena niyyānabhāvena pavattiyā maggapaññāya aṭṭhannampi sādhāraṇattā samudāyassa ca avayavo aṅganti
tika-s0203t:319_7: katvā sesadhamme aṅgikabhāvena dassento “ariyamaggassa aṅga”nti āha.
tika-s0203t:319_8: So bhikkhūti micchādiṭṭhiṃ “micchādiṭṭhī”ti sammādiṭṭhiṃ “sammādiṭṭhī”ti jānanto bhikkhu.
tika-s0203t:319_13: taṃ panassa saraṇaṃ satisamaṅgitāyāti āha “satiyā samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0203t:319_14: Kāmañcettha vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ yathābhūtā sammāvāyāmasatiyo sahajātā ca purejātā ca hutvā parivārenti,
tika-s0203t:319_15: “itiyime tayo dhammā sammādiṭṭhiṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattantī”ti pana vacanato,
tika-s0203t:319_16: “ettha hī”tiādinā maggasammādiṭṭhiyā eva sesadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ sahacaraṇabhāvena parivāraṇaṃ yojitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:319_18: saddena sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ gahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ parivārabhāvena gahitattā.
tika-s0203t:319_19: Na hi sakkā te eva parivāre parivāravante ca katvā vattuṃ saṅkarato sammohajananato ca.
tika-s0203t:319_20: Tayoti sammādiṭṭhivāyāmasatiyo sahajātaparivārāva honti maggakkhaṇikānaṃ tesaṃ adhippetattā vipassanākhaṇaviratīnaṃ asambhavato.
tika-s0203t:320_2: “Evañcevañca bhavitabba”nti vividhaṃ takkanaṃ kūpe viya udakassa ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkanaṃ vitakko.
tika-s0203t:320_3: Saṅkappanavasenāti taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kappanavasena.
tika-s0203t:320_5: Ekaggoti iminā samādhinā laddhupakārasseva vitakkassa appanāpariyāyo hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:320_6: Visesena vā appanā vitakkassa vasena cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhiropeti,
tika-s0203t:320_11: vitakko pana pavattamāno ārammaṇābhiniropanavaseneva pavattatīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:320_12: Evaṃ santepi sabhāvāvitakkacittuppādato savitakkacittuppādassa ārammaṇaggahaṇaviseso vitakkena jātoti
tika-s0203t:320_13: katvā vitakko cittassa ārammaṇaggahaṇe visesapaccayoti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-s0203t:320_16: taṃsambandhīnaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati,
tika-s0203t:320_17: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati vitakkassa ārammaṇābhiniropanasabhāvattā,
tika-s0203t:321_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti?
tika-s0203t:321_2: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
tika-s0203t:321_3: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-s0203t:321_5: Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ;
tika-s0203t:321_6: tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva;
tika-s0203t:321_7: yathā ñāṇasahagataṃ cittaṃ sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati;
tika-s0203t:321_8: yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati,
tika-s0203t:322_5: “Lokuttarasammāsaṅkappaṃ parivārentī”ti vatvā tividhe sammāsaṅkappe kadāci katamaṃ parivārentīti?
tika-s0203t:322_9: Tīṇi nāmāni labhati tividhassapi paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena sātisayaṃ tiṇṇampi kiccakaraṇato.
tika-s0203t:323_2: Sā musāvādato viramaṇassa kāraṇabhāvato cetanāpi verassa maṇanato vināsanato viratipīti āha –
tika-s0203t:323_5: Vinā tehi ramatīti accantameva tehi vinā bhavati.
tika-s0203t:324_4: Etāya kuhanāya karaṇabhūtāya paccayuppādanatthaṃ nimittaṃ sīlaṃ etesanti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:324_5: Attavisayalābhahetu akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādivasena pisanaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃ viheṭhanaṃ nippeso.
tika-s0203t:324_7: tato laddhaṃ parassa datvā evaṃ lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīṃsatīti lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīṃsanā.
tika-s0203t:324_11: “ājīvo kuppamāno kāyavacīdvāresu eva kuppatī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:325_1: Sammā pasatthā sobhanā niyyānikā diṭṭhi etassāti sammādiṭṭhi, puggalo.
tika-s0203t:325_2: Tassa pana yasmā sammādiṭṭhi saccābhisamayassa nibbānasacchikiriyāya avassayo,
tika-s0203t:325_5: Pahoti bhavati tāya saheva uppajjati pavattati.
tika-s0203t:325_7: tañca kho maggasamādhimhi ṭhite eva hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ āha –
tika-s0203t:325_15: tassa ca maggaphalasammāsamādhipavattiyā pahoti sammāñāṇassa sammāvimuttiyā pahotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:325_18: Tampi akuppabhāvatāya accantasamādhibhāvato kiccanipphattiyā pavattatevāti vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-s0203t:325_21: Sammāñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ katvāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sammāñāṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:325_22: Phalaṃ kātunti phaladhammasahacaritatāya vipākasabhāvatāya ca “phala”nti laddhanāme phalasampayuttadhamme sammāvimuttiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:325_23: Tathā ca vuttaṃ sallekhasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “phalasampayuttāni pana sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni ṭhapetvā sesadhammā sammāvimuttīti veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0203t:326_5: micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī”ti iminā vārena sāmaññaphalaṃ kathitanti vadanti,
tika-s0203t:326_10: Dassanaṭṭhenāti pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0203t:327_1: Mahāvipākadānenāti mahato vipulassa lokuttarassa sukhavipākassa ceva kāyikādidukkhavipākassa ca dānena.
tika-s0203t:328_2: “imasmiñca pana sutte pañca sammādiṭṭhiyo kathitā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:328_5: Ettha ca “natthi dinna”ntiādinā vatthubhedena dasa micchādiṭṭhidhammā kathitā,
tika-s0203t:328_11: tappaṭipakkhabhūtā “micchādiṭṭhissa micchāsaṅkappo pahotī”tiādinā atthato dasa micchattadhammāti vīsati,
tika-s0203t:328_14: Evamete dve cattārīsakāni purimena saddhiṃ tayo cattārīsakā vibhāvitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:329_1: Pasaṃsiyassa ujuvipaccanīkaṃ nindiyaṃ pasaṃsantopi atthato pasaṃsiyaṃ nindanto nāma hoti.
tika-s0203t:329_2: Pasaṃsiyassa guṇaparidhaṃsanamukheneva hi nindiyassa pasaṃsāya pavattanatoti āha –
tika-s0203t:329_4: Evamādīti ādisaddena “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”ti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti;
tika-s0203t:329_5: tasmā evaṃvādinoti evaṃ hetu paṭikkhepavādinoti attho.
tika-s0203t:329_8: taṃ cūḷapuṇṇamasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayameva tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:330_0: Attano nindābhayenāti “sammādiṭṭhiñca nāmete garahantī”ādinā upari parehi vattabbanindābhayena.
tika-s0203t:330_2: Sahadhammena parena attano upari kātabbaniggaho upārambho,
tika-s0203t:330_4: taṃ pana atthato upavādabhayaṃ hotīti āha “upavādabhayenā”ti.
tika-s0203t:333_2: “Aparaṃ visesa”nti vuttattā visesavisayo ca pubbasaddoti āha –
tika-s0203t:334_8: Tadā kira kumudāni supupphitāni honti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:335_2: Bhikkhū idha osarissanti vutthavassā pavāritapavāraṇā “bhagavantaṃ vandissāma,
tika-s0203t:337_2: Na hi kevalāya aniccānupassanāya vipassanākiccaṃ samijjhati.
tika-s0203t:337_3: Bahū bhikkhū te ca vitthārarucikāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:339_3: Vatthunti sukhādīnaṃ vedanānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vediyati,
tika-s0203t:339_4: vedanāya ekantabhāvadassanena tassa vedanānupassanābhāvo yujjati evāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:340_2: Sappītike dve jhāneti pītisahagatāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati.
tika-s0203t:340_5: Ārammaṇato ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-s0203t:340_6: Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃviditova hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā;
tika-s0203t:340_7: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā.
tika-s0203t:340_9: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhāti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena.
tika-s0203t:340_10: Yañhi pītiyā visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:340_11: tasmiṃ vidite sā yāthāvato viditā hoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:341_2: Tattha dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena.
tika-s0203t:341_3: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ avikkhepoti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
tika-s0203t:341_4: Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
tika-s0203t:341_5: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva honti.
tika-s0203t:341_6: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tasmiṃ ārammaṇe upaṭṭhite ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā eva nāma hoti.
tika-s0203t:341_7: Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
tika-s0203t:342_0: Evaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge vuttamatthaṃ imasmiṃ sutte yojetvā dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:342_2: Imināpi yoginā manasikārena paṭilabhitabbato paṭilābhoti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:343_0: Assāsapassāsanimittanti assāsapassāse nissāya paṭiladdhapaṭibhāganimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kiñcāpi karoti;
tika-s0203t:343_1: satiñca sampajaññañca upaṭṭhapetvā pavattanato ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā citte cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti.
tika-s0203t:343_2: Evaṃ cittānupassanāpi satisampajaññabaleneva hotīti āha “na hī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:343_11: Sahajātānaṃ ajjhupekkhanā hotīti paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāpārassa anāpajjitattā ārammaṇānaṃ ajjhupekkhanā,
tika-s0203t:343_12: “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ pajahati upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti,
tika-s0203t:343_14: Kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammeti nīvaraṇādidhamme eva pahīne disvā,
tika-s0203t:343_15: atha kho tesaṃ pajahanañāṇampi yāthāvato paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
tika-s0203t:344_4: Sahajātadhammānaṃ ekasabhāvena pavattiyā sahajātaajjhupekkhanāya ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
tika-s0203t:345_6: Idāni yatheva hītiādinā tameva majjhattākāraṃ upamāya vibhāveti.
tika-s0203t:345_10: Ekacittakkhaṇikāti ekekasmiṃ citte vipassanāvasena saha uppajjanakā.
tika-s0203t:346_1: Vuttatthāneva sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ ānāpānārammaṇā aparāparaṃ pavattasatiyo ārammaṇasīsena tadārammaṇā dhammā gahitā,
tika-s0203t:346_3: tā vaḍḍhamānā lokiyaṃ catubbidhampi satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūrenti.
tika-s0203t:346_4: Vijjāvimuttiphalanibbānanti vimuttīnaṃ phalabhūtaṃ tehiyeva veditabbaṃ kilesanibbānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:346_5: amatamahānibbānameva vijjāvimuttīnaṃ adhigamena adhigantabbatāya tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:346_7: Idha sutte lokiyāpi bojjhaṅgā kathitā lokuttarāpīti ettakaṃ gahetvā,
tika-s0203t:346_8: “iti lokiyassa āgataṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ kathita”nti ca atthavaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:346_10: Aññattha evaṃ hotīti aññasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ tattha tattha vomissakanayena āgatasutte evaṃ lokiyaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-s0203t:346_12: Lokuttaraṃ upari āgatanti vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentīti evaṃ lokuttaraṃ upari desanāyaṃ āgataṃ;
tika-s0203t:346_13: tasmā lokiyā eva bojjhaṅgā vijjāvimutti paripūrikā kathetabbā lokuttarānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ vijjāgahaṇena gahitattā,
tika-s0203t:349_2: gehe sitā ārabbha pavattiyā allīnāti gehassitā.
tika-s0203t:349_8: Tañhi dhammavasena upaṭṭhitāya bhāvanāya gocarabhāvato “gocarajjhatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:349_11: Satisīsena taṃsahagate bhāvanādhamme vadati assāsapassāsakāyādike taṃtaṃkoṭṭhāse samathavatthubhāvena pariggahetvā satiyā pariggahitattā;
tika-s0203t:349_12: tathāpariggahite vā te ārabbha aniccādimanasikāravasena pavattā kāyārammaṇā satī satibhāvena vatvā ekajjhaṃ dassento “kāyapariggāhika”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0203t:350_2: cuṇṇakajātāni aṭṭhikāni pariyosānaṃ katvā kāyānupassanā niddiṭṭhā,
tika-s0203t:350_3: idha pana kesādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇavasena nibbattitānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena uparidesanāya vaḍḍhitattā aṭṭhārasavidhena kāyagatāsatibhāvanā.
tika-s0203t:351_8: Vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantīti vijjāsabhāgatāya tadekadese vijjākoṭṭhāse vattanti.
tika-s0203t:351_10: Nanu cettha vijjānaṃ vijjābhāgiyatā na sambhavatīti?
tika-s0203t:351_15: sesā vijjābhāgiyāti aṭṭhasu vijjāsu ekaṃ “vijjā”ti gahetvā itarā tassā bhāgatāya “vijjābhāgiyā”ti veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:351_16: Saddhiṃ pavattanasabhāvāsu ayameva vijjāti vattabbāti niyamassa abhāvato vijjābhāgo viya vijjābhāgiyāpi pavattati evāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:351_17: Āpopharaṇanti paṭibhāganimittabhūtena āpokasiṇena sabbaso mahāsamuddapharaṇaṃ āpopharaṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0203t:351_20: Ubhayasmimpi pakkhe samuddaṅgamānaṃ kunnadīnaṃ samuddantogadhattā tesaṃ cetasā phuṭatā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:351_21: Kunnadiggahaṇañcettha kañcimeva kālaṃ sanditvā tāsaṃ udakassa samuddapariyāpannabhāvūpagamanattā,
tika-s0203t:352_1: taṃ pana vivaraṃ chiddanti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:354_0: Yuttayānaṃ viya katāya icchiticchite kāle sukhena paccavekkhitabbattā.
tika-s0203t:357_6: Tena satto jīvo uppajjatīti micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0203t:357_7: Evaṃ uppajjanakadhammavasena uppattiṃ dassetvā idāni uppattijanakadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:357_16: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro panettha sarūpena anāgatopi puññābhisaṅkhāraggahaṇeneva gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:358_2: Bhavūpapattihetubhūtā okappanīyasaddhā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ tādisaṃ buddhavacanabāhusaccaṃ āmisapariccāgo
tika-s0203t:358_3: kammassakatāñāṇaṃ kammaphaladiṭṭhi ca ime saddhādayo veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:358_10: Saddhādayovāti yathāvuttā saddhādayo eva pañca dhammā upapattiyā saṅkharaṇaṭṭhena saṅkhārā,
tika-s0203t:358_11: tasmā eva aññehi visiṭṭhabhavūpaharaṇaṭṭhena vihārā nāmāti.
tika-s0203t:359_0: Pañcadhammāva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo upapattiṃ maggati gavesati etenāti maggo.
tika-s0203t:359_4: Upapattipakappanavaseneva pavattiyā patthanāgahaṇeneva tassā gahaṇanti keci.
tika-s0203t:359_8: tassā pana kiccakaraṇā saddhādayo patthanā cāti ime dhammā sahakārino bhavūpapattiyā niyāmakā hontīti
tika-s0203t:359_11: Tena saddhā patthanā cāti ubhaye dhammā sahitā hutvā kammaṃ visesentā gatiṃ niyamentīti dasseti,
tika-s0203t:359_12: paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ aniyataṃ kevalassa kammassa vasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:359_14: kammāyūhanato pana pageva patthanaṃ ṭhapetumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-s0203t:359_17: kammaṃ katvā yadā kadāci patthanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca idaṃ cārittadassanaṃ viya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:359_18: Yathā hi bhavapatthanā yāva maggena na samucchijjati,
tika-s0203t:360_1: Sabbasovāti “idaṃ kāḷakaṃ sāmaṃ setaṃ haritaṃ maṇḍalaṃ aparimaṇḍalaṃ caturaṃsaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ khuddakaṃ mahanta”ntiādinā sabbasova pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:362_1: Lokadhātūnaṃ satasahassaṃ attano vase vattanato satasahasso.
tika-s0203t:362_2: Tassa pana tattha obhāsakaraṇaṃ pākaṭanti āha “ālokapharaṇabrahmā”ti.
tika-s0203t:362_10: Vaṇṇavantaṃ pana na hoti avipulatāya uḷāraṃ hutvā anupaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0203t:362_18: tambamattikalepaṃ katvā dhotañceva pāsāṇādinā ghaṭṭitañca eḷakalomādinā pamajjitañcāti attho.
tika-s0203t:363_4: tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ phusatīti dibbacakkhupharaṇe dassite ālokapharaṇaṃ dassitamevāti attho.
tika-s0203t:364_0: Kasiṇapharaṇaṃ viyāti kasiṇobhāsena pharaṇaṃ viya dissati upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0203t:364_1: maṇipabhāpharaṇassa viya brahmaloke dhātupharaṇassa dassitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:364_4: Aṭṭhakathā nāma natthīti pāḷipadassa atthavaṇṇanāya nāma nicchitāya bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0203t:364_5: avinicchitāya pana natthi viyāti akathanaṃ nāma aṭṭhakathāya anāciṇṇanti tassa vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā.
tika-s0203t:364_8: Buddhānaṃ byāmappabhā byāmappadese sabbakālaṃ adhiṭṭhāti viya tassa brahmuno sarīrapharaṇaṃ sarīrābhāya pattharaṇaṃ sabbakālikaṃ.
tika-s0203t:364_9: Cattārimāni itarāni pharaṇāni avināsetvā aññamaññamabhinditvā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:365_3: Ābhāti dutiyajjhānabhūmike deve ekajjhaṃ gahetvā sādhāraṇato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:365_6: Sādhāraṇato katāyapi patthanāya jhānaṅgaṃ parittaṃ bhāvitañce,
tika-s0203t:366_0: Kāmāvacaresu nibbattatūtiādinā saddhādīnaṃ ajjhānavipassanānaṃ kathaṃ tadadhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āsaṅkati.
tika-s0203t:366_1: Itaro saddhādīnaṃ ajjhānasabhāvattepi jhānavipassanānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nissayapaccayādivasena sappaccayattā
tika-s0203t:366_5: Anāgāmī samucchinnaorambhāgiyasaṃyojano samāno sace sabbaso upapattiyo atikkamituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0203t:366_10: Āsavakkhayanti sabbaso āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pahānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0203t:371_1: Kālaparicchedaṃ katvāti samāpajjantehi nāma kālaparicchedo kātabbo.
tika-s0203t:371_2: Thero pana bhagavato vattakaraṇatthaṃ kālaparicchedaṃ karoti,
tika-s0203t:371_3: “ettake kāle vītivatte idaṃ nāma bhagavato kātabba”nti.
tika-s0203t:371_9: Suññatoti attasuññato ca niccasuññato ca saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-s0203t:371_11: tasmā so thero suññatākathaṃ sotukāmo jāto.
tika-s0203t:371_12: Dhurena dhuraṃ paharantena viyāti rathadhurena rathadhuraṃ paharantena viya katvā ujukameva suññatā…pe…
tika-s0203t:372_0: Pubbepāhantiādinā bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyampi attano suññatāvihārabāhullaṃ pakāsetīti dassento “paṭhamabodhiyampī”ti āha.
tika-s0203t:372_2: Sotunti aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā sotumpi.
tika-s0203t:372_3: Uggahetumpiti yathābhūtaṃ dhammaṃ dhāraṇaparipucchāparicayavasena hadayena uggahitaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya avinaṭṭhe kātumpi.
tika-s0203t:372_6: Kaṭṭharūpapotthakarūpacittarūpavasena katāti thambhādīsu uttiritvā katānaṃ kaṭṭharūpānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:372_8: sittipasse cittakammavasena viracitānaṃ cittarūpānañca katā niṭṭhapitā.
tika-s0203t:372_12: Jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇatthanti jiṇṇānaṃ niyyūhakūṭāgārapāsādāvayavānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇatthāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne rahassasaññāṇena ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:373_3: Gāmoti pavattanavasenāti gehasannivesavīthicaccarasiṅghāṭakādike upādāya gāmoti lokuppattivasena.
tika-s0203t:373_5: Eseva nayoti iminā “pavattavasena vā kilesavasena vā uppannaṃ manussasañña”nti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0203t:373_6: Ettha ca yathā gāmaggahaṇena gharādisaññā saṅgahitā,
tika-s0203t:373_8: Yasmā rukkhādike paṭicca araññasaññā tattha pabbatavanasaṇḍādayo antogadhā,
tika-s0203t:373_9: tasmā tattha vijjamānampi taṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā ekaṃ araññaṃyeva paṭicca araññasaññaṃ manasi karoti.
tika-s0203t:373_12: Pavattadarathāti tathārūpāya passaddhiyā abhāvato oḷārikadhammappavattisiddhā darathā.
tika-s0203t:373_14: Dutiyapadeti “ye assu darathā manussasaññaṃ paṭiccā”ti imasmiṃ pade.
tika-s0203t:373_17: dhammappavattī”ti saṅkhāradassanadarathānaṃ sukhumatā sallahukatā ca caritatthāti āha “pavattadarathamattā atthī”ti.
tika-s0203t:374_1: taṃ imissā darathasaññāya na hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:375_1: Assāti bhagavato evaṃ idāni vuccamānākārena cittappavatti ahosi.
tika-s0203t:375_6: Idāni tamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:375_7: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ vapite sāliādayo sampajjanti.
tika-s0203t:375_9: Paṭiccāti ettha “sambhūta”nti vacanaseso icchitoti āha “paṭicca sambhūta”nti.
tika-s0203t:376_4: Suṭṭhu vihatanti yathā valīnaṃ lesopi na hoti,
tika-s0203t:377_1: Satipi saṅkhāranimittavirahe yādisānaṃ nimittānaṃ abhāvena “animitta”nti vuccati,
tika-s0203t:378_4: Upādisesadarathadassanatthanti sabbaso kilesupadhiyā pahīnāya khandhopadhi avisiṭṭhā,
tika-s0203t:378_13: Pathavīsaññādinivattane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā suttantaresu ca vuttameva.
tika-s0203t:378_15: Niccasārādīnaṃ sabbaso avatthutāya accantameva suññattā accantasuññatā.
tika-s0203t:379_2: suññatānupassanāya vasena samāpajjitabbattā ca suññataphalasamāpattinti laddhanāmaṃ arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ.
tika-s0203t:379_5: idāni pana buddhasāsanassa dharamānattā paccekabuddhā na vattanti,
tika-s0203t:379_8: Na hi buddhasāsane dharante paccekabuddhā bhavanti.
tika-s0203t:383_2: Tattha vitakko pubbabhāgo etissāti vitakkapubbabhāgā, pucchā.
tika-s0203t:383_4: vitakko pana “sambahulā nu kho idha bhikkhū viharantī”ti iminā ākārena tadā bhagavato uppanno cittasaṅkappo,
tika-s0203t:383_10: “sambahulā no ettha bhikkhū viharantī”ti pucchāvasena bhagavatā vutto,
tika-s0203t:383_12: bhikkhu sobhati saṅgaṇikārāmo”tiādi uparidesanāvasena matthakaṃ gacchante avinicchito nāma na hoti,
tika-s0203t:383_13: atha kho visuṃ vinicchito eva hoti,
tika-s0203t:384_5: Kuruvindādinhānīyacuṇṇāni saṇhasukhumabhāvato nāḷiyaṃ pakkhittāni nirantarāneva tiṭṭhantīti āha –
tika-s0203t:384_7: Sattapaṇṇāsa kulasatasahassānīti sattasatasahassādhikāni paññāsa kulānaṃyeva satasahassāni,
tika-s0203t:384_8: manussānaṃ pana vasena satta koṭiyo tadā tattha vasiṃsu.
tika-s0203t:385_2: mayhaṃ pana sāsane ayuttova soti āha –
tika-s0203t:385_6: Na kho panetaṃ sakkā gilānupaṭṭhānaovādānusāsaniādivasena samāgamassa icchitabbattā.
tika-s0203t:386_1: Kataparibhaṇḍanti pubbe katasaṃvidhānassa cīvarassa vuttākārena paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:388_0: Sāmāyikanti samaye kilesavimuccanaṃ accantamevāti sāmāyikaṃ ma- kāre a-
tika-s0203t:388_3: Kantanti aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya ca kamanīyaṃ manorammaṃ.
tika-s0203t:389_0: Ettāvatātiādinā saṅgaṇikārāmassa visesādhigamassa antarāyikabhāvaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca saha nidassanena dasseti.
tika-s0203t:389_1: Tattha sā duvidhā antarāyikatā vodānadhammānaṃ anuppattihetukā,
tika-s0203t:390_2: “Aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ
tika-s0203t:390_3: gacchatī”tiādīsu viya idha rūpasaddo karajakāyapariyāyoti “rūpanti sarīra”nti āha. “Nāhaṃ,
tika-s0203t:390_6: Nanu kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhacittānaṃ āraddhavipassakānampi asappāyavajjanasappāyasevanavasena kāyassa pariharaṇaṃ hotīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0203t:390_7: taṃ pana yo kallasarīraṃ nissāya dhammasādhanāya anuyuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-s0203t:390_9: Dhammasādhanabhāvañhi apekkhitvā asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyavasena posetvā suṭṭhutaraṃ hutvā anuyuñjanato kāyassa pariharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:390_10: na so kāye abhirato nāma hoti paccavekkhaṇāyattattā apekkhāya vinoditabbo tādisoti.
tika-s0203t:391_1: Mahākaruṇāvasena parivutāya parisāya majjhe nisinnopi ekantavivekajjhāsayattā ekakova.
tika-s0203t:391_2: Etena satthuno pavivittassa pavivekattena vivittataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:391_4: Ativiya santatarapaṇītatamabhāvena visesato sinoti bandhatīti visayo,
tika-s0203t:391_8: Upadhivivekatāya asaṅkhatā dhātu idha vivekoti adhippetoti āha –
tika-s0203t:391_10: Bhaṅgamattampi asesetvā āsavaṭṭhāniyānañca dhammānaṃ tattha vigatattā tesaṃ vasena vigatantena,
tika-s0203t:391_11: evaṃbhūtaṃ tesaṃ byantibhāvaṃ pattanti pāḷiyaṃ “byantibhūtenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:392_0: Telapākaṃ gaṇhanto viyāti yathā telapāko nāma paricchinnakālo na atikkamitabbo,
tika-s0203t:392_2: Yathā hi kusalo vejjo telaṃ pacanto taṃ taṃ telakiccaṃ cintetvā yadi vā patthinnapāko,
tika-s0203t:392_6: evaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desento veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ upadhāretvā taṃ taṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā dhammaṃ
tika-s0203t:392_7: desetvā parisaṃ uyyojento ca vivekaninneneva cittena uyyojeti.
tika-s0203t:392_9: Buddhānañhi saṅkhārānaṃ suṭṭhu pariññātatāya paṇītānampi rūpādīnaṃ āpāthagamane pageva itaresaṃ paṭikūlatāva supākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0203t:392_10: tasmā ghammābhitattassa viya sītajalaṭṭhānaninnatā nibbānaninnameva cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0203t:393_6: Asampajjanabhāvajānanenāti idāni me kammaṭṭhānaṃ vīthipaṭipannaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0203t:394_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavatā vipassanāya eva pādake jhāne avatvā pādakajjhānaṃ gahitanti āha –
tika-s0203t:394_3: So pana “ajjhattadhammā mayhaṃ nijjaṭā nigumbā hutvā na upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0203t:394_4: handāhaṃ bahiddhādhamme manasi kareyyaṃ ekaccesu saṅkhāresu upaṭṭhitesu itarepi upaṭṭhaheyyumevā”ti parassa…pe…
tika-s0203t:394_6: Pādakajjhānavasena viya sammasitajjhānavasenapi ubhatobhāgavimutto hotiyevāti āha –
tika-s0203t:394_7: “arūpasamāpattiyaṃ nu kho kathanti āneñjaṃ manasi karotī”ti.
tika-s0203t:394_8: Na me cittaṃ pakkhandatīti mayhaṃ vipassanācittaṃ vīthipaṭipannaṃ hutvā na vahatīti.
tika-s0203t:394_10: Punappunaṃ manasi kātabbanti punappunaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ vipassanāya tikkhavisadatāpādanāya.
tika-s0203t:395_1: Sampajjati meti vīthipaṭipattiyā pubbenāparaṃ visesābhāvato sampajjati me kammaṭṭhānanti jānanena.
tika-s0203t:395_3: evaṃ attano balānurūpaṃ tassa kālaṃ netvā pamāṇameva pavattanena iriyāpathaṃ ahopetvā.
tika-s0203t:395_5: Kathāvāresu pana visesaṃ tattha tattha vadanti.
tika-s0203t:396_4: Kismiñcideva kilesuppattikāraṇeti tassa puggalassa kilesuppattikāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:396_11: kārassa ca akāro katoti āha “evaṃ sante etanti.
tika-s0203t:397_1: Anusayoti mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti tividhopi anusayo pahīyati arahattamaggena.
tika-s0203t:398_3: Taṃ pana nesaṃ kusalāyatikattaṃ upanissayavasena hoti sahajātavasenapīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:399_4: Tena lokiyadhammesu uttamabhāvena jhānādayo lokuttarā vuttā,
tika-s0203t:399_6: Yaṃ kiñci mahaggatacittaṃ mārassa avisayo akāmāvacarattā,
tika-s0203t:399_7: pageva taṃ vipassanāya pādakabhūtaṃ suvikkhālitamalanti āha –
tika-s0203t:400_5: asappāyakathāvajjanapubbikāya sappāya kathāya vasena āgatattā “sappāyāsappāyavasena āgatānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:400_6: Sutapariyattivasenāti sarūpena tattha anāgatānipi dasakathāvatthūni suttageyyādiantogadhattā,
tika-s0203t:400_8: Paripūraṇavasena sarūpato āgatattā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā kathetabbāni.
tika-s0203t:401_4: Taṇhāya patthanā nāma tenākārena pavattīti āha –
tika-s0203t:401_10: brahmacariyassa upaddavo brahmacārupaddavoti imamatthaṃ “sesupaddavesupi eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
tika-s0203t:402_1: Evaṃ vuttoti yathāvuttabrahmacārupaddavo dukkhavipākataro ceva kaṭukavipākataro cāti evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0203t:402_4: Durakkhāte hi dhammavinaye duppaṭipatti na mahāsāvajjā micchābhinivesassa sithilavāyāmabhāvato;
tika-s0203t:402_5: svākhyāte pana dhammavinaye duppaṭipatti mahāsāvajjā mahato atthassa bāhirabhāvakaraṇato.
tika-s0203t:403_1: Tasmāti idaṃ pubbaparāpekkhaṃ purimassa ca atthassa kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasananti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:404_0: Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattampīti iminā pageva itaraṃ vītikkamantoti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:404_4: Nāhaṃ tumhesu tathā paṭipajjissāmīti kumbhakāro viya āmakabhājanesu ahaṃ tumhesu kevalaṃ jānāpento na paṭipajjissāmi.
tika-s0203t:404_6: Lokiyaguṇāpi idha sārotveva adhippetā lokuttaraguṇānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:407_1: Vibhattipatirūpakā ca nipātā hontīti yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃvibhattiatthadīpakā,
tika-s0203t:407_10: Chinnavaṭumeti iminā sabbakilesavaṭṭassa akusalakammavaṭṭassa ca chinnattā vipākavaṭṭassa ca upari vakkhamānattā āha –
tika-s0203t:407_18: Yadā pana tehi bhikkhūhi yā kathā pavattitā,
tika-s0203t:407_19: tato pacchāpi bhagavato tesaṃ buddhānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-s0203t:408_3: Lokiyalokuttarasīlenāti pāramitāsambhūtena buddhāveṇikattā anaññasādhāraṇena lokiyena lokuttarena ca sīlena.
tika-s0203t:408_4: Evaṃsīlāti anavasesasīlānaṃ visuṃ paccavekkhaṇakaraṇena evaṃsīlāti anussarissati.
tika-s0203t:408_9: Tasmā samādhipakkhadhammavinimutto eva idha vihāro adhippetoti vuttaṃ “idaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:409_1: padehi heṭṭhā gahitāpi yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhato muccanassa pavattivisesaṃ upādāya “evaṃvimuttā”ti ettha
tika-s0203t:409_3: tathā “evaṃdhammā”ti ettha gahitāpi samādhipakkhadhammā dibbabrahmaāneñjaariyavihārasaṅkhātaṃ attano pavattivisesaṃ upādāya,
tika-s0203t:409_4: “evaṃvihārī”ti ettha puna gahitāti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0203t:409_5: Phaladhammānaṃ pavattikālepi kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhi na taṃānubhāvajātā,
tika-s0203t:409_6: atha kho ariyamaggena kilesānaṃ samucchinnattāti āha –
tika-s0203t:409_9: so pahāyako pahātabbato vimuttoti vuccati visaṃsaṭṭhabhāvatoti pahānavibhāgena vuccamāne apahāyakassa nibbānassa kathaṃ vimuttatā?
tika-s0203t:409_11: Tañhi pakatiyāva sabbaso kilesehi visaṃsaṭṭhaṃ vinissaṭaṃ suvidūravidūre ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0203t:409_12: tasmāssa tato nissaṭattā nissaraṇavimutti nissaraṇapahānanti vuccatīti āha “nibbāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0203t:410_3: mama pana desanā tayā sutā evāti te therasseva bhāraṃ karonto,
tika-s0203t:410_5: Sato sampajānoti ettha kālabhedavasena labbhamānampi sampajānabhāvaṃ anāmasitvā gativibhāgena taṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:410_7: aṭṭha vare gaṇhantoti ettha kathaṃ varaṃ devatā deti,
tika-s0203t:410_8: parassa dīyamānañca taṃ kathaṃ parassa samijjhatīti?
tika-s0203t:410_10: Yadi hi taṃ kammaṃ katokāsaṃ yassa tadapadesena phalaṃ vipaccati,
tika-s0203t:410_13: Apica parassa patthitavarāni nāma vipaccamānassa kammassa paccayabhūto payogavisesoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:410_17: sakko pana paññavā tāni ekaccaṃ jānātiyeva.
tika-s0203t:411_1: So hi paṭisandhiyā āsannabhāvato avisado hoti,
tika-s0203t:411_3: Aññāhi devatāhi asādhāraṇajānanaṃ hoti dutiyajavanavārato paṭṭhāya pavattanato.
tika-s0203t:412_0: Aññepi devātiādinā bodhisattassa tattha sampajaññeneva ṭhitabhāvaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāveti.
tika-s0203t:412_2: Itaresampi dibbabhogehi mucchitataṃ ajjhāpannānaṃ tiṭṭhantānaṃ sampajaññābhāvo hotiyeva.
tika-s0203t:412_3: Kiṃ tathārūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ natthīti yathārūpaṃ uḷāraṃ paṇītañca ārammaṇaṃ paṭicca te devā saṃmucchitā āhārūpacchedampi karonti,
tika-s0203t:412_4: kiṃ tathārūpaṃ uḷāraṃ paṇītañca ārammaṇaṃ bodhisattassa natthīti bodhisattassa sampajaññānubhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
tika-s0203t:412_6: tattha tattha aññe satte dasahi visesehi adhiggaṇhāti,
tika-s0203t:413_3: tasmā tattha tattha bhave tena dīghāyukena bhavitabbanti adhippāyena,
tika-s0203t:413_8: Pāramidhammānañhi ukkaṃsappattiyā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve abhiññāsamāpattīhi santānassa visesitattā attasinehassa
tika-s0203t:413_9: tanubhāvena sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya uḷārabhāvena adhiṭṭhānassa tikkhavisadabhāvāpattiyā bodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0203t:413_11: citte viya kammesu ca tesaṃ vasibhāvo,
tika-s0203t:413_14: Tathā hi ayaṃ mahāsatto imasmiṃyeva kappe nānājātīsu aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto
tika-s0203t:413_15: appakameva kālaṃ tattha ṭhatvā tato cavitvā idha nibbatto. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:413_17: Sabbapāramīnaṃ pūritattāti iminā payojanābhāvato tattha ṭhatvā adhimuttikālakiriyā nāma na hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:413_18: Apica carimabhave catumahānidhisamuṭṭhānapubbikāya dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā nibbatti viya
tika-s0203t:413_19: buddhabhūtassa asadisadānādivasena anaññasādhāraṇalābhuppatti viya ca ito paraṃ mahāpurisassa dibbasampattianubhavanaṃ
tika-s0203t:413_20: nāma natthīti yāvatāyukaṭṭhānaṃ ussāhajātassa puññasambhārassa vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:414_3: Amilāyitvāti ettha amilātaggahaṇeneva tāsaṃ mālānaṃ vaṇṇasampadāpi gandhasampadāpi sobhāsampadāpi dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:414_4: Bāhirabbhantarānaṃ rajojallānaṃ lesassapi abhāvato devānaṃ sarīragatāni vatthāni sabbakālaṃ parisuddhapabhassarāneva
tika-s0203t:414_6: Neva sītaṃ na uṇhanti yassa sītassa patīkāravasena adhikaṃ seviyamānaṃ uṇhaṃ,
tika-s0203t:414_7: sayameva vā kharataraṃ hutvā adhibhavantaṃ sarīre sedaṃ uppādeyya,
tika-s0203t:414_8: tādisaṃ neva sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:414_10: Bindubinduvasenāti muttaguḷikā viya bindu bindu hutvā sedā muccanti.
tika-s0203t:414_17: sā natthi uparūpari uḷāruḷārānameva bhogānaṃ visesato rucijanakānaṃ upatiṭṭhanato.
tika-s0203t:415_1: Yathā devatā “sampati jātā kīdisena puññakammena idha nibbattā”ti cintetvā,
tika-s0203t:415_3: evaṃ atītabhave attanā kataṃ ekaccaṃ aññampi puññaṃ jānantiyeva mahāpuññāti āha –
tika-s0203t:416_2: Sattā na paramāyuno honti nāma pāpussannatāyāti āha –
tika-s0203t:416_6: Devaloke tāva nuppajjanti brahmacariyavāsassa anokāsabhāvato tathā anacchariyabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:416_8: tesaṃ sā acchariyadhammatā devattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ na pākaṭā hoti yathā manussabhūtānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:416_9: Devabhūte hi sammāsambuddhe dissamānaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ devānubhāvatova loko dahati,
tika-s0203t:416_11: tathā sati sammāsambuddhe nādhimuccati na sampasīdati issarakuttaggāhaṃ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0203t:416_12: devattabhāvassa ca cirakālapavattanato ekaccasassatavādato na parimuccati.
tika-s0203t:416_14: Sattānaṃ tādisagāhavimocanatthañhi buddhā bhagavanto manussasugatiyaṃyeva uppajjanti;
tika-s0203t:416_18: Dhammaveneyyānaṃ atthāya dhammatantiyā ṭhapanassa viya dhātuveneyyānaṃ atthāya dhātūnaṃ ṭhapanassa icchitabbattā ca.
tika-s0203t:416_19: Na hi opapātikānaṃ parinibbānato uddhaṃ sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0203t:416_22: manussabhāvassa pākaṭakaraṇāya dārapariggahampi karontā yāva puttamukhadassanā agāramajjhe tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0203t:416_28: Tathā hi tadattho mahābhinīhāropi manussabhūtānaṃyeva ijjhati,
tika-s0203t:417_3: “yasmā pathaviyā nābhibhūtā buddhānubhāvasahitā acalaṭṭhānabhūtā bodhimaṇḍabhūmi jambudīpeyeva uppajjati,
tika-s0203t:417_7: yasmā purimabuddhānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca nibbattiyā sāvakabodhisattānaṃ sāvakabodhiyā
tika-s0203t:417_8: abhinīhāro sāvakapāramīnaṃ sambharaṇaṃ paripācanañca buddhakhettabhūte imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jambudīpeyeva ijjhati,
tika-s0203t:417_10: Veneyyānaṃ vinayanattho ca buddhuppādoti aggasāvakādiveneyyavisesāpekkhāya ekasmiṃ jambudīpeyeva buddhā nibbattanti,
tika-s0203t:417_12: Ayañca nayo sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti tesaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ tattheva uppatti sampatticakkānaṃ
tika-s0203t:417_13: viya aññamaññupanissayato aparāparaṃ vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:418_0: Idāni ca khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ brāhmaṇānampi pūjanīyabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:418_1: Rājā me pitā bhavissatīti kulaṃ passi pituvasena kulassa niddisitabbato.
tika-s0203t:418_2: Dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari satta divasānīti passi tena attano antarāyābhāvaṃ aññāsi,
tika-s0203t:419_1: Kathaṃ pana tā bodhisattassa pūritapāramibhāvaṃ bhāvinañca sambuddhabhāvaṃ jānantīti?
tika-s0203t:419_4: Tathā hi bhagavato ca dhammadānasaṃvibhāge anekavāraṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsidevatāsannipāto ahosi.
tika-s0203t:420_0: Cavāmīti pajānāti cutiāsannajavanehi ñāṇasahitehi cutiyā upaṭṭhitabhāvassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-s0203t:420_2: Tathā hi taṃ cutūpapātañāṇassapi avisayo eva.
tika-s0203t:420_5: Yasmā ekavāraṃ āvajjitamattena ārammaṇaṃ nicchinituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0203t:420_6: tasmā tamevārammaṇaṃ dutiyaṃ tatiyañca āvajjitvā nicchīyati,
tika-s0203t:420_9: Cutiyā puretaraṃ katipayacittavārato paṭṭhāya maraṇaṃ me āsannanti jānanato,
tika-s0203t:420_11: Paṭisandhiyā pana apubbabhāvato paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānāti.
tika-s0203t:420_12: Nikantiyā uppattito parato asukasmiṃ ṭhāne mayā paṭisandhi gahitāti pajānāti,
tika-s0203t:420_15: Dasasahassī kampatīti ettha kampanakāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0203t:420_16: Mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparatāya bahulaṃ somanassikāva hontīti tesaṃ
tika-s0203t:420_18: Mahāsīvatthero pana yadipi mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparā,
tika-s0203t:420_19: vivekajjhāsayā pana visaṅkhāraninnā sabbasaṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhaṇabahulāti pañcamena mahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiggahaṇamāha.
tika-s0203t:421_0: Pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti puṇṇamāya pure sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya,
tika-s0203t:422_2: putto te bhavissatīti ettakameva te brāhmaṇā attano supinasatthanayena kathesuṃ.
tika-s0203t:422_3: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissatītiādi pana devatāviggahena bhāvinamatthaṃ yāthāvato pavedesuṃ.
tika-s0203t:423_4: Ṭhitakāva nikkhamanti dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko viya.
tika-s0203t:424_1: Vattamānasamīpe vattamāne viya voharīyatīti okkamatīti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0203t:424_3: Evaṃ hotīti evaṃ vuttappakārenassa sampajānanā hoti.
tika-s0203t:425_0: Rukkhagacchādinā kenaci na haññatīti aghā, abādhā.
tika-s0203t:425_2: Asaṃvutāti heṭṭhā upari ca kena ci na pihitā.
tika-s0203t:425_5: saddena yathā heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā pathavī natthīti asaṃvutā lokantarikā,
tika-s0203t:425_6: evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu viya devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā appatiṭṭhāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:425_10: Tathā hi “tena obhāsena aññamaññaṃ sañjānantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:425_11: Jambudīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati,
tika-s0203t:425_15: Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahāreneva paññāyatīti.
tika-s0203t:425_16: Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāravidhamanampi iminā nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:425_17: Pabhāya nappahontīti attano pabhāya obhāsituṃ na abhisambhuṇanti.
tika-s0203t:426_4: Accantakhāreti ātapasantāpābhāvena atisītabhāvaṃ sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā.
tika-s0203t:426_5: Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhānaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavīsandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavitumarahati.
tika-s0203t:426_7: Tesaṃ vā pāpakammabalena petānaṃ pakatiudakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa tadā khārabhāvāpatti hotīti vuttaṃ “accantakhāre udake”ti.
tika-s0203t:428_1: Sabhāvenevāti parassa santike gahaṇena vinā attano sabhāveneva sayameva adhiṭṭhahitvā sīlasampannā.
tika-s0203t:429_2: bodhisattamātu pana devesūpi tādisaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjateva.
tika-s0203t:429_3: Yathā bodhisattassa ānubhāvena bodhisattassa mātu purisādhippāyacittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-s0203t:429_4: evaṃ tassa ānubhāveneva sā kenaci purisena anatikkamanīyāti āha –
tika-s0203t:430_1: puna “pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricāretī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:431_2: Kāyassa hi garubhāvakaṭhinabhāvādayopi tassā tadā na honti eva.
tika-s0203t:431_10: Cakkavattigabbhatopi hi savisesaṃ bodhisattagabbho parihāraṃ labhati puññasambhārassa sātisayattā,
tika-s0203t:431_11: tasmā bodhisattamātā ativiya sappāyāhārācārā ca hutvā sakkaccaṃ pariharati.
tika-s0203t:431_13: Idāni tirokucchigatassa dissamānatāya abbhantaraṃ bāhirañca kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:431_17: Phalikaabbhapaṭalādino viya bodhisattamātukucchitacassa paṭalabhāvena ālokassa vibandhābhāvato yathā bodhisattamātā kucchigataṃ bodhisattaṃ passati,
tika-s0203t:431_18: kimevaṃ bodhisattopi mātaraṃ aññañca purato rūpagataṃ passati, noti āha,
tika-s0203t:431_20: Kasmā pana sati cakkhumhi āloke ca na passatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:431_22: Assāsapassāsā viya hi tattha cakkhuviññāṇampi na uppajjati tajjāsamannāhārassābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:432_1: Yathā aññā itthiyo vijātapaccayā tādisena rogena abhibhūtāpi hutvā maranti,
tika-s0203t:432_2: bodhisattamātu pana bodhisatte kucchigate na koci rogo uppajjati;
tika-s0203t:432_7: Anurakkhituṃ na sakkotīti sammā gabbhaparihāraṃ nānuyuñjati,
tika-s0203t:432_10: Mātu majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse bodhisattassa gabbhokkamanampi tassā āyuparimāṇavilokaneneva saṅgahitaṃ
tika-s0203t:432_12: itthisabhāvena uppajjanakavikāro pana bodhisattassa ānubhāveneva vūpasammati.
tika-s0203t:433_1: So sītuṇhakkhamo na hoti ativiya sukhumālatāya.
tika-s0203t:433_3: ekacce pana cammapadesā buddhiṃ pāpuṇantā ghaṭṭanaṃ na sahanti,
tika-s0203t:433_5: Sattamāsajātassa pana na tāva te jātāti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:434_0: Ṭhitāva hutvāti niddukkhatāya ṭhitā eva hutvā.
tika-s0203t:434_1: Dukkhassa hi balavabhāvato taṃ dukkhaṃ asahamānā aññā itthiyo nisinnā vā nipannā vā vijāyanti.
tika-s0203t:434_3: Sakalanagaravāsinoti kapilavatthuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu devadahādīsu chasu nagaresu vasantā.
tika-s0203t:435_0: Devā naṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti lokanāthaṃ mahāpurisaṃ mayameva paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti sañjātagāravabahumānā
tika-s0203t:435_1: attano pītiṃ pavedentā khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno ādito paṭiggaṇhanti.
tika-s0203t:437_0: Bhaggavibhaggāti sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhamanena vibhāvitattā bhaggā vibhaggā viya ca hutvā.
tika-s0203t:437_2: Alaggo hutvāti gabbhāsaye yonipadese ca katthaci alaggo asatto hutvā.
tika-s0203t:437_3: Udakenāti gabbhāsayagatena udakena amakkhito nikkhamati sammakkhitassa tādisassa udakasemhādikasseva tattha abhāvato.
tika-s0203t:437_4: Bodhisattassa hi puññānubhāvena paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ visuddhaṃ paramasugandhagandhakuṭi viya candanagandhaṃ vāyantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0203t:440_0: Na kho panevaṃ daṭṭhabbanti sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā.
tika-s0203t:440_2: Ekaṅgaṇānīti vivaṭabhāvena vihāraṅgaṇapariveṇaṅgaṇāni viya ekaṅgaṇasadisāni ahesuṃ.
tika-s0203t:440_3: Sadisopi natthīti tumhākaṃ idaṃ vilokanaṃ visiṭṭhe passituṃ idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi,
tika-s0203t:440_8: Ettha ca mahesakkhā tāva devā tathā vadanti,
tika-s0203t:440_11: Mahesakkhānañhi devānaṃ mahāsattassa ānubhāvo viya tena sadisānampi ānubhāvo paccakkho ahosi.
tika-s0203t:440_12: Itare pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā saddahantā anuminantā tathā āhaṃsu.
tika-s0203t:441_0: Jātamattasseva bodhisattassa ṭhānādīni yesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhūtānīti te niddhāretvā dassento,
tika-s0203t:441_2: Tattha patiṭṭhānaṃ catuiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ iddhipādavasena lokuttaradhammesu suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasamijjhanato.
tika-s0203t:441_9: ayamantimā jātīti āyatiṃ jātiyā abhāvakittanā anupādi…pe…
tika-s0203t:441_11: tassa tassa anāgate laddhabbavisesassa taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ abyabhicārīnimittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:441_12: Na āgatoti imasmiṃ sutte aññattha ca vakkhamānāya anupubbiyā anāgatataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:441_13: Āharitvāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte aṭṭhakathāsu ca āgatanayena āharitvā dīpetabbo.
tika-s0203t:442_0: Dasasahassilokadhātu kampīti pana idaṃ satipi idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatatte vakkhamānānamacchariyānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:442_7: Sakatejobhāsitānīti ativiya samujjalāya attano pabhāya obhāsitāni ahesuṃ.
tika-s0203t:442_9: Vāto na vāyīti kharo vāto na vāyi,
tika-s0203t:442_13: Vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena puthupāṇinā hatthatāḷanena saddakaraṇaṃ apphoṭanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:442_26: sattānaṃ cutupapātā nāhesunti imesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:443_0: Tatrāpīti tesupi pathavikampādīsu evaṃ pubbanimittabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0203t:443_1: na kevalaṃ sampatijātassa ṭhānādīsu evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:443_2: Sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ sabbassa ñeyyassa titthakaramatassa ca cālanato.
tika-s0203t:443_4: kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggaṇhanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
tika-s0203t:443_6: pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ tattheva ṭhānassa niccalasabhāvato āneñjavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:443_7: Vīṇānaṃ sayaṃ vajjanaṃ parūpadesena vinā sayameva anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:443_8: Bherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya pavedanasamatthassa dhammabheriyā anusāvanassa amatadundubhighosanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:443_10: supaṭṭanasampāpuṇanaṃ atthādi anurūpaṃ atthādīsu ñāṇassa bhedādhigamassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:444_3: Ākāsādiappatiṭṭhavisamacañcalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya sakuṇānaṃ pathavīgamanaṃ tādisaṃ micchāgāhaṃ pahāya sattānaṃ
tika-s0203t:444_5: Devatānaṃ apphoṭanādīhi kīḷanaṃ pamodanuppattiudānassa bhavavantagamanena dhammasabhāvabodhanena ca pamodavibhāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:444_7: Kāyagatāsativasena laddhajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppāditamaggaphalasukhānubhavo kāyagatāsatiamatapaṭilābho,
tika-s0203t:444_8: tassa pana kāyassapi atappakasukhāvahattā khudāpipāsāpīḷanābhāvo pubbanimittaṃ vutto.
tika-s0203t:444_9: Ariyaddhajamālāmālitāyāti sadevakassa lokassa ariyamaggabojjhaṅgadhajamālāhi mālitabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0203t:445_2: tasmā amhehi idha apubbaṃ vattabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:445_3: Tadā pathaviyaṃ gacchantopi mahāsatto ākāsena gacchanto viya mahājanassa upaṭṭhāsīti ayamettha niyati
tika-s0203t:445_4: dhammaniyāmo bodhisattānaṃ dhammatāti idaṃ niyativādavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:445_5: “Pubbe purimajātīsu tādisassa puññasambhārakammassa katattā upacitattā mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsī”ti idaṃ pubbekatakammavādavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:445_6: Imesaṃ sattānaṃ upari īsanasīlatāya yathāsakaṃ kammameva issaro nāma,
tika-s0203t:445_8: mahāpurisopi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthena uḷārena puññakammunā nibbattito tena issarena nimmito nāma,
tika-s0203t:445_11: Yāya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ issaranimmānavādavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:445_12: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ bahuṃ vatvā kiṃ imāya pariyāyakathāyāti avasāne ujukameva evaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0203t:445_14: evaṃmahānubhāvo ākāsena maññe gacchatīti parikappanassa vasena ākāsena gacchanto viya ahosi.
tika-s0203t:445_15: Sīghataraṃ pana sattapadavītihārena gatattā dissamānarūpopi mahājanassa adissamāno viya ahosi.
tika-s0203t:445_16: Acelakabhāvo khuddakasarīratā ca tādisassa iriyāpathassa ananucchavikāti kammānubhāvasañjanitapāṭihāriyavasena alaṅkārapaṭiyatto viya;
tika-s0203t:445_17: soḷasavassuddesiko viya ca mahājanassa upaṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ;
tika-s0203t:445_18: buddhabhāvānucchavikassa bodhisattānubhāvassa yāthāvato paveditattā buddhena viya…pe…
tika-s0203t:446_2: te te uppādakkhaṇepi sabbaso suppaṭividitā supākaṭā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya suṭṭhu vibhūtā eva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0203t:446_7: te hi sammasanassa yogyakāle uppattiyā okāsappattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:446_9: ākaṅkhantā pana te yadā kadāci uppannasaṅkhāre sammasantiyeva.
tika-s0203t:449_8: Sīsaṃ nhāpetvāti maṅgalatthaṃ mahāgaṅgāya sīsaṃ nhāpetvā.
tika-s0203t:450_0: Na kelāyatīti na mamāyati kismiñci na maññati.
tika-s0203t:450_5: Kucchiyā dhāritattā amātā kātuṃ na sakkā jananībhāvato.
tika-s0203t:450_7: Tathā gaṇhantā ca tappariyāpannaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhāti nāmāti āha –
tika-s0203t:450_9: Ayampi amātā kātuṃ na sakkā sāmikabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:450_10: Dārako ubhinnampi kulānaṃ dāyādo hotu dvinnaṃ puttabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:451_1: Pabbajjāmattena kilesānaṃ asamucchijjanato vītikkamituṃ kāmasaññā uppannapubbāti pucchā pana pucchitabbā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:452_3: Tattha kāmavitakko yathā kāyavacīdvāresu copanappatto kammapathappatto nāma hoti;
tika-s0203t:452_9: “saññā uppannamattāvā”ti vuccamāne vitakkitampi samānaṃ kammapathaṃ appattameva,
tika-s0203t:452_10: ubhayassa pana vasena suttapadaṃ pavattanti therassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:453_4: Kimevaṃ bhogesu paranimmitabhave vasavattidevānaṃ viya sabbaso āyūhanakammena vinā aññassapi pabbajitassa
tika-s0203t:454_1: Idha pana sakalo goduhano adhippetoti dassento,
tika-s0203t:455_4: Nanu tathā vacanaṃ paṭijānanaṃ viya hotīti āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:459_5: Ajānanakoṭṭhāseyevāti avadhāraṇena attani kataṃ dosāropanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0203t:460_1: Appanāupacāranti appanañceva upacārañca pāpetvā kathesīti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0203t:461_3: Sati kilesakāme attano upahāraṃ upacāretvā assādetvā paribhuñjati nāmāti āha –
tika-s0203t:464_1: Gahetuṃ samatthoti gaṇikārahatthinīhi upalāpetvā araññahatthiṃ vacanavasena gahetuṃ samattho.
tika-s0203t:466_4: “thero”tiādinā āgatesu upameyyavāresūti pañcasu saṃkilesapakkhiyesu vāresu esa yathāvuttova nayoti veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:469_2: “imināhaṃ brahmacariyena devo vā bhaveyyaṃ devaññataro vā,
tika-s0203t:469_3: dukkhato vā mucceyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā cepi caranti,
tika-s0203t:469_4: abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya taṇhāya brahmacariyassa vidūsitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:469_7: Paṇidhānavasena hi puññaphalaṃ niyataṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0203t:469_8: tadabhāvato kataṃ puññaṃ na labhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:469_10: catutthapakkho sammāvatāro iti catukoṭiko pañho jālavasena āhaṭo,
tika-s0203t:469_16: tassa yathādhippāyaphalaṃ samijjhatīti na vattabbaṃ ayoniso brahmacariyassa ciṇṇattā;
tika-s0203t:469_17: yo pana sammattaṃ purakkhatvā brahmacariyaṃ carati,
tika-s0203t:469_18: tassa yathādhippāyaṃ brahmacariyaphalaṃ na samijjhatīti na vattabbaṃ yoniso brahmacariyassa ciṇṇattā.
tika-s0203t:472_9: “cetovimuttī”ti pana vuttattā cittekaggatāyeva evaṃ vuccatīti upāsakassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:473_4: Kasiṇanimittena ottharitvāti kasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjanto tasmiṃ kasiṇa…pe…
tika-s0203t:473_7: Kāmaṃ samāpattikkhaṇe ābhogo natthi tato pana pubbe vā siyā so ābhogo,
tika-s0203t:473_9: Idāni tāsaṃ cetovimuttīnaṃ satipi kenaci visesena abhede visayādito labbhamānabhedaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:473_11: Nimittaṃ na vaḍḍhati vaḍḍhetabbassa nimittasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0203t:473_12: Pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ viya ākāsabhāvanāya ugghāṭanaṃ na jāyati.
tika-s0203t:473_14: Cuddasavidhena paridamanābhāvato abhiññānaṃ pādakāni na honti.
tika-s0203t:473_15: Nimittugghāṭasseva abhāvato arūpajjhānānaṃ anadhiṭṭhānatāya nirodhassa pādakāni na hontīti.
tika-s0203t:473_16: Kammavaṭṭabhāvena kilesavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vaṭṭānaṃ paccayabhāvo vaṭṭapādakatā.
tika-s0203t:473_17: Upapajjanavaseneva taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ okkamati etehīti bhavokkamanāni.
tika-s0203t:473_19: Ugghāṭanassa labbhanato arūpajjhānopari samatikkamo hotīti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0203t:473_23: Kāmañcettha appamāṇasamāpattitopi nīharitvā vakkhamānabhavūpapattikāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0203t:473_24: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kasiṇajhānatova nīharitvā yojanā katāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:473_25: Atha vā mahaggatagahaṇenettha appamāṇāti vuttabrahmavihārānampi saṅgaho veditabbo tassā samaññāya ubhayesampi sādhāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:474_1: Evaṃ vuttoti asatipi tathārūpe ābhoge “parittābhāti pharitvā adhimuccitvā viharatī”ti vutto.
tika-s0203t:474_2: Appamāṇaṃ katvā kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhentassa kasiṇavaḍḍhanavasena bahulīkārasambhavato siyā jhānassa balavataratā,
tika-s0203t:474_4: āciṇṇavasitāya pana paccanīkadhammānaṃ sammā aparisodhane vattabbameva natthīti pañcahākārehi jhānassa appaguṇataṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:474_6: Jhānassa appānubhāvatāya eva tannimittā pabhāpi appatarā aparisuddhāva hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:474_11: parittārammaṇāya anurūpatāya vā nimittaṃ pabhāmaṇḍalakampi parittameva siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:475_0: Vaṇṇanānattanti yadi pītaṃ yadi lohitaṃ yadi vā odātanti sarīravaṇṇanānattaṃ.
tika-s0203t:476_2: Tadaṅgenāti vā tassā parittatāya appamāṇatāya ca ābhākāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t:477_6: Pubbe sañcaritanti atītabhavesu jātivasena sañcaraṇaṃ mama,
tika-s0203t:480_3: Ye pana tadā satthuvacanaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu,
tika-s0203t:480_4: te kiñci avatvā tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā aṭṭhaṃsu,
tika-s0203t:481_0: Yenapi janena na diṭṭhoti yena ubhayajanena aññavihitatāya kuḍḍakavāṭādiantarikatāya vā na diṭṭho.
tika-s0203t:481_1: Damanatthanti tehi upāsakehi nimmadabhāvaṃ āpāditānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ damanatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:482_4: Bhiyyo cāti attano bālabhāvassa ajānanatopi bhiyyo ca bhaṇḍanassa upari phoṭo viya saṅghabhedassa attano kāraṇabhāvampi uppajjamānaṃ na maññi naññāsi.
tika-s0203t:483_0: Kalahavasena pavattavācāyeva gocaro etesanti vācāgocarā hutvā.
tika-s0203t:483_2: Na taṃ jānantīti taṃ kalahaṃ na jānanti.
tika-s0203t:483_3: Kalahaṃ karonto ca taṃ na jānanto nāma natthi.
tika-s0203t:483_7: Ayaṃ kalaho nāma attano paresañca atthajāpanato anatthuppādanato diṭṭheva dhamme samparāye ca sādīnavo,
tika-s0203t:484_0: Upanayhantīti upanāhavasena anubandhanti. Porāṇoti purimehi buddhādīhi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇatāya purātano.
tika-s0203t:486_0: Tathā pavattaverānanti aṭṭhichinnādibhāvaṃ nissāya upanayavasena cirakālaṃ pavattaverānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:487_1: paṇḍitasahāyānaṃ pana idaṃ na siyāti paṇḍitasahāyassa bālasahāyassa ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0203t:487_2: Sīhabyagghādike pākaṭaparissaye rāgadosādike paṭicchannaparissaye ca abhibhavitvā.
tika-s0203t:488_1: Mātaṅgasaddeneva hatthibhāvassa vuttattā nāgavacanaṃ tassa mahattavibhāvanatthanti āha –
tika-s0203t:489_3: Bhagavatā hi so ādīnavo pageva pariññāto,
tika-s0203t:489_5: tasmiṃ pana antovasse keci buddhaveneyyā nāhesuṃ;
tika-s0203t:489_6: tena aññattha gamanaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ damanupāyoti pālileyyakaṃ uddissa gacchanto ekavihāriṃ āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ,
tika-s0203t:489_7: samaggavāsaṃ vasante ca anuruddhattherādike sampahaṃsetuṃ anuruddhattherassa ca.
tika-s0203t:489_9: tasmā kalahakārake kirassāti etthāpi kirasaddaggahaṇe eseva nayo.
tika-s0203t:490_1: “Yathā kathaṃ panā”ti vuttapucchānaṃ pacchimabhāvato “atthi pana voti pacchimapucchāyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:490_2: na puna “atthi pana vo”ti pavattanassa pucchanassa atthibhāvato.
tika-s0203t:490_5: Parikammobhāsaṃ pucchatīti dibbacakkhuñāṇe katādhikārattā tassa uppādanatthaṃ parikammobhāsaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0203t:490_8: Catutthajjhānalābhī hi dibbacakkhuparikammatthaṃ obhāsakasiṇaṃ bhāvetvā upacāre ṭhapito samādhi parikammasamādhi,
tika-s0203t:490_12: Yattake hi ṭhāne dibbacakkhunā rūpagataṃ daṭṭhukāmo,
tika-s0203t:490_14: Taṃ obhāsaṃ tattha ca rūpagataṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇena passati,
tika-s0203t:490_18: Yasmā pana tesaṃ rūpagataṃ passantānaṃ parikammavāro atikkami,
tika-s0203t:490_23: kasiṇobhāso ca parikammavasenāti tadubhayampi parikammassa appavattiyā nāhosi,
tika-s0203t:490_24: tayidaṃ kāraṇaṃ ādikammikabhāvato therā na maññiṃsu,
tika-s0203t:491_0: Nimittaṃ paṭivijjhitabbanti kāraṇaṃ paccakkhato dassetvā suvisuddhadibbacakkhuñāṇe theraṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo satthā vadati.
tika-s0203t:491_1: Kiṃ na āḷulessantīti kiṃ na byāmohessanti,
tika-s0203t:491_3: Vicikicchā udapādīti dibbacakkhuno yathāupaṭṭhitesu rūpagatesu apubbatāya,
tika-s0203t:491_5: idaṃ nu kho ki”nti maggena asamucchinnattā vicikicchā saṃsayo uppajji.
tika-s0203t:491_6: Samādhi cavīti vicikicchāya uppannattā parikammasamādhi vigacchi.
tika-s0203t:491_9: Na manasi karissāmīti manasikāravasena me rūpāni upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
tika-s0203t:491_11: tasmā idāni kiñci na manasi karissāmīti tuṇhī ahosi taṃ pana tuṇhībhāvappattiṃ sandhāyāha “amanasikāro udapādī”ti.
tika-s0203t:492_0: Tathābhūtassa amanasikārassa abhāvaṃ āgamma uppilaṃ udapādi.
tika-s0203t:492_1: Vīriyaṃ gāḷhaṃ paggahitanti thinamiddhachambhitattānaṃ vūpasamanatthaṃ accāraddhavīriyaṃ ahosi,
tika-s0203t:492_2: tena citte samādhidūsikā gehassitā balavapīti uppannā.
tika-s0203t:492_6: Taṃ mamāti patthanāabhibhavanīyamanasīsena jappetīti abhijappā, taṇhā.
tika-s0203t:492_8: Ativiya upari katvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ atinijjhāyitattaṃ.
tika-s0203t:493_2: Na ca rūpāni passāmīti obhāsamanasikārapasutatāya dibbacakkhunā rūpāni na passāmi.
tika-s0203t:493_3: Visayarūpamevāti tena pharitvā ṭhitaṭṭhāneva dibbacakkhuno visayabhūtaṃ rūpagatameva manasi karomi.
tika-s0203t:494_0: Kasiṇarūpānaṃ vasenettha obhāsassa parittatāti āha “parittaṭṭhāne obhāsa”nti.
tika-s0203t:494_2: sā ca nesaṃ parittatā ṭhānavasenevāti āha “parittakaṭṭhāne rūpānī”ti.
tika-s0203t:494_4: Obhāsaparittataṃ sandhāya parikammasamādhi “paritto”ti vutto tasseva obhāsassa appamāṇatāya appamāṇasamādhīti vacanato.
tika-s0203t:496_3: pacchimayāme dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nibbattentopi imāni ñāṇāni bhāvesiyeva.
tika-s0203t:496_7: Pañcamajjhānassāti pañcamajjhānikassa vasena paṭhamajjhāniko maggo natthi.
tika-s0203t:499_11: Lobhādīhi duṭṭhaṃ bhāsitaṃ musāvādādiṃ bhāsatīti dubbhāsitabhāsī.
tika-s0203t:499_12: Tesaṃ tesaṃyeva vasena kattabbato dukkaṭakammaṃ pāṇātipātādiṃ karotīti dukkaṭakammakārī.
tika-s0203t:499_15: Tato eva tesaṃ sāruppaṃ anurūpanti tassāruppaṃ.
tika-s0203t:500_1: Yasmā sattānaṃ yathūpacitāni kammāni katokāsāni tadupaṭṭhāpitāni kammanimittagatinimittāni maraṇassa āsannakāle cittassa āpāthaṃ āgacchantāni,
tika-s0203t:500_2: tadā olambantāni viya abhibhavantāni viya ajjhottharantāni viya upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0203t:500_5: Upaṭṭhānākāro eva tadā cittassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:501_1: Na sakkāti na vadatīti etena dvepi paṭisedhā pakatiatthāti ayamattho vutto hoti.
tika-s0203t:501_2: Na sukarāti pana iminā dukkarabhāvo dīpito,
tika-s0203t:501_3: dukkarañca tāva upāyena sakkā kātunti dassento āha –
tika-s0203t:502_1: Saṅkhampi na upetīti iminā saṅkhātabbamattaṃ natthīti dīpitaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:502_7: Taṃ kammakāraṇanti taṃ pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ catunnampi passānaṃ vasena samparivattetvā karontiyeva,
tika-s0203t:503_0: Vibhattoti tattha nibbattakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammunā vibhatto viya nibbatto.
tika-s0203t:503_1: Ayopākārena parito atto gahitoti ayopākārapariyatto parikkhitto.
tika-s0203t:504_1: Evampi dukkhoti yathāvuttaussadanirayavasenapi sota- ghāna- jivhā- kāya- mano-
tika-s0203t:506_6: Yebhuyyena hi lakuṇṭakā sattā rassagīvā puthulakucchikāva hontīti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:507_0: Kalīyati khalīyati appahīyati sāsanaṃ etenāti kali,
tika-s0203t:507_3: Adhibandhanti kuṭumbassa adhivutthassa mūlabhūtassa attano bandhitabbataṃ.
tika-s0203t:507_5: Bālabhūmiyā bālabhāvassa matthakappatti nirayagāmikammakāritāti “niraye nibbattati”cceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:507_6: Taggahaṇeneva pana tato mudumudutarādikammavasena sesāpāyesu aparāparanibbattādibālabhūmi vibhāvitā hotīti.
tika-s0203t:508_1: Vuttānusārenāti “bālo aya”ntiādinā vuttassa atthavacanassa “paṇḍito aya”nti etehi lakkhīyatītiādinā anusārena.
tika-s0203t:508_3: sammādassanaṃ sucintitameva cintetītiādinā manosucaritānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.
tika-s0203t:510_1: Uposathaṃ vuccati aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ sabbadivasesu gahaṭṭhehi rakkhitabbasīlaṃ,
tika-s0203t:510_2: samādānavasena taṃ etassa atthīti uposathiko, tassa.
tika-s0203t:510_5: yasmiṃ pana kāle cakkavattibhāvasaṃvattaniya- dāna- sīlādi-
tika-s0203t:510_9: Tādise hi kāle cakkavattibhāvī purisuttamo yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato rājā khattiyo hutvā muddhāvasitto
