tika-s0203t:510_11: na yadā cakkaratanaṃ uppajjati, tadā eva. Tenāha – “pāto…pe…
tika-s0203t:511_2: Dibbānubhāvayuttattāti dassanīyatā manuññaghosatā ākāsagāmitā obhāsavissajjanā appaṭighātatā rañño icchitatthanipphattikāraṇatāti
tika-s0203t:512_2: Nābhipanāḷi parikkhepapaṭṭesūti nābhiparikkhepapaṭṭe ceva nābhiyā panāḷiparikkhepapaṭṭe ca.
tika-s0203t:512_4: Paricchedalekhantaresu maṇikā suvibhattā hutvā paññāyantīti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:513_5: Kāmaṃ tassa cakkaratanassa nemimaṇḍalaṃ asandhikaṃva nibbattaṃ,
tika-s0203t:513_6: sabbatthakameva pana kevalaṃ pavāḷavaṇṇova na sobhatīti pakaticakkassa sandhiyuttesu ṭhānesu rattajambunadaparikkhataṃ ahosi,
tika-s0203t:514_1: Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānamantareti dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ antarasamīpe padese.
tika-s0203t:514_9: Nābhipanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ passānaṃ vasena “dvinnampi nābhipanāḷīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:516_0: Ante purassāti anurādhapure rañño antepurassa uttarasīhapañjaraāsanne tadā rañño pāsāde tādisassa uttaradisāya sīhapañjarassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:516_1: Sukhena sakkāti kiñci anāruhitvā sarīrañca anullaṅghitvā yathāṭhiteneva hatthena pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipitvā sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetuṃ.
tika-s0203t:517_2: Āgantvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato upari ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte.
tika-s0203t:518_2: Paracakkanti parassa rañño senā, āṇā vā.
tika-s0203t:519_6: Upaparikkhitvāti hetutopi sabhāvatopi phalatopi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaādīnavatopi vīmaṃsitvā.
tika-s0203t:520_0: Vibhāventi paññāya atthaṃ vibhūtaṃ karontīti vibhāvino,
tika-s0203t:523_3: Āgamanaṃ cintethāti vadanti cakkavattivattassa pūritatāya paricitattā.
tika-s0203t:523_6: catūhi pādehi cāti sattahi avayavehi ṭhitattā sattapatiṭṭho.
tika-s0203t:523_9: Gandhameva hi tassa itare hatthino na sahanti.
tika-s0203t:527_1: Ubhosu antesūti heṭṭhā upari cāti dvīsu antesu.
tika-s0203t:527_3: Muttājālake ṭhapetvāti suvisuddhe muttāmaye jālake patiṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0203t:529_7: Somanassavasena cittaṃ pasādeti yoniso cintentānaṃ kammaphalasaddhāya vasena.
tika-s0203t:529_8: Pasādāvahattāti kāraṇavacanena yathā pāsādikatāya vaṇṇapokkharatāsiddhi vuttā,
tika-s0203t:529_10: abhirūpatāya ca dassanīyatāsiddhi vattabbāti nayaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:529_14: Evaṃ sarīrasampattivasena abhirūpatādike dassetvā idāni sarīre dosābhāvavasenapi te dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:531_0: Aggidaḍḍhā viyāti āsanagatena agginā daḍḍhā viya.
tika-s0203t:531_3: Taṃ taṃ attanā rañño kātabbakiccaṃ kiṃ karomīti pucchitabbatāya kiṃ karaṇanti paṭissāvetīti kiṅkārapaṭissāvinī.
tika-s0203t:532_6: cakkavattinopi parivārasaṃvattaniyaṃ puññakammaṃ tādisassa phalavisesassa upanissayo hotiyeva.
tika-s0203t:532_8: Etena sesaratanesupi tesaṃ visesānaṃ tadupanissayatā vibhāvitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:532_9: Pubbe ekadesavasena labbhamānapāripūrī rañño cakkavattibhāvūpagamanato paṭṭhāya sabbākārapāripūrā jātā.
tika-s0203t:537_1: Kaṭaggaho vuccati jayaggaho sakānaṃ paṇānaṃ kaṭabhāvena atthasiddhivasena saṅgaṇhananti katvā.
tika-s0203t:540_5: “Dibbena cakkhunā”tiādi pana visuddhimagge tathā vitthāritampi suttasaṃvaṇṇanā hotīti katvā,
tika-s0203t:541_1: Nirayato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ devalokena osāpetīti saṃkilesadhammehi saṃvejetvā vodānadhammehi niṭṭhāpento.
tika-s0203t:542_2: Nerayike niraye pālenti tato niggantumappadānavasena rakkhantīti nirayapālā.
tika-s0203t:542_3: Nerayikānaṃ narakadukkhena pariyonaddhāya alaṃ samatthāti vā nirayapālā.
tika-s0203t:542_6: atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva.
tika-s0203t:542_9: Sati hi kāraṇike kammakāraṇāya bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:542_15: ime nirayasaṃvattaniyena kammunā nibbattāti sayampi nirayadukkhaṃ anubhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0203t:542_16: tathā sati aññesaṃ nerayikānaṃ yātanāya asamatthā siyuṃ,
tika-s0203t:542_20: tehi samānarūpabalappamāṇehi itaresaṃ bhayasantāsā na siyuṃ.
tika-s0203t:542_24: Nirayūpapattisaṃvattaniyakammato hi aññeneva kammunā te nibbattanti rakkhasajātikattā.
tika-s0203t:545_4: ayomayāya pana ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya nirayabhūmiyā parikkamamānā kathaṃ dāhadukkhaṃ nānubhavantīti?
tika-s0203t:545_6: Yathā hi iddhimanto cetovasippattā mahāmoggallānādayo nerayike anukampantā iddhibalena nirayabhūmiṃ upagatā dāhadukkhena na bādhīyanti,
tika-s0203t:546_3: Yathā nirayadukkhena abādhitā eva hutvā nerayike yātenti,
tika-s0203t:546_4: na cettakena bāhiravisayābhāvo yujjati iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāya paccekaṃ dvārapurisesu vibhattasabhāvattā.
tika-s0203t:546_5: Tathā hi ekaccassa dvārassa purisassa ca iṭṭhaṃ ekaccassa aniṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0203t:546_6: ekaccassa ca aniṭṭhaṃ ekaccassa iṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0203t:546_11: “anerayikānaṃ nesaṃ kathaṃ tattha sambhavo”ti niraye nerayikānaṃ yātanāsabbhāvato.
tika-s0203t:546_12: Nerayikasattayātanāyogyañhi attabhāvaṃ nibbattentaṃ kammaṃ tādisanikantivināmitaṃ nirayaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatteti.
tika-s0203t:546_13: Te ca nerayikehi adhikatarabalārohapariṇāhā ativiya bhayānakadassanā kurūratarapayogā ca honti.
tika-s0203t:546_14: Eteneva tattha nerayikānaṃ vibādhakakākasunakhādīnampi nibbatti saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:547_0: Kathaṃ aññagatikehi aññagatikabādhananti ca na vattabbaṃ aññatthāpi tathā dassanato.
tika-s0203t:547_2: “asattasabhāvā eva nirayapālā nirayasunakhādayo cā”ti tampi tesaṃ matimattaṃ aññattha tathā adassanato.
tika-s0203t:547_3: Na hi kāci atthi tādisī dhammappavatti,
tika-s0203t:547_5: sampatisattehi appayojitā ca sattakiccaṃ sādhentī diṭṭhapubbā.
tika-s0203t:547_10: Tathā hi supine āhārūpabhogādinā na atthasiddhi,
tika-s0203t:547_12: Idhāpi kammavipākassa acinteyyabhāvatoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-s0203t:547_15: vuttanayena pana pāḷito ca tesaṃ sattabhāvo eva siddhoti.
tika-s0203t:547_17: “sattasaṅkhātā nirayapālasaññitā dhammappavatti sābhisandhikaparūpaghātī atthi kiccasabbhāvato ojāhārādirakkhasasantati viyā”ti.
tika-s0203t:547_18: Abhisandhipubbakatā cettha na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ tathā tathā abhisandhiyā yātanato,
tika-s0203t:547_21: “bhūtavisesā eva ete vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesavanto bheravākārā ‘narakapālā’ti samaññaṃ labhantī”ti.
tika-s0203t:548_0: Apica yathā ariyavinaye narakapālānaṃ bhūtamattatā asiddhā,
tika-s0203t:548_1: tathā paññattimattavādinopi tesaṃ bhūtamattatā asiddhāva sabbaso rūpadhammānaṃ atthi bhāvasseva appaṭijānanato.
tika-s0203t:548_2: Na hi tassa bhūtāni nāma paramatthato santi.
tika-s0203t:548_8: asatipi bāhire visaye narake viya desādiniyamo hotīti vādo na sijjhati,
tika-s0203t:548_9: sati eva pana bāhire visaye desādiniyamoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:549_0: Devadūtasarāpanavasena satte yathūpacite puññakamme yameti niyametīti yamo,
tika-s0203t:549_1: tassa yamassa vemānikapetānaṃ rājabhāvato rañño. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:549_4: Vemānikapetāti kaṇhasukkavasena missakakammaṃ katvā vinipātikadevatā viya sukkena kammunā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-s0203t:549_9: tesaṃ maggādhigamato paṭṭhāya puññaphalameva uppajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:549_10: Apuññaphalaṃ pubbe viya kaṭukaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0203t:549_12: Dhammiko rājāti ettha tassa dhammikabhāvo dhammadevaputtassa viya uppattiniyamitadhammavaseneva veditabbo.
tika-s0203t:550_2: Sabhāvo ca nāma tejodhātuyā uṇhatā viya na kadācipi vigacchatīti āha “aparimutto jātiyā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:551_3: Atthato evaṃ vadati nāmāti vācāya avadantopi atthāpattito evaṃ vadanto viya hoti viññūnanti attho.
tika-s0203t:551_4: Evaṃ tumhākampi jāti āgamissatīti evaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhajegucchaasamatthadaharāvatthā jāti tumhākaṃ āgamissati.
tika-s0203t:551_6: sā pana atītānāgatāya uparipi āgamanāya payogo icchitabbo,
tika-s0203t:551_11: Tenāti tena kāraṇena viññūnaṃ vedavatthubhāvenāti attho.
tika-s0203t:554_1: Kāraṇā nāma “hatthacchedādibhedā adhikapīḷā karīyati etāyā”ti katvā yātanā,
tika-s0203t:554_2: sā eva kāraṇikehi kātabbaṭṭhena kammanti kammakāraṇā yātanākammanti attho.
tika-s0203t:555_1: Bahuṃ pāpaṃ katanti bahuso pāpaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0203t:555_7: Soti garukaṃ bahulaṃ vā pāpaṃ katvā ṭhito niraye nibbattatiyeva,
tika-s0203t:555_18: Te hi pāpakammassa dubbalabhāvato katūpacitassa ca okāsārahakusalakammassa balavabhāvato attano dhammatāyapi saranti.
tika-s0203t:556_2: “mayā tadā ākāsacetiye pūjitarattapaṭā viyā”ti attano pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari.
tika-s0203t:556_3: Pañcahipi na saratīti balavatā pāpakammena byāmohito pañca saññāṇāni na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0203t:556_4: Tuṇhī hoti kammāraho ayanti tattha patīkāraṃ apassanto.
tika-s0203t:557_3: Mahānirayassa mahantattā tathāpi bhittisataṃ yojanasahassaṃ hotīti ussadassa sabbassa parikkhepato “dasayojanasahassaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:558_2: Tādisamevāti purimasadisattā “ubbhataṃ sadisameva hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:558_3: Bahusampattoti vā bahuṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā puratthimadvāraṃ sampatto hoti.
tika-s0203t:559_0: Channaṃ jālānanti catūhi disāhi heṭṭhā upari ca ubbhatānaṃ channaṃ jālānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:559_1: Sattānaṃ nirantaratā nirayasaṃvattaniyakammakatānañca bahubhāvato jālānaṃ tāva sattānañca nirantarattā avīci hotu;
tika-s0203t:559_2: dukkhassa pana kathaṃ nirantaratāti taṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:559_5: Tattha āvajjanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ santīraṇaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ dve tadārammaṇacittānīti cha upekkhāsahagatāni.
tika-s0203t:559_6: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi tattha upekkhāsahagatacittānipi pavattanti upekkhāvedanāpi laddhāvasarā;
tika-s0203t:559_7: dukkhavedanā pana balavatarā nisitanisitena tikhiṇena satthena nirantaraṃ sarīraṃ chindantī viya dukkhaṃ
tika-s0203t:559_8: upanentī viya tā vedanā abhibhavantī ajjhottharantī uppajjantī nirantarā viya hoti.
tika-s0203t:559_10: Upekkhāvedanāti vā tattha ativiya aniṭṭhaphalatāya aniṭṭhārammaṇā upekkhāvedanā dukkhāti vuccati,
tika-s0203t:559_11: yathā iṭṭhaphalabahutāya iṭṭhārammaṇā jhānādipariyāpanne ca sugatibhave ca upekkhāvedanā sukhāti vuccati,
tika-s0203t:561_2: vettalatāyo ca tikhiṇadhārakaṇṭakā ayomayā eva. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:562_1: Dante samphusetīti heṭṭhimadante yathā kiñci mukhe pakkhipituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0203t:562_3: Tambalohapānato paṭṭhāyāti vuttakāraṇato paṭilomatopi evaṃ kammakāraṇānaṃ kāraṇamāha.
tika-s0203t:562_6: Avijahitameva saṃvegahetutāya lokassa mahato atthassa saṃvattanato.
tika-s0203t:564_0: Sabbadukkhātikkantā nāmāti sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā eva honti carimacittanirodhena vaṭṭadukkhalesassapi asambhavato.
tika-s0203t:569_5: Taṃ uddissa pavattiyā pana bhaddekarattasahacaraṇato bhaddekaratto.
tika-s0203t:569_12: Yasmā pana niddesapadānaṃ jananiṭṭhāne ṭhitattā mātā viyāti mātikāti vuccati,
tika-s0203t:569_14: Uddiṭṭhamatthaṃ vibhajati etenāti vibhaṅgo vitthāradesanā, tenāha –
tika-s0203t:570_1: Taṃ pana atthato vigataṃ khandhapañcakanti āha “atīte khandhapañcake”ti.
tika-s0203t:570_4: Yathā “nicca”ntiādinā viparītaggāhavasena atītesu rūpādīsu micchāabhinivisanaṃ parāmāso diṭṭhābhinandanā;
tika-s0203t:570_5: evaṃ “nicca”ntiādinā viparītaggāhavasena anāgatesu rūpādīsu micchāabhinivisanaṃ parāmāso diṭṭhi kammasamādānaṃ
tika-s0203t:570_14: “atītaṃ taṇhādivasena nābhinanditabbaṃ sabbaso avijjamānattā sasavisāṇaṃ viya,
tika-s0203t:570_18: anāgatapatthanā pana saphalāpi siyāti na sabbaso paṭikkhipitabbāti? Na,
tika-s0203t:571_5: Tena araññe vā rukkhamūle vā pabbatakandarādīsu vāti ṭhānaniyamābhāvā anupassanāya sātaccakāritaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:571_6: Yamakādivasena paribrūhiyamānā vipassanā viya paṭipakkhehi akopaniyāva hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:571_10: Kiṃ etāya pariyāyakathāyāti nippariyāyatova asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:571_12: Kathaṃ pana niccassa nibbānassa anubrūhanā hotīti āha “punappuna”ntiādi.
tika-s0203t:571_14: tesaṃ ārammaṇampi atthato anubrūhitaṃ nāma hoti bahulaṃ manasikārenāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:572_4: Tassa senāti tassa maccuno sahakaraṇaṭṭhena senā viyāti senā.
tika-s0203t:572_12: Tattha tattha ca saṅgaṃ āsattiṃ arati detīti saṅgaro pubbabhāge vā saṅgaraṇavasena tassa paṭijānanavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0203t:574_1: Manuññarūpavaseneva evaṃrūpo ahosīnti atītaṃ anvāgameti tattha nandiyāsamanvānayanato.
tika-s0203t:574_3: Kusalasukhasomanassavedanāvasenāti kusalavedanāvasena sukhavedanāvasena somanassavedanāvasenāti paccekaṃ vedanāsaddo yojetabbo.
tika-s0203t:574_7: na maññati amanuññopi samāno samanuññabhāvasseva vasena maññanāya pavattanato.
tika-s0203t:575_1: Uḷārasundarabhāvamukheneva anāgatesupi rūpādīsu taṇhādiṭṭhikappanā pavattatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:576_1: Vattabbaṃ siyāti yathā nandiyā asamanvānayanajotanaṃ byatirekamukhena patiṭṭhapetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:576_6: evaṃ “paccuppannañca yo dhamma”ntiādikassa uddesassa byatirekamukhena vibhaṅge vuccamāne vipassanāpaṭikkhepavasena,
tika-s0203t:576_10: yasmā “paccuppannañca yo dhamma”ntiādikassa uddesassa byatirekamukheneva vipassanāpaṭikkhepavasena,
tika-s0203t:576_16: Abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ saṃhīratīti mātikaṃ uddharitvāti kathetukamyatāya mātikāvasena paduddhāraṃ katvā, “idha,
tika-s0203t:576_18: asutavā sutavā”ti ca ādinā vitthāro vutto.
tika-s0203t:576_19: Vipassanāya abhāvatoti vipassanāya abhāvitatāya avikkhambhitatāya taṇhādiṭṭhīhi sapattehi viya tattha tattha ṭhapanāya ākaḍḍhīyati,
tika-s0203t:576_20: tattha tattha visaye tato eva apāyasamuddaṃ saṃsārasamuddaṃ ānīyati.
tika-s0203t:579_1: Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivattetvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa sammadeva layanaṃ appanaṃ paṭisallānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:580_2: Taṃ pana pasaṃsā hotīti pasaṃsattho sādhusaddo.
tika-s0203t:580_5: kevalaṃ guṇasaṃkittanavasena thomanā pasaṃsāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0203t:583_1: Uṇhabhāvena tapanato tapaṃ udakaṃ etassāti tapodā, rahado.
tika-s0203t:583_7: Nāgabhavanāgatopi hi so rahado tato upari manussaloke jalāsayena sambaddho hoti.
tika-s0203t:585_2: paṭhamadutiyacatutthasuttesu pana khandhavasena vibhajanaṃ katvā idha tathā akatvā evaṃ desanāya ṭhapanaṃ tato aññathā āyatanavasena vibhajanatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:585_3: Evaṃ vibhinnā hi saṅkhepavitthārato anavasesā sammasanupagā dhammā vibhajitvā dassitā honti;
tika-s0203t:585_4: ayaṃ kirettha bhagavato ajjhāsayo therena nayato gahitoti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:585_6: Tattha dvādasāyatanavaseneva mātikaṃ ṭhapesīti lokiyāni dvādasāyatanāni eva sandhāya mātikaṃ ṭhapesi,
tika-s0203t:585_8: evaṃ yadi bhagavatā idhāpi vibhajanaṃ icchitaṃ siyā,
tika-s0203t:585_10: yasmā pana tathā avibhajitvāva gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho,
tika-s0203t:585_11: tasmā dvādasāyatanavasenevettha vibhajanaṃ bhagavatā ca adhippetanti nayaggāhe ṭhatvā thero vibhaji. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:585_14: Apade padaṃ dassitaṃ ākāse padaṃ kataṃ sādhāraṇassa atthassa visiṭṭhavisayatāya dassitattā.
tika-s0203t:590_10: Pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā dinnalābhasakkārassa asādiyanato manussapathe na vasanti.
tika-s0203t:591_2: Paññāpayogamandatāya paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvāpādanena samuttejetuṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ…pe… abhāsi.
tika-s0203t:592_0: Savanamukhena byañjanaso atthaso ca upadhāraṇaṃ uggaṇhananti āha –
tika-s0203t:592_5: taṃ pana paresu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:596_4: yebhuyyena sattā daharakāle suddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:597_1: Paṇḍito gharamāvaseti yasmā appatarepi byayamāne bhogā khīyanti,
tika-s0203t:597_3: tasmā viññujātiko kiñci byayaṃ akatvā ayameva uppādento gharāvāsaṃ anutiṭṭheyyāti lobhādesitamatthaṃ vadati.
tika-s0203t:598_1: Lobhavasikassa hi gati nirayo vā tiracchānayoni vā.
tika-s0203t:598_9: Niraye nibbattissati katokāsassa kammassa paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:600_5: Ñātomhi imināti iminā mama puttena mayhaṃ purimajātiyaṃ pitāti evaṃ ñāto amhīti jānitvā.
tika-s0203t:600_16: Na kho panetaṃ yuttaṃ ‘aṅgapaccaṅgāni yāva tesaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇa’nti;
tika-s0203t:600_18: Samaṇo gotamo taṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhajitvā kathessati,
tika-s0203t:600_19: evāyaṃ sabbaññūti nicchayo me apaṇṇako bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0203t:600_21: “tiracchānagataṃ manussaṃ vā āvisitvā icchitatthakasāvanaṃ nāma mahāmantavijjāvasena hoti;
tika-s0203t:600_22: tasmā na ettāvatā samaṇassa gotamassa sabbaññutā sunicchitā hoti.
tika-s0203t:600_23: Yaṃ nūnāhaṃ kammaphalamassa uddissa pañhaṃ puccheyyaṃ,
tika-s0203t:600_24: tattha ca me cittaṃ ārādhento pañhaṃ byākarissati.
tika-s0203t:600_25: Evāyaṃ sabbaññūti vinicchayo me bhavissatīti te pañhe pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0203t:601_9: Yavati phalaṃ sabhāvato bhinnampi abhinnaṃ viya missitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0203t:601_18: añño koci issaro brahmā vā na karoti tādisaṃ kattuṃ sajjituṃ asamatthabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:601_25: kilesapayogena vipākavaṭṭaṃ nibbattaṃ kammapavattitamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:601_26: “Kathitassa atthaṃ na sañjānāsī”ti saṅkhepato vatvā nanu bhagavā mahākāruṇiko paresaṃ ñāpanatthameva dhammaṃ desetīti āha –
tika-s0203t:602_2: yathā taṃ phalaṃ dātuṃ samatthaṃ hoti,
tika-s0203t:602_5: Tādisaṃ pana attano kicce anūnaṃ nāma hotīti āha “paripuṇṇenā”ti.
tika-s0203t:602_6: Samādinnenāti ettha samādānaṃ nāma taṇhādiṭṭhīhi gahaṇaṃ parāmasananti āha –
tika-s0203t:603_1: Dubbalaṃ upaghātakameva siyāti upapīḷakassa visayaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:603_6: nanu upapīḷakasabhāvaṃ kammaṃ janakasabhāvaṃ na hotīti?
tika-s0203t:603_8: yathā manussā paccatthikaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ kiñci kātuṃ asamatthāpi keci ālambanavasena samatthā viya attānaṃ dassenti,
tika-s0203t:603_12: sace tasmiṃ anokāse eva sayaṃ vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ labheyya,
tika-s0203t:603_14: yasmā taṃ kammaṃ balavaṃ hutvā avasesapaccayasamavāyena vipaccituṃ āraddhaṃ,
tika-s0203t:603_15: tasmā itaraṃ tassa vipākaṃ vibādhentaṃ upapīḷakaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
tika-s0203t:603_17: Kiccavasena hi nesaṃ kammānaṃ etā samaññā,
tika-s0203t:603_19: na kusalāni viya upatthambhāni honti nibbattatthāya.
tika-s0203t:603_20: Pīḷetvāti viheṭhetvā paṭighāṭanādivasena ucchutelayantādayo viya ucchutilādike vibādhetvā.
tika-s0203t:605_0: Aṭṭhusabhagamanaṃ katvāti aṭṭhausabhappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ paccatthikaṃ uddissa dhanuggaho anuyāyiṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t:605_3: Tattheva pāteyya accāsannaṃ katvā sarassa khittattā.
tika-s0203t:606_5: Na dīghāyukatādīni hi appāyukatāsaṃvattanikena kammunā nibbattāni;
tika-s0203t:606_7: na atidubbaṇṇaṃ appesakkhaṃ nīcakulīnaṃ duppaññaṃ vā vaṇṇavantatādivasena.
tika-s0203t:607_1: Upapīḷakupaghātā nāma kusalavipākapaṭibāhakāti adhippāyena “dve akusalānevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:607_2: Upatthambhakaṃ kusalamevāti ettha yathā janakaṃ ubhayasabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0203t:607_3: evaṃ itaresampi ubhayasabhāvatāya vuccamānāya na koci virodho.
tika-s0203t:607_4: Devadattādīnañhi nāgādīnaṃ ito anuppavacchitānaṃ petādīnañca narakādīsu akusalakammavipākassa upatthambhanupapīḷanupaghātanāni na na sambhavanti.
tika-s0203t:607_5: Evañca katvā yā heṭṭhā bahūsu ānantariyesu ekena gahitapaṭisandhikassa itaresaṃ tassa anubalappadāyitā vuttā,
tika-s0203t:607_7: Yasmiñhi kamme kate janakanibbattaṃ kusalaphalaṃ vā akusalaphalaṃ vā byādhidhātusamatādinimittaṃ vibādhīyati,
tika-s0203t:607_9: Yasmiṃ pana kate jātisamatthassa paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattiyañca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ uppatti hoti,
tika-s0203t:607_11: Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhāvicchedapaccayānuppattiyā
tika-s0203t:607_14: Tathā yasmiṃ kate janakanibbattaṃ kusalaphalaṃ akusalaphalaṃ vā byādhidhātusamatādinimittaṃ vibādhīyati,
tika-s0203t:607_16: Yasmiṃ pana kate janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarapabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā vicchijjati,
tika-s0203t:608_2: Svāyamupaghātakabhāvo dvidhā icchitabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “pāṇātipātinā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:608_5: tassa tena abhisaṅkhatatā avassaṃ icchitabbā tattheva tassa vipākassa vinibandhanato.
tika-s0203t:608_6: Etena kusalassa kammassa āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva pāṇātipāto tādisaṃ sāmatthiyupaghātaṃ karotīti dasseti,
tika-s0203t:608_8: “Dīghāyukā”tiādinā upaghātasāmatthiyena khette uppannasassaṃ viya upapattiniyāmakā dhammāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:608_9: Upapatti niyatavisese vipaccituṃ okāse karonte eva kusalakamme ākaḍḍhiyamānapaṭisandhikaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ appāyukatthāya niyametīti āha –
tika-s0203t:608_11: Pāṇātipātacetanāya accantakaṭukavipākattā sanniṭṭhānacetanāya niraye nibbattati tassā atthassa khīṇābhāvato;
tika-s0203t:608_12: itare pana na tathā bhāriyāti āha –
tika-s0203t:609_12: Iminā nayenāti iminā appāyukadīghāyukasaṃvattanikesu kammesu yathāvuttena taṃ saṃvattanikavibhāvananayena.
tika-s0203t:610_2: Tathevāti yathā pāṇātipātakammaṃ atthato evaṃ vadati nāmāti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:610_5: sabbametena labbhatī”ti vacanato yathā sabbakusalaṃ sabbāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ upanissayo,
tika-s0203t:610_6: evaṃ sabbaṃ akusalaṃ sabbāsaṃ vipattīnaṃ upanissayoti,
tika-s0203t:610_8: Tathā hi pāṇātipātakammavasenapi ayaṃ nayo dassito.
tika-s0203t:611_3: Issaṃ bandhatīti issaṃ anubandhati issāsahitameva cittaṃ anupavatteti.
tika-s0203t:611_6: Sā panassa appānubhāvatā parivārābhāvena pākaṭā hotīti āha “appaparivāro”ti.
tika-s0203t:612_1: Macchariyavasena na dātā hotīti sabbaso deyyadhammassa abhāvena na dātā na hoti.
tika-s0203t:612_2: Amaccharī hi puggalo sati deyyadhamme yathārahaṃ detiyeva.
tika-s0203t:613_5: Na hi pavatte sakkā kātunti sambandho.
tika-s0203t:613_6: Tena pavattivipākadāyino kammassa visayo esoti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:614_2: aparipucchāhetu pana kattabbākaraṇādīhi siyā nirayanibbattīti pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-s0203t:617_1: Kammassa moghabhāvo nāma phalena tucchatā phalābhāvoti āha –
tika-s0203t:617_4: Paribbājako pana “sacca”nti iminā tameva saphalanti vadati.
tika-s0203t:617_10: Sāpi hi titthiyānaṃ antare pākaṭā jātāti.
tika-s0203t:617_13: tato ca aññathāva dosāropanabhayena gahetvā tato bhagavantaṃ thero rakkhatīti adhippāyena paribbājako,
tika-s0203t:617_17: Kammanti sañcetanikassapi kammassa attano samaye icchitattā paribbājakena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:618_2: Samāgamadassanaṃ sandhāyāti katthacipi tassa dassanaṃ sandhāya,
tika-s0203t:619_5: Sace bhāsitaṃ bhaveyyāti imaṃ īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ sandhāya āyasmatā samiddhinā bhāsitaṃ siyā nu bhagavā,
tika-s0203t:620_4: Na hi taṃ ayoniso ummujjanaṃ dibbacakkhuvisayanti?
tika-s0203t:620_7: Adhippāyenevāti udāyittherassa adhippāyeneva gayhamānena taṃ ayoniyo ummujjanaṃ aññāsi.
tika-s0203t:620_8: Sannisīdituṃ pubbe nisinnākārena sannisīdituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0203t:622_0: Yadi kāyadvāre pavattato aññattha adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti,
tika-s0203t:623_1: Yathā hi “kāyena vācāya manasā”ti ettha yathālābhaggahaṇavasena manasā sukhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyanti
tika-s0203t:623_2: ayamattho arūpāvacarakusalepi labbhatīti sukhampi janeti ukkaṭṭhassa ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa soḷasavipākacittanibbattanato,
tika-s0203t:623_6: suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti idāni nippariyāyato puna dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:623_9: Etassāti dukkhavedaniyassa pavattivaseneva yujjamānattā etassa vasena sabbaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyañca pavattivaseneva vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0203t:625_11: pāpakāni kammānī”ti ca ādīni hatthidassakaandhāviya diṭṭhamatte eva ṭhatvā acittakadassanañca gaṇhanti.
tika-s0203t:625_16: sammā yoniso manasi karoti etenāti sammāmanasikāroti vuccatīti adhippāyena,
tika-s0203t:625_19: Yasmiṃ manasikāre sati tassa dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ ijjhati,
tika-s0203t:625_25: “ye dassannaṃ kusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ pūritattā”ti diṭṭhithāmenāti diṭṭhivasena diṭṭhibalena.
tika-s0203t:625_31: Voharatīti attano gahitaggahaṇaṃ paresaṃ dīpento voharati.
tika-s0203t:626_6: Assāti mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇassa mātikāṭṭhapanameva dibbacakkhukānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vasena anuññātabbassa ca dassanavasena uddesabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:626_9: Etesaṃ dibbacakkhukānanti etesaṃ heṭṭhā catūsupi vāresu āgatānaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:626_24: nirayaṃ upapanna”nti ca imesu dvīsu pāṭhapadesesu.
tika-s0203t:626_36: Yathā te appahīnavipallāsā padesañāṇasamaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavibhaṅgaṃ sañjānanti,
tika-s0203t:626_37: tato aññathāva sabbaso pahīnavipallāsassa tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgatassa sammāsambuddhassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-s0203t:627_1: Iminā dibbacakkhukena yaṃ kammaṃ karonto diṭṭho,
tika-s0203t:627_12: Diṭṭheva dhammeti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:627_14: Aparasmiṃ pariyāyeti aññasmiṃ yattha katthaci bhave.
tika-s0203t:628_1: Ekaṃ vipākarāsinti tasseva aṅgena ekaṃ vipākasamudāyaṃ.
tika-s0203t:628_2: Imināti yathāvuttena dibbacakkhukena samaṇena brāhmaṇena vā adiṭṭhā.
tika-s0203t:628_3: Tayoti “pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādinā vuttā tayo.
tika-s0203t:628_4: Dve vipākarāsīti diṭṭhadhammavedaniyo aparāpariyāyavedaniyoti dve vipākarāsī.
tika-s0203t:628_8: adiṭṭhā tayoti diṭṭhe ca adiṭṭhe ca cattāro kammarāsī,
tika-s0203t:628_11: Imāni satta ṭhānānīti yathāvuttāni satta ñāṇassa pavattanaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0203t:628_12: “Imassa nāma kammassa idaṃ phalaṃ nibbatta”nti kammassa,
tika-s0203t:629_3: Attano phale bhāsanaṃ dibbanaṃ ābhāsananti āha –
tika-s0203t:629_7: abhiṇhaṃ upaṭṭhānena vā tassa maraṇacittassa āsanne.
tika-s0203t:629_10: Āsanne kusalaṃ katanti idhāpi āsannatā pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:630_3: Titthiyā kammantaravipākantaresu akusalatāya yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ yassa kassaci vipākassa kāraṇaṃ katvā gaṇhanti
tika-s0203t:630_9: Eseva nayo paṭhamadutiyapuggalavasena purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kammānaṃ yojanānayo vutto upaṭṭhānākāravasena.
tika-s0203t:630_10: Ayameva tatiyacatutthapuggalavasena pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kammānaṃ yojanānayo.
tika-s0203t:630_11: Tatiyassa hi kammassa kusalattā tassa ca sagge nibbattattā tattha kāraṇabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti;
tika-s0203t:630_13: tassa pana niraye nibbattattā tattha nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ akusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti.
tika-s0203t:633_1: Veditabbānīti ettha yathā viditāni cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vaṭṭadukkhasamatikkamāya honti,
tika-s0203t:633_4: Tattha vipassanāya ārammaṇato maggena asammohato jānanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:633_6: Mano savisesaṃ upavicarati ārammaṇe pavattati etehīti manopavicārā,
tika-s0203t:633_8: Ārammaṇe hi abhiniropanānumajjanehi vitakkavicārehi saha cittaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0203t:633_11: Sattā pajjanti etehi yathārahaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭañcāti sattapadā,
tika-s0203t:635_0: Cakkhumhi samphassoti cakkhuṃ nissāya uppanno samphasso. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:636_0: Yathā kevalena viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0203t:636_2: Tena pāḷiyaṃ cakkhunāti nissayamukhena nissitakiccaṃ vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:636_9: Sampayuttadhammānampi upavicaraṇaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃyevettha kiccanti “vitakkavicārasaṅkhātā manopavicārā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:636_10: Somanassayutto upavicāro somanassūpavicāro yathā “ājaññaratho”ti āha “somanassena saddhi”ntiādi.
tika-s0203t:637_7: Piyabhāvo pana kantasaddeneva kathitoti kāmitabbānaṃ mano rametīti manoramānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:637_9: Tāya gahetabbatāya iṭṭhabhāvāpādanena paṭisaṅkhatatāya ca paṭisaṃyuttānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:637_10: Atīte kataṃ uppajjati ārammaṇikaanubhavanassa asambhavatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:637_11: Edisaṃ anussaraṇaṃ diṭṭhaggahaṇānussarena ca hotīti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:638_1: Vipariṇāmavirāganirodhanti jarāya maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇāmetabbañceva,
tika-s0203t:638_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā uppannaṃ rūpaṃ tenevākārena na tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0203t:638_6: vigacchantañca bhaṅguppattiyā nirujjhatīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:638_9: anubodhañāṇaṃ pana adhippetaṃ vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya vasenāti “vipassanāpaññāyā”ti vuttaṃ upavicāraniddesabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:638_12: Saṅkhārānaṃ bhedaṃ passatoti sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṃ vīthipaṭipannena vipassanāñāṇena passato.
tika-s0203t:639_3: Yato yatoti yathā yathā nayavipassanādīsu yena yena sammasanākārenāti attho.
tika-s0203t:639_5: Amatantaṃ vijānatanti vijānantānaṃ viññūnaṃ āraddhavipassanānaṃ taṃ pītipāmojjaṃ amatādhigamahetutāya amatanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:640_0: Chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagateti rūpādivasena chabbidhe iṭṭhārammaṇe yathārahaṃ chasu dvāresu āpāthagate.
tika-s0203t:641_2: Anuttaravimokkho nāma arahattaṃ idha adhippetaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena.
tika-s0203t:641_4: na hi adhigataṃ arahattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0203t:641_5: na ca taṃ ārabbha pihā pavattatīti?
tika-s0203t:641_8: Anussutiladdhaṃ pana parikappasiddhaṃ arahattaṃ uddissa patthanaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-s0203t:641_14: taṃ panetaṃ domanassaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa uppajjati patthanāya sahāvattanato.
tika-s0203t:641_15: Na hi lobhadosānaṃ saha vutti atthi.
tika-s0203t:642_2: Tena tena maggodhinā tassa tassa apāyagamanīyakilesodhissa anavasesato jitattā khīṇāsavo nippariyāyato odhijino nāma;
tika-s0203t:642_7: Āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvāti appavattikaraṇavasena sabbaso āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavova nippariyāyato vipākajino nāma;
tika-s0203t:642_11: Apassantassa rūpanti pāḷito padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:642_12: Pāḷiyaṃ pubbe “puthujjanassā”ti vatvā puna “assutavato puthujjanassā”ti vacanaṃ andhaputhujjanassāyaṃ upekkhā,
tika-s0203t:642_14: Gehassitā upekkhā hi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇavatthuṃ apekkhasseva,
tika-s0203t:642_16: iṭṭhamajjhatte vā ārammaṇe siyāti vuttaṃ “iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate”ti.
tika-s0203t:643_0: Iṭṭhe arajjantassa aniṭṭhe adussantassāti idaṃ yebhuyyena sattānaṃ iṭṭhe rajjanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:643_2: Ayoniyomanasikāro hi taṃtaṃārammaṇavasena na katthacipi javananiyamaṃ karotīti vuttaviparītepi ārammaṇe rajjanadussanaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0203t:643_4: Asamapekkhaneti asamaṃ ayuttadassane ayoniso sammohapubbakaṃ ārammaṇassa gahaṇe.
tika-s0203t:644_2: Nissāya ceva āgamma cāti āgamanaṭṭhānabhūte nissayapaccayabhūte ca katvā.
tika-s0203t:644_3: Atikkantāni nāma honti vikkhambhanena ussārentā samussārentā.
tika-s0203t:645_3: saṃkilesadhammānaṃ balavabhāvato sātisayaṃ pana balavabhāvaṃ sandhāya “idāni balavatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:645_4: Balavabhāvato vodānadhammānaṃ adhigamassa adhippetattā hettha nekkhammassitadomanassānampi pahānaṃ jotitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:646_1: Jhānassa alābhino ca lābhino ca pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārasammasanaṃ sandhāya,
tika-s0203t:646_3: Upekkhāsahagatāti bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvaṃ āgamma kadāci ajjhupekkhanavasenapi hi sammasanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0203t:646_5: sammasitadhammavasena vā āgamanavipassanāya bahulaṃ somanassasahagatabhāvato “vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā somanassasahagatāvā”ti niyametvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:646_10: upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti somanassasahagatā vāti attho.
tika-s0203t:646_11: Idaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ catutthajjhānādipādakato eva upekkhāsahagataṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanaṃ nissāya somanassasahagatāya vipassanāya pahānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:647_3: Puggalajjhāsayoti pādakajjhānassa sammasitajjhānassa ca bhede sati paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa,
tika-s0203t:647_4: “aho vata mayhaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ bhaveyya caturaṅgika”ntiādinā pubbe pavattaajjhāsayo.
tika-s0203t:647_7: niyameti tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ
tika-s0203t:647_9: Eteneva hi paṭhamatheravāde apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti,
tika-s0203t:647_11: Evaṃ sesavādesupi vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:647_12: “tesampi vāde ayameva pubbabhāge vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametī”ti. Vuttāva,
tika-s0203t:649_0: Aññāṇupekkhā aññā saddādīsu tattha tattheva vijjamānattā.
tika-s0203t:649_1: Rūpesūti ca iminā na kevalaṃ rūpāyatanavisesā eva gahitā,
tika-s0203t:650_5: taṇhā yassa guṇassa vasena atthe saddaniveso,
tika-s0203t:650_11: taṃ pajahati upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgataṃ saṅkhāravicinane majjhattabhūtaṃ upekkhaṃ.
tika-s0203t:651_11: ekacce na sussūsanti ekacce sussūsantīti vā,
tika-s0203t:651_14: Satiṃ paṭṭhapentoti paṭighānunayehi anavassutattā tadubhayanivattattā sabbadā satiṃ upaṭṭhapento.
tika-s0203t:651_17: Ādarena sotumicchā idha sussūsāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:651_19: Na aññāti “na aññāyā”ti vattabbe yakāralopena niddesoti āha “na jānanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0203t:652_1: Nekkhammassitadomanassassapi satthu pasaṅgavasena “na ceva attamano hotī”ti attamanapaṭikkhepena anattamanatā vuttā viya hotīti taṃ paṭisedhento –
tika-s0203t:652_8: Uppilāvitoti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo uppilāvitattassa bodhimūle eva pahīnattā.
tika-s0203t:652_11: Etaṃ vuttanti etaṃ “attamano ceva hotī”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā satthu anavajjāya cittārādhanāya sambhavato.
tika-s0203t:653_2: Iriyāpathaparivattanavasena aparivattitvā ekadisāya eva sattadisāvidhāvanassa idhādhippetattā sāritānaṃ
tika-s0203t:656_4: Atha vā tuleyyāti tulanabhūtāya paññāya tassa dhammassa paggahādividhinā parituleyya.
tika-s0203t:656_5: Tīreyyāti tīraṇabhūtāya paññāya tattha ñāṇakiriyāsamāpanavasena tīreyya.
tika-s0203t:656_6: Pariggaṇheyyāti tathāsamāpanno ānisaṃse assādaādīnave ca vicineyya.
tika-s0203t:656_7: Paricchindeyyāti paricchindabhūtena ñāṇena atthaṃ paricchinditvā jāneyya.
tika-s0203t:656_12: Tañhi bhāvanācittenābhibhuyya avissajjitvā gayhamānaṃ ajjhattaṃ viya hotīti “gocarajjhatta”nti vuccati.
tika-s0203t:656_13: Bhāvanaṃ āraddhassa bhikkhuno yadi bhāvanārammaṇe nikanti uppajjeyya,
tika-s0203t:656_14: tāya nikantiyā upari bhāvanaṃ vissajjetvā cittasaṃkocavasena saṇṭhitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0203t:656_22: Tathā aggahaṇeneva hi taṇhāparitāsādivasena na paritasseyya.
tika-s0203t:656_24: Avasesassa ca dukkhassāti vā jātijarāmaraṇasīsena vipākadukkhassa gahitattā kilesadukkhassa ceva saṃsāradukkhassa cāti attho.
tika-s0203t:658_1: Nikantivasena asaṇṭhitanti apekkhāvasena saṇṭhitaṃ nikantiṃ pahāya pavattamānaṃ upari visesāvahatoti.
tika-s0203t:659_4: Kathaṃ panesā anupādāparitassanā hotīti mahātherassa adhippāyaṃ vivarituṃ codanaṃ samuṭṭhapeti?
tika-s0203t:659_7: Upādāparitassanāva assa tathā upādātabbassa tatheva upādinnattā.
tika-s0203t:659_13: tassa pana ayathābhūtagāhitāya paramatthato ca abhāvato.
tika-s0203t:659_15: Anupādāparitassanāyeva nāma hoti upādātabbākārassa abhāvena taṃ anupādiyitvā eva paritassanāti katvā.
tika-s0203t:660_0: Parivattatīti na tadeva rūpaṃ aññathā pavattaṃ parivattati,
tika-s0203t:660_1: atha kho pakatijahanena sabhāvavigamena nassati bhijjati.
tika-s0203t:660_4: “Rūpaṃ attā”tiādi micchāgāhavasena viññāṇassa rūpabhedena vuttassa bhedānuparivatti hoti.
tika-s0203t:660_5: Vipariṇāmaṃ anugantvā viparivattanataṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ vipariṇāmānuparivattaṃ;
tika-s0203t:660_6: tato samuppannā paritassanā vipariṇāmānuparivattajā paritassanāti dassento āha –
tika-s0203t:660_11: taṃ vata me natthī”tiādinā pavattā akusalacittuppādadhammā.
tika-s0203t:660_18: Aggahetvā paritassanāti gahetabbassa abhāvena gahaṇampi avijjamānapakkhiyamevāti aggahetvā paritassanā nāma hoti.
tika-s0203t:661_1: Kammaviññāṇameva natthi sati kammaviññāṇe rūpabhedānuparivatti siyāti kammaviññāṇābhāvadassanamukhena khīṇāsavassa sabbaso kilesābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:664_3: Na avakkhipeyyāti gehassitavasena virodhavasena na niggaṇheyya.
tika-s0203t:664_4: Anurodhena vinā sampahaṃsanavasena yathābhūtaguṇakathanaṃ nevussādanā vajjābhāvato;
tika-s0203t:664_5: tathā virodhena vinā vivecanavasena yathābhūtadosakathanaṃ na apasādanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:664_6: Sabhāvamevāti yathābhūtasabhāvameva kassaci puggalassa anādesakaraṇavasena katheyya,
tika-s0203t:664_10: Parammukhā avaṇṇanti svāyaṃ rahovādo pesuññūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto idhādhippetoti āha “pisuṇavācanti attho”ti.
tika-s0203t:664_16: Svāyaṃ yasmā kilesehi ākiṇṇo saṃkiliṭṭho eva ca hoti,
tika-s0203t:665_5: Tathā sapariḷāhoti vipākapariḷāhena ceva kilesapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāho.
tika-s0203t:666_1: Vaṭṭato nissarituṃ adatvā tattheva sīdāpanato micchāpaṭipadābhāvena satte saṃyojetīti saṃyojanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:666_3: Na taṇhāyeva mānādayopi saṃyojanattaṃ sādhenti nāma sabbaso saṃyojanato suṭṭhu bandhanato.
tika-s0203t:667_2: ye attakilamathānuyogaṃ anuyuttā”ti evamāgataṃ imaṃ catukkaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0203t:667_4: vatvā taṃ nissāya ṭhapitabhāvaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:667_6: Ussādanāapasādanā paññāyanti tathāgatena vinetabbapuggalavasena dhammadesanāya pavattetabbato.
tika-s0203t:667_8: ācārasampannoti vā natthi paresaṃ anuddesakavasena dhammadesanāya pavattanato.
tika-s0203t:668_2: Na hi kadāci nindiyo pasaṃsiyo hoti,
tika-s0203t:668_3: taṃ pana kālaṃ ñatvāva kathetabbanti āha,
tika-s0203t:668_5: Khīṇavādepi eseva nayo tassa rahovādena samānayogakkhamattā.
tika-s0203t:670_2: na ito aññathāti taṃ janapadaniruttiṃ abhinivisitvā samudācarati.
tika-s0203t:670_3: Atidhāvananti samaññaṃ nāmetaṃ lokasaṅketasiddhā paññattīti paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā paramatthato thāmasā parāmassa voharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:672_1: Mariyādabhājanīyanti yathāvuttasammāpaṭipadāya micchāpaṭipadāya ca aññamaññaṃ saṅkarabhāvavibhājanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:672_2: Raṇanti sattā etehi kandanti akandantāpi kandanakāraṇabhāvatoti raṇā;
tika-s0203t:672_10: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “sadukkho eso dhammo”tiādinā āgatattā kāmasukhānuyogādayopi “saraṇo”ti vuttāti dukkhādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t:672_11: raṇabhāvo tannibbattakasabhāvānaṃ akusalānaṃ saraṇatā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:673_0: Vatthuṃ sodhetīti nirodhasamāpajjanena mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena dakkhiṇeyyavatthubhūtaṃ attānaṃ visodheti;
tika-s0203t:673_1: nirodhasamāpattiyā vatthuvisodhanaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ mahākassapattherādīnaṃ dinnadakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā dīpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:673_8: Evaṃ pana kātuṃ sakkāti sāvakānampi kimevaṃ lahuvuṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ sāvakesu ciṇṇavasībhāvo sambhavatīti pucchati.
tika-s0203t:676_1: Aparikkhīṇāyukaṃ pukkusātikulaputtaṃ uddissa gamananti katvā vuttaṃ “turitagamanacārika”nti.
tika-s0203t:676_2: Mama vāsupagamanena tava cittassa aphāsukaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ sace natthi.
tika-s0203t:676_4: Dinnaṃ dinnameva vaṭṭatīti ekavāraṃ dinnaṃ dinnameva yuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:676_6: Kataṃ katamevāti saṅgahatthaṃ kataṃ anucchavikakammaṃ katameva,
tika-s0203t:677_0: Pukkusātimhi ubhayathāpi kulaputtabhāvo paripuṇṇo evāti āha –
tika-s0203t:677_3: Aṅke nipannadārakaṃ viya janaṃ toseti tuṭṭhiṃ pāpeti.
tika-s0203t:678_3: Lākhāya vaṭṭāpetvāti mukhaṃ pidahitvā lākhāparikammaṃ kāretvā.
tika-s0203t:680_1: “kinnu kho pesemī”ti kasmā vīmaṃsaṃ āpajjīti āha –
tika-s0203t:680_4: Vicinituṃ āraddho ratanassa anekavidhattā uttaruttariñca paṇītatarādibhāvato.
tika-s0203t:681_3: yasmā pana imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana buddhena sadiso na vijjatīti.
tika-s0203t:682_2: Tasmāti yasmā paripuṇṇaṃ ekadivasampi tasmiṃ padese buddhānaṃ āvāsapariggaho natthi, tasmā.
tika-s0203t:683_0: Evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇassa bhagavato īdiso samudāgamoti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:683_2: Evaṃ sampannasamudāgamassa tadanurūpā ayaṃ phalasampadāti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:684_5: Chadvārasaṃvaraṃ satisampajaññanti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ dvārānaṃ saṃvaraṇavasena sattaṭṭhānikaṃ satisampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0203t:684_11: Visuddhipaṭipāṭiyā yāva āsavakkhayā imaṃ paṭipattiṃ ekadesena likhi.
tika-s0203t:685_1: Bahi vatthena veṭhetvāti paṭhamaṃ sukhumakambalena veṭhetvā paṭipāṭiyā tettiṃsāya samuggesu pakkhipitvā tato bahi sukhumavatthena veṭhetvā chādetvā.
tika-s0203t:686_0: Raññā paṇṇākāraṃ uddissa katapūjāsakkārassa amaccato sutattā paṇṇākāraṃ uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nīcāsane nisinno.
tika-s0203t:686_1: Nāyaṃ aññassa ratanassa bhavissatīti ayaṃ parihāro aññassa maṇimuttādibhedassa ratanassa na bhavissati maṇimuttādīhi abhisaṅkhatattā.
tika-s0203t:686_2: Balavasomanassaṃ uppajji ciratanakālaṃ buddhasāsane bhāvitabhāvanatāya vāsitavāsanatāya ghaṭe dīpo viya
tika-s0203t:687_3: Antaraṃ karotīti dvinnaṃ pādānaṃ antaraṃ taṃ lekhaṃ karoti,
tika-s0203t:687_5: Tassā gatamaggenāti tāya deviyā vivaṭṭamānāya nāsitāya gatamaggena.
tika-s0203t:688_1: Tadā satthāraṃyeva manasi katvā tanninnabhāvena gacchanto,
tika-s0203t:688_3: “ettha nu kho satthā vasatī”ti parivitakkasseva abhāvato;
tika-s0203t:688_4: rājagahaṃ pana patvā rañño pesitasāsanavasena tattha ca vihārassa bahubhāvato satthā kahaṃ vasatīti pucchi.
tika-s0203t:688_5: Satthu ekakasseva nikkhamanaṃ pañcacattālīsa yojanāni padasā gamanañca dhammapūjāvasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:688_6: Dhammapūjāya ca buddhānaṃ āciṇṇabhāvo heṭṭhā vitthāritoyeva.
tika-s0203t:688_7: Buddhasobhaṃ pana paṭicchādetvā aññātakavesena tattha gamanaṃ tassa kulaputtassa vissatthavasena maggadarathapaṭipassambhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:688_8: Appaṭipassaddhamaggadaratho hi dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ na hotīti.
tika-s0203t:689_1: Atirekatiyojanasatantiādinā anvayato byatirekato ca maccheravinayane sabrahmacārīnaṃ ovādadānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:689_2: Accantasukhumālotiādinā satthu dhammagāravena saddhiṃ kulaputtassapi dhammagāravaṃ saṃsandati sametīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:689_3: Tena bhagavato katassa paccuggamanassa ṭhānagatabhāvaṃ vibhāvento aññesampi bhabbarūpānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ yathārahaṃ saṅgaho kātabboti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:690_1: Ānubhāvenāti iddhānubhāvena yathā so sotapathaṃ na upagacchati,
tika-s0203t:690_9: Sīhaseyyāya nipannassapi hi ekacce sarīrāvayavā adhokhittavikkhittā viya dissanti.
tika-s0203t:690_10: Kaṭiyaṃ dvinnaṃ ūrusandhīnaṃ dvinnañca jāṇusandhīnaṃ vasena catusandhikapallaṅkaṃ.
tika-s0203t:690_12: “kaṃsi tva”ntiādinā apucchite kathāpavatti eva na hoti.
tika-s0203t:690_13: Appatiṭṭhitāya kathāya na sañjāyatīti tathā pana pucchāvasena kathāya appavattitāya upari dhammakathā na sañjāyati na uppajjati.
tika-s0203t:691_0: Sabhāvameva kathetīti attano bhagavato adiṭṭhapubbattā “adiṭṭhapubbakaṃ kathamahaṃ jāneyya”nti sabhāvameva kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayameva katheti;
tika-s0203t:691_1: na pana sadevakassa lokassa supākaṭaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ buddharūpakāyasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0203t:691_2: Atha vā sabhāvameva kathetīti “idameva”nti jānantopi tadā bhagavato ruciyā tathāpavattamānaṃ rūpakāyasabhāvameva katheti appavikkhambhanti adhippāyo. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:692_1: “Pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā”ti vatvā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya akathane kāraṇaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadañca sarūpato dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:692_3: Aparisuddhāyapi pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vipassanā tathā na kiccakārī,
tika-s0203t:692_7: Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā ca nāma saṅkhepato pannarasa caraṇadhammāti āha –
tika-s0203t:692_11: Cirakālaṃ paribhāvitāya paripakkagatāya hetusampadāya upaṭṭhāpitaṃ sāmaṇerasīlampi paripuṇṇaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā,
tika-s0203t:693_2: Atha kasmā bhagavā arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassanaṃ kathento “chadhāturo”ti avijjamānappadhānaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti āha –
tika-s0203t:693_8: purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”tiādīsu avijjamānena vijjamānaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:693_11: “khattiyakumāro brāhmaṇakaññāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetī”tiādīsu avijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t:693_14: tassa padassa avayavattho pana appadhānattho vijjamāno,
tika-s0203t:693_15: so saddakkamena appadhānopi atthakkamena padhānoti āha –
tika-s0203t:693_22: Sandehaṃ kareyyāti asati purise ko karoti?
tika-s0203t:693_24: dhātuyo evāti kiṃ nu kho idaṃ,
tika-s0203t:693_25: kathaṃ nu kho idanti saṃsayaṃ uppādeyya?
tika-s0203t:693_26: Sammohaṃ āpajjeyyāti caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre vattamānaṃ viya desiyamāne atthe sammohaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-s0203t:693_27: Tathābhūto ca desanāya abhājanabhūtattā desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
tika-s0203t:694_0: Yaṃ tvaṃ purisoti sañjānāsīti yaṃ rūpārūpadhammasamūhaṃ pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ –
tika-s0203t:694_3: Santesupi chadhātuvinimuttesu dhātvantaresu sukhāvaggahaṇatthaṃ tathā vuttaṃ taggahaṇeneva ca tesaṃ gahetabbato,
tika-s0203t:694_6: Cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni catasso patiṭṭhā etassāti caturādhiṭṭhāno,
tika-s0203t:694_14: Ettha hi niviṭṭhassa āyattassa uttamāya siddhiyā asambhavoti.
tika-s0203t:694_16: Evañhi sabbaso paṭipakkhasamucchindanena tattha patiṭṭhito hoti.
tika-s0203t:694_17: Maññassavā nappavattantīti chahipi dvārehi pavattamānasotāya maggena visositāya sabbaso vigatāya sabbaso vicchedappattiyā na sandanti.
tika-s0203t:694_19: Yasmā māne sabbaso samucchinne asamucchinno anupasanto kileso nāma natthi,
tika-s0203t:695_1: “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinayappavattāya appamādappaṭipattiyā samādhivipassanāpaññaṃ nappamajjeyya.
tika-s0203t:695_4: sacce ṭhito samādinnasīlaṃ avikopetvā paripūrento samādhisaṃvattaniyataṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t:695_6: Kilesapariccāgaṃ brūheyyāti tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ pariccajanavidhiṃ vaḍḍheyya.
tika-s0203t:695_7: Kilesavūpasamanaṃ sikkheyyāti yathā te kilesā tadaṅgādivasena pariccattā yathāsamudācārappavattiyā santāne pariḷāhaṃ na janenti;
tika-s0203t:695_8: evaṃ kilesānaṃ vūpasamanavidhiṃ sikkheyya paññādhiṭṭhānādīnanti lokuttarānaṃ paññādhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ.
tika-s0203t:696_3: yattha ṭhitaṃ maññassavā nappavattantī”ti evaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:698_5: Nanu cāyaṃ yathāuddiṭṭhāya viññāṇadhātuyā niddesopi bhavissatīti yathānusandhinayo vijjatīti? Na,
tika-s0203t:698_7: Yaṃ vā panātiādinā pana desanāya sānusandhitaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0203t:698_8: Na hi buddhā bhagavanto ananusandhikaṃ desanaṃ desenti.
tika-s0203t:698_9: Āgamanīyavipassanāvasenāti yassā pubbe pavattattā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitā vipassanā,
tika-s0203t:698_12: na meso attā”ti evaṃ vipassanākiccakārakaṃ vipassanāsahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:698_14: Satthu kathanatthāyāti satthārā uddesameva katvā ṭhapitattā niddesavasena kathanatthāya.
tika-s0203t:698_15: Akathitabhāvo eva hissa avasiṭṭhatā kathanatthāya paṭivijjhanatthāya ca.
tika-s0203t:700_6: Yaṃ kiñci suvaṇṇatāpanayogyaṃ aṅgārabhājanaṃ idha “ukkā”ti adhippetanti āha “aṅgārakapalla”nti.
tika-s0203t:701_0: Ariyamagge patiṭṭhāpetukāmena nāma sabbasmimpi lokiyadhamme virajjanatthāya dhammo kathetabboti adhippāyena,
tika-s0203t:701_2: Vineyyadamanakusalena bhagavatā veneyyajjhāsayavasena tāva catutthajjhānupekkhāya vaṇṇo kathitoti tassa parihāraṃ vadanto,
tika-s0203t:702_5: Taggahaṇāti tassa gahaṇena tassā paṭipattiyā paṭipajjamānena.
tika-s0203t:703_2: Etaṃ pana savipākaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katattā saṅkhataṃ.
tika-s0203t:703_6: Nibbānaṃ viya na niccaṃ na sassataṃ.
tika-s0203t:703_7: Atha kho khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvatāya tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-s0203t:703_8: Tato eva cavanādisabhāvanti sabbametaṃ rūpāvacaradhammesu ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:704_1: “khandhaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā gahetuṃ adatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:704_5: bhisakkassa visaṃ ṭhānato cāvetvā upari āropanaṃ viya bhagavato desanānubhāvena kulaputtassa kāmabhave nikantiṃ pariyādāya arūpajjhāne bhavanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:704_6: Bhisakkassa visaṃ otāretvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ viya kulaputtassa orambhāgiyakilesadukkhāpanayanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:705_2: Sabbametanti “aniccaṃ adhuva”ntiādinā vitthārato vuttaṃ sabbametaṃ ādīnavaṃ.
tika-s0203t:705_3: Ekapadeneva “saṅkhatameta”nti kathesi saṅkhatapadeneva tassa atthassa anavasesato pariyādinnattā.
tika-s0203t:706_0: Nāyūhatīti bhavakāraṇacetanāvasena byāpāraṃ na samūheti na sampiṇḍeti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:706_4: Taṃ pana phaluppādanasamatthatāya phalena kappananti āha “na kappetī”ti.
tika-s0203t:706_9: Buddhavisaye ṭhatvāti bhagavā attano buddhasubuddhatāya sīhasamānavuttitāya ca desanaṃ ukkaṃsato sāvakehi
tika-s0203t:706_11: na sāvakavisayaṃ atikkamitvā attano buddhavisayameva desento. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:706_15: atha kasmā bhagavā desanāya arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhīti āha “yathā nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:707_0: Ito pubbeti ito anāgāmiphalādhigamato uttari upari.
tika-s0203t:707_2: Kathentassa bhagavato dhamme neva kaṅkhā na vimati paṭhamamaggeneva kaṅkhāya samucchinnattā.
tika-s0203t:707_4: Tathā hi ayampi kulaputto anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ sañjāni.
tika-s0203t:708_0: 363. Anajjhositāti anajjhosanīyāti ayamatthoti āha – “gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahetuṃ na yuttā”ti.
tika-s0203t:709_2: so ca paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahoti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:709_4: Na pana tassa uppādanaṃ atthi khaṇattayasamāyogāsambhavato.
tika-s0203t:709_7: Visaṃyuttoti kenaci saññojanena asaṃyuttatāya eva niyatavippayutto.
tika-s0203t:709_8: Kāyassa koṭi paramo anto etassāti kāyakoṭikaṃ.
tika-s0203t:709_12: kathaṃ pana vedayitānaṃ dvādasasu āyatanesu nirujjhanaṃ sītibhāvappattīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha –
tika-s0203t:709_15: Nanu sabbaso kilesapariḷāhavigame sītibhāvo nāma vedanānirodhamattena adhippeto;
tika-s0203t:709_17: na kilesāti vedayitānaṃ accantanirodhasaṅkhāto sītibhāvopi kilesasamucchedenevāti āha “vedayitānipī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:710_1: Idaṃ opammasaṃsandananti ettha saññojanā dīpasikhā viya,
tika-s0203t:710_2: adhiṭṭhānakapallikā viya vedanāya nissayabhūtā cattāro khandhā,
tika-s0203t:710_6: tassa sīsacchedakapuriso viya arahattamaggo santānassa samucchedakaraṇato,
tika-s0203t:710_7: anāhārāya dīpasikhāya nibbāyanaṃ viya kammakilesānaṃ anantarapaccayato anāhārāya vedanāya anupādisesavasena nibbāyanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:711_0: Ādimhi samādhivipassanāpaññāhīti pubbabhāgapaṭipadābhūtā tayā paguṇasamādhito arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtavipassanāpaññāto ca.
tika-s0203t:711_9: Arahattaphale ñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ vuttanayena sabbadukkhakkhaye sante tannimittaṃ vā uppannañāṇanti katvā. Tassāti,
tika-s0203t:711_10: “evaṃ samannāgato bhikkhu iminā paramena paññādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato hotī”ti vuttabhikkhuno.
tika-s0203t:712_10: jarāya maraṇena ca vipariṇāmetabbatāya yādisaṃ uppādāvatthāya jātaṃ,
tika-s0203t:712_12: Tathā hi taṃ jarāmaraṇehi parimusitabbarūpatāya “musā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:712_14: Taṃ avitathanti taṃ vuttanayena avitathaṃ nāma,
tika-s0203t:712_16: Samathavipassanāvasena vacīsaccatoti samathavipassanāvasena yaṃ visuddhimattaṃ vacīsaccaṃ, tato.
tika-s0203t:712_18: Iti nesaṃ yathāsakaṃ sabhāvena avitathabhāve amosadhammatāya tehipi avitathabhāvā paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānameva uttaritaraṃ.
tika-s0203t:713_5: Paripūrā gahitā parāmaṭṭhāti pariyattabhāvena taṇhāya gahitā diṭṭhiyā parāmaṭṭhā.
tika-s0203t:713_6: Samathavipassanāvasena kilesapariccāgatoti vikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgappahānavasena ca kilesānaṃ pariccajanato.
tika-s0203t:714_4: Tīhi padehi yadi arahattamaggena kilesānaṃ pariccāgo cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:714_5: arahattamaggeneva nesaṃ vūpasamo upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:714_6: Ettha visesena pariccāgo sampajahanaṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ cāgo,
tika-s0203t:714_7: tathā pana pariccāgena yo so nesaṃ tadā vūpasantatāya abhāvo,
tika-s0203t:715_3: Avijjāvibandhanataṇhāgāhādīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvato ayamahanti ettha ahanti diṭṭhimaññanādassanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:715_4: sā pana diṭṭhi mānamaññanāya attaniyagāhavasena hotīti sveva “aya”nti iminā gahitoti āha –
tika-s0203t:715_10: kilesāsucipaggharaṇato uppādanirodhabhaṅgehi uddhamuddhaṃ pakkapabhinno hotīti phalūpacārena “maññitaṃ gaṇḍo”ti vutto.
tika-s0203t:715_14: tato eva pariḷāhānaṃ parinibbutattā vūpasantattā santo upasanto nibbutoti vuccati.
tika-s0203t:715_16: Yadi bhagavā attano desanāñāṇānurūpaṃ desanaṃ pavattāpeyya,
tika-s0203t:715_19: anantāparimeyyalokadhātuyo paṭicca tesaṃ ṭhitākāraṃ anuppūraṃ vicinantassa viya desanā pariyosānaṃ na gaccheyya.
tika-s0203t:715_30: Yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi yathāuddiṭṭhe anupubbena anavasesato vibhajanavasena desanāya niṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-s0203t:716_4: “mayhaṃ iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya paccayo hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā pattacīvaraṃ, pattaṃ,
tika-s0203t:716_5: cīvarameva vā dinne carimabhave iddhimayaparikkhāro nibbattatīti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:717_0: Vibbhantāti bhantacittā. Siṅgena vijjhitvā ghātesi purimajātibaddhāghātatāyāti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:722_3: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti ādito kathanaṃ.
tika-s0203t:722_6: sā pana yasmā itthamidanti veneyyānaṃ paccakkhato dassanā,
tika-s0203t:722_11: Yasmā paṭṭhapiyamānasabhāvā desanā bhājanaṃ upagacchantī viya hoti,
tika-s0203t:722_19: catusaccasaññitassa atthassa paccekaṃ sarūpato dassanavasena idanti ādito sikkhāpanaṃ kathanaṃ ācikkhanā,
tika-s0203t:722_21: evaṃ vineyyānaṃ cittaparitosajananena tesaṃ buddhiparipācanaṃ “paññāpanā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0203t:722_22: Evaṃ paññāpentī ca sā desiyamānaṃ atthaṃ veneyyasantāne pakārato ṭhapeti patiṭṭhapetīti “paṭṭhapanā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0203t:722_23: Pakārato ṭhapentī pana saṃkhittassa vitthārato paṭivuttassa punābhidhānato “vivaraṇā”ti,
tika-s0203t:723_5: Idāni dvinnaṃ mahātherānaṃ yathākkamaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ bhagavatā vuttehi janikaposikamātuṭṭhāniyehi saṅgāhakataṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:723_8: Paṭhamamaggo eva hi sāvakānaṃ ekantato ghosāpekkhoti.
tika-s0203t:724_1: Svāyamassa tato nikkhamanattho tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato tehi visaṃsaggato virajjanato samucchindanato sabbaso vivittabhāvato ca hotīti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:724_3: Tattha kāmapadaghātanti yathā kāmo padaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
tika-s0203t:724_12: Sabbe cete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo nānācittesu labbhantīti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:724_15: Na nānā labbhatīti iminā tividhakiccakāritaṃ sammāsaṅkappassa dasseti.
tika-s0203t:724_17: Sammāvācādīnampi maggakkhaṇe ekacitte labbhamānānampi catukiccakāritāya catubbidhanāmāditā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:727_1: Mahāpajāpatigotamīti ettha gotamīti tassa gotamagottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-s0203t:727_5: Mahatiṃ uḷāraṃ pajaṃ jananaposanehi parirakkhatīti mahāpajāpati.
tika-s0203t:727_9: Tāni maṃ na tosenti kāyikassa puññassa abhāvato. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:727_13: Kālānukālañca dhātigaṇaparivutā gantvā vemakoṭiṃ aggahesi ekadivasanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:728_4: Saṅghe gotami dehīti saṅghassa dānāya niyojesi,
tika-s0203t:728_10: Tasmāti yasmā guṇavisiṭṭhahetukaṃ dakkhiṇeyyataṃ anapekkhitvā attano dīyamānassa dāpanaṃ labhati, tasmā.
tika-s0203t:728_11: Mā evaṃ gaṇhāti sammāsambuddhato saṅghova dakkhiṇeyyo”ti mā gaṇha.
tika-s0203t:730_0: Gotamiyā antimabhavikatāya dānassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya anuppādanato na taṃ garutaraṃ saṅghassa pādāpane kāraṇanti āha –
tika-s0203t:730_2: Vacanatopīti tassa vatthayugassa satthu eva paṭiggahaṇāya vacanatopi.
tika-s0203t:731_0: Satthā saṅghapariyāpannova īdise ṭhāne aggaphalaṭṭhatāya aṭṭha-
tika-s0203t:731_3: kathaṃ saṅghe pūjite satthā pūjito nāma siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:731_4: Tīṇi saraṇagamanāni tayo eva aggapasādāti vakkhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:731_10: Saṅghagaṇe hi satthā uttaritaro anaññasādhāraṇaguṇehi samannāgatabhāvato mūlaratanabhāvato ca.
tika-s0203t:733_1: Paccūpakāraṃ na sukaraṃ vadāmi anucchavikakiriyāya kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0203t:733_3: Vandamānehi antevāsikehi ācariyaṃ “sukhī hotū”tiādinā abhivādenti nāma.
tika-s0203t:733_8: Kālānukālaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ bījayanapādasambāhanādi anucchavikakammassa karaṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0203t:733_10: yasmā ācariyena katassa dhammānuggahassa antevāsinā kariyamāno āmisānuggaho saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upetiyevāti.
tika-s0203t:734_2: “taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhatū”ti mahāpajāpatigotamiyā vacanaṃ nimittaṃ katvā desanāya uṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0203t:734_18: Yasmā pana savāsanaṃ sabbaso samucchinnakilesehi tato eva sabbaso appaṭihatañāṇacārehi anantāparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhārehi
tika-s0203t:734_19: sammāsambuddhehi sadiso sadevake loke koci dakkhiṇeyyo natthi.
tika-s0203t:734_21: Yasmā pañcābhiñño aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī eva hoti lokiyābhiññānaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiadhiṭṭhānattā,
tika-s0203t:734_27: Tena na alajjidhātuko pakatisiddho idha puthujjanasīlavāti adhippetoti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:735_0: Paricchindantoti ettakoti paccekappamāṇato tato eva aññamaññaṃ asaṅkaratova paricchindanto.
tika-s0203t:735_1: Kathaṃ pana asaṅkhyeyyabhāvena vuccamāno vipāko paricchinno hoti?
tika-s0203t:735_2: Sopi tassa paricchedo eva itarehi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvadīpanato,
tika-s0203t:735_8: Anuggahapūjanicchāvasena hi attano deyyavatthupariccāgo dānaṃ bhayarāgaladdhukāmakulādivasena sāvajjābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:735_12: Phalaṃ paṭikaṅkhitvāti “idaṃ me dānamayaṃ puññaṃ āyatiṃ sukhahitabhāvāya hotū”tiādinā phalaṃ paccāsīsitvā.
tika-s0203t:735_15: Sataguṇāti ettha guṇasaddo na “guṇena nāmaṃ uddhareyya”ntiādīsu viya sampattiattho,
tika-s0203t:735_24: Sataguṇāti vā satavaḍḍhikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:735_25: Nipparitasaṃ karotīti āyuādīnaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ aparittāsaṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t:735_26: Atha vā nipparitasaṃ karotīti āyuādinimittaṃ aparittāsaṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t:735_27: Atha vā nipparitasaṃ karotīti āyuādīni tato uttarimpi āhārādihetu aparittāsaṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t:736_2: tasmā nibbedhabhāgiyasaraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāpadasamādānaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā sīlaparipūraṇaṃ adhicittasikkhānuyogo
tika-s0203t:736_3: vipassanābhāvanāti sabbāpesā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipatti eva hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:736_5: Tattha yathā nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhi tāva nāma paramparāya ariyamaggādhigamassa paccayabhāvato upanissayo;
tika-s0203t:736_6: tathā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sīlaparipūraṇaṃ upasampadā pabbajjā upāsakassa dasasu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0203t:736_7: antamaso saraṇādigamanampi nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ ariyamaggādhigamassa upanissayo hotiyevāti,
tika-s0203t:736_12: samudayapūrite bhagavati saddhamme ariyasaṅghe uḷāratarabahumānagāravataṃ gato.
tika-s0203t:736_15: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti tapparāyaṇatādiākārappatto ñāṇaparisodhito pasādo saraṇagamananti tena vatthugatena
tika-s0203t:736_16: pasādena paribhāvite santāne kataṃ puññakkhettasampattiyā mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsameva hotīti āha –
tika-s0203t:736_19: tādisassa pana pañcasīlaṃ ajjhāsayasampattiupathambhito kāyavacīsaṃyamoti tattha dinnaṃ tato uttari mahapphalanti,
tika-s0203t:736_23: Sāmaṇerasīlādīnaṃ pana uttari visiṭṭhatarādibhāvato tattha tattha dinnassa visesamahapphalatā vuttā.
tika-s0203t:737_1: tasmiñca khaṇe kathaṃ dātuṃ paṭiggahetuñca sambhavatīti codeti “kiṃ pana maggasamaṅgissa sakkā dānaṃ dātu”nti.
tika-s0203t:737_6: Yadi aṭṭhamakassa sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ phalato asaṅkhyeyyameva,
tika-s0203t:737_8: Tena satipi asaṅkhyeyyabhāvasāmaññe atthi nesaṃ appabahubhāvo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyamahākappāsaṅkhyeyyānaṃ viyāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:737_9: Maggasamaṅgīnaṃ tena tena odhinā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pahīyamānattā vodānadhammānaṃ vaḍḍhamānattā apariyositakiccattā aparipuṇṇaguṇatā,
tika-s0203t:737_10: pariyositakiccattā phalasamaṅgīnaṃ paripuṇṇaguṇatāti taṃtaṃmaggaṭṭhehi phalaṭṭhānaṃ khettātisayatā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:737_11: Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimehi pana maggaṭṭhehi uparimānaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ phalaṭṭhehi phalaṭṭhānaṃ uttaritaratā pākaṭā eva.
tika-s0203t:737_12: Tathā hi uparimānaṃ dinnadānassa mahapphalatā vuttā.
tika-s0203t:738_1: Kāmañcettha buddhappamukhe ubhatosaṅghe kevale ca bhikkhusaṅghe dānaṃ atthi eva,
tika-s0203t:739_2: Itaro parinibbute tathāgate taṃ uddissa gandhapupphādipariccāgo viya cīvarādipariccāgopi mahapphalo hotiyevāti katvā paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:739_5: bhikkhū uddisathā”ti evaṃ paricchedassa akaraṇena upacārasīmāpariyāpannānaṃ khettapariyāpannānaṃ vasena aparicchinnakamahābhikkhusaṅghe.
tika-s0203t:740_2: tasmā samaṇāti gottamattaṃ anubhavanti dhārentīti gotrabhuno.
tika-s0203t:740_10: Yathā pana saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0203t:741_1: Aññathattaṃ āpajjatīti “imassa mayā dinnaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ cittaṃ anuppādetvā,
tika-s0203t:741_2: “saṅghassa dassāmī”ti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā sāmaṇerassa nāma dātabbaṃ jātanti aññathattaṃ āpajjati;
tika-s0203t:741_3: tasmā tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hotiyeva puggalavasena cittassa pariṇāmitattā.
tika-s0203t:741_4: Nibbematiko hutvāti “kiṃ nu kho mayā imassa dinnaṃ hoti vā na vā”ti vimatiṃ anuppādetvā,
tika-s0203t:742_10: saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmī”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:742_12: Itaro ariyasaṅghe dinnadakkhiṇāya nibbisiṭṭhaṃ katvā vuttattā matthakappattasseva ariyasaṅghassa vasena dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t:742_17: Therā ciraparinibbutāti idaṃ ajjatanānampi ariyānaṃ sāvakataṃ dassentena maggasodhanavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0203t:743_1: tathāpi tattha tattha puggalaviseso ñātabboti dassento,
tika-s0203t:743_3: Na upanetabbo bhagavato kāle bhikkhūnaṃ abhiññāpaṭisambhidāguṇavasena ativiya uḷārabhāvato,
tika-s0203t:743_6: na upanetabboti ettha nayānusārena attho vattabbo.
tika-s0203t:743_7: Tena teneva samayenāti tassa tassa kālassa sampattivipattimukhena paṭipattiyā uḷārataṃ anuḷāratañca ulliṅgeti.
tika-s0203t:743_8: Yattha hi bhikkhū guṇehi sabbaso paripuṇṇā honti,
tika-s0203t:743_9: tasmiṃ samaye saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā itarasmiṃ samaye dakkhiṇato mahapphalatarāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0203t:743_10: Saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassāti suppaṭipannatādiṃ saṅghe āvajjitvā saṅghagatena pasādena saṅghassa
tika-s0203t:743_11: sammukhā viya tasmiṃ puggale ca gāravavasena dentassa puthujjanasamaṇe dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ saṅghato
tika-s0203t:744_7: kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāya pāṭipuggalikaṃ dānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0203t:744_8: Yadi khīṇāsave dinnadānato saṅghato uddisitvā gahitadussīlepi dinnadānaṃ mahapphalaṃ,
tika-s0203t:744_12: no tathā dussīle”ti idaṃ kathanti āha –
tika-s0203t:744_14: Saṅghato uddisitvā gahaṇavidhiṃ pahāya dussīlasseva gahaṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:744_15: Imasmiṃ catukke daṭṭhabbanti imassa padassa vasena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:744_16: Tattha hi “paṭiggāhakā honti dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-s0203t:745_7: Tassa mahābodhisattassa attano puttadānaṃ dānapāramiyā matthakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ mahāpathavīkampanasamatthaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0203t:746_1: Tasmā natthi mayhaṃ kiñci cittassa aññathattanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:747_2: “idaṃ dānaṃ asukassa petassa hotū”ti uddisanavasena patte pāpitakāleyeva.
tika-s0203t:749_3: Sārabījānīti sabhāvato abhisaṅkhārato ca sārabhūtāni bījāni.
tika-s0203t:749_5: Evanti yathā kassako attano payogasampattiyā asārepi khette phalaṃ adhigacchati.
tika-s0203t:749_6: Evaṃ sīlavā attano payogasampattiyā dussīlassapi datvā phalaṃ mahantaṃ adhigacchati.
tika-s0203t:750_1: Arahato dinnadānameva aggaṃ dānacetanāya kenaci upakkilesena anupakkiliṭṭhattā,
tika-s0203t:750_5: Khīṇāsavo dānaphalaṃ na saddahatīti idaṃ tassa appahīnakilesajanassa viya kammakammaphalānaṃ saddahanākārena pavatti natthīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:750_13: Yadi evaṃ tena katakammaṃ kammalakkhaṇappattaṃ hotīti āha “khīṇāsavenā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:751_0: Kiṃ pana sammāsambuddhenātiādinā dāyakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhi coditā,
tika-s0203t:751_5: tasmā ubhayenapi dāyakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhi eva coditā.
tika-s0203t:751_6: Sā hi idha sādhāraṇavasena nicchitattā saṃsayavatthu. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:751_10: Añño dānassa vipākaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi sabbaso sattānaṃ kammavipākavibhāgajānanañāṇassa ananuññātattā.
tika-s0203t:751_18: na dakkhiṇāya visuddhi nāma dāyakato paṭiggāhakato ca vasena hotīti;
tika-s0203t:751_19: sammāsambuddhena sāriputtattherassa dinnadānaṃ sabbaso upakkilesavisuddhiyā ñāṇassa ca ativiya uḷārattā mahānubhāvaṃ nāma siyā mahātejavantañca;
tika-s0203t:751_20: na mahapphalaṃ tesaṃ santāne paripuṇṇaphalassa asambhavato.
tika-s0203t:751_21: Yadi dinnadānaṃ paripuṇṇaphalaṃ na hoti ubhayavipākadānābhāvato,
tika-s0203t:752_1: catūhi sampadāhi sahagatā sahitaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0203t:752_5: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāveti yasmiṃ attabhāve taṃ dānamayaṃ puññaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-s0203t:752_7: cetanāya mahantattā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā vipaccatīti attho.
tika-s0203t:752_10: Sā hi cetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti, na itarā.
tika-s0203t:752_14: Vatthusampannatāti ettha yathā paṭighasaññā nānattasaññānaṃ vigamena dibbavihārānaṃ vasena,
tika-s0203t:752_16: sabbaso rūpasaññānānattasaññānaṃ vigamena āneñjavihārānaṃ vasena sabbaso niccasaññādīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā
tika-s0203t:752_18: Taṃtaṃsamāpattisamāpajjanena santānassa nirodhasādhanatā taṃ divasaṃ nirodhassa sādhanatā nāma.
tika-s0203t:757_1: Adhimattagilānoti adhikāya mattāya maraṇassa āsannatāya ativiya gilānoti attho.
tika-s0203t:757_5: “sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ yattakaṃ assa gahapatissa.
tika-s0203t:758_6: tāva maraṇantikā vedanā vattanteva viññāṇassa aniruddhattā.
tika-s0203t:759_3: Cakkhuṃ tīhi gāhehi na gaṇhissāmīti mānaggāhapaṭikkhepamukhena cakkhusmiṃ aniccānupassanāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t:759_8: tasmiṃ vigatepi nikanti tiṭṭheyyāti taṃ vijahāpetukāmena, –
tika-s0203t:759_9: “na ca me cakkhunissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0203t:759_13: So yutto imassa vārassa eva anavasesapañcavokārabhavapariyāpannato.
tika-s0203t:759_14: Tathā hi upari catuvokārabhavo anavasesato vutto.
tika-s0203t:760_3: tañca kho paṭhamadutiyavārehi idhaloko gahitoti katvā.
tika-s0203t:760_4: Paṭhamadutiyavārehi pana idhaloko paralokoti vibhāgena vinā pañcavokārabhavo gahito;
tika-s0203t:760_5: tathā tatiyavāre pañcavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo ca gahitoti puna diṭṭhadhammasamparāyavasena taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:760_14: Yesaṃ pana “idhaloka”nti iminā sattalokassapi gahaṇaṃ icchitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:761_1: Allīyasīti attabhāve bhogesu ca apekkhaṃ karosīti attho.
tika-s0203t:761_2: Evarūpīti yādisī tadā dhammasenāpatinā kathitā, evarūpī.
tika-s0203t:761_3: Dhammakathā na sutapubbāti yathākathitākārameva sandhāya paṭikkhepo,
tika-s0203t:762_0: Mayā gatamaggameva anugacchasīti dānamayapuññabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā vadati,
tika-s0203t:762_2: Na paṭibhātīti ruccanavasena citte na upatiṭṭhati.
tika-s0203t:763_5: Kāmaṃ tassa vihārassa gandhakuṭipāsādakūṭāgārādivasena nisīdananipajjanāya rukkhalatādivasena bhūmisayādivasena
tika-s0203t:763_7: sā pana gehassitabhāvena ariyānaṃ cittaṃ tathā na toseti;
tika-s0203t:763_15: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanaṭṭhena ca vijjā,
tika-s0203t:764_4: sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti hi vacanato sammāsamādhiādayo maggadhammāpi samādhipakkhiyā.
tika-s0203t:765_2: Sāriputtovāti ca avadhāraṇaṃ tassa sāvakabhāvato sāvakesu sāriputtova seyyoti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0203t:765_3: Kilesaupasamenāti iminā mahātherassa tādiso kilesūpasamoti dasseti,
tika-s0203t:765_4: yassa sāvakassa visaye paññāya pāramippatti ahosi.
tika-s0203t:765_8: Tesaṃ tesaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsane paññāya pāramippattasāvakavasenetaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā –
tika-s0203t:765_9: “natthi vimuttiyā nānatta”nti vacanato sāvakehi vimuttipaññāmattaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:768_1: Channoti idaṃ tassa nāmanti āha “evaṃnāmako thero”ti.
tika-s0203t:768_2: Yassa pana satthārā parinibbānakāle brahmadaṇḍo āṇatto,
tika-s0203t:768_3: ayaṃ so na hotīti dassento āha –
tika-s0203t:770_1: Khayavayaṃ ñatvāti saṅkhāragataṃ khaṇabhaṅgaṃ netvā ñāṇena yāthāvato ñatvā.
tika-s0203t:770_2: Netaṃ mamāti dukkhato samanupassanā saṅkhāresu diṭṭhesu mamaṃkārābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:770_3: Nesohamasmīti aniccato samanupassanā aniccato tesu diṭṭhesu ahaṃkārābhāvato.
tika-s0203t:770_4: Na meso attāti anattato samanupassanā anattato tesu diṭṭhesu attaggāhābhāvatoti āha –
tika-s0203t:771_1: Tasmā puthujjanoti yasmā ariyo sabbaso pariññātavatthuko dukkhavedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto nāma natthi,
tika-s0203t:771_9: Taṇhānissitabhāvena hi āyasmā channo māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto ito cito parivattanto calati vipphandati,
tika-s0203t:771_11: tena idaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ vipphanditaṃ na bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:771_18: Calitanti yathā yathā asamāraddhāya sammāpaṭipattiyā ādīnavavasena calantaṃ pana yasmā ariyassa vinaye virūpaṃ calitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0203t:771_21: Tādise pana papañcavikkhambhanavasena cittassa calite asati bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannatāya kilesapaṭippassaddhi
tika-s0203t:772_2: Paṭisandhivasena āgati nāmāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavantarato idheva āgamanaṃ nāma,
tika-s0203t:772_3: cutivasena cavanavasena ito bhavantarassa gamanaṃ nāma na hoti āgatigatiyā asati katūpacitassapi kammassa uppattiparikappavasena pavattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0203t:772_6: Yato gati āgati cavanaṃ upapāto na hoti,
tika-s0203t:772_9: kāyassa gatiyā āgatiyā ca abhāvato sabbaso cutūpapāto natthi;
tika-s0203t:772_15: “na ubhayamantarenā”ti vuttoti ubhayapariyāpanno na hotīti paṭikkhipanto,
tika-s0203t:772_17: Ayameva antoti yo idhaloke paraloke ca abhāvo avijjamānatā anuppajjanaṃ,
tika-s0203t:773_2: Tasmiṃ chindituṃ āraddhakkhaṇe chedo ca vattati;
tika-s0203t:773_5: “Sopi nāma sabrahmacārīnaṃ anupavajjataṃ byākaritvā sarāgamaraṇaṃ marissatī”ti saṃviggamānaso saṅkhāre aniccādivasena pariggaṇhanto.
tika-s0203t:773_6: Arahattaṃ patvāti pubbe bahuso vipassanāya udayabbayañāṇaṃ pāvitattā tāvadeva arahattaṃ patvā arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ
tika-s0203t:773_8: Na hi antimabhavikassa arahattaṃ appatvā jīvitantarāyo hoti.
tika-s0203t:773_11: Tannimittañhi thero vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpeti. Imināti, “atthi,
tika-s0203t:773_16: “Pubbe kulesu saṃsaṭṭhavihārī”ti sabrahmacārīnaṃ paññātassapi imasmiṃ “honti hete sāriputtā”tiādinā bhagavato vutta-
tika-s0203t:773_18: Pakkampi nipakkaṃ viya sammāpaṭipajjamānāpi keci asaññatā upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0203t:776_3: idha pana akatakiccassa paṭisallānaṃ nāma kāyavivekoti āha –
tika-s0203t:776_5: “Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā”ti panettha viññeyyarūpaṃ vijānantassa dvārabhūtaṃ cakkhunti ubhayaṃ ajjhattikaṃ
tika-s0203t:776_6: bāhirañca āyatanaṃ abhinanditādisāmaññena tañceti ettha taṃ-
tika-s0203t:776_9: Yaṃ panettha viññeyyasaddena jotitaṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ sampayuttadhammāti tadubhayaṃ,
tika-s0203t:776_10: “manoviññeyyā dhammā”ti padena kathitamevāti idha na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:776_13: cittena nandiyā taṇhāya saha pavattiyā cittasahuppattiyāti attho. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:776_15: Pañcakkhandhadukkhassa samodhānanti pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa dukkhasaccassa paccavokāre sahappavatti hoti.
tika-s0203t:776_16: Yasmā dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃyeva vasena uppajjati,
tika-s0203t:776_20: Kilesavaṭṭassa kammavaṭṭassa vipākavaṭṭassa ca kathitattā āha –
tika-s0203t:776_22: Dutiyanayeti “santi ca kho”tiādinā vutte dutiye desanānaye.
tika-s0203t:776_23: Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti na yathānusandhi nāpi ajjhāsayānusandhīti adhippāyo,
tika-s0203t:776_24: pucchānusandhissa pana idha sambhavo eva natthīti.
tika-s0203t:776_25: Sattasu ṭhānesūti akkosane paribhāsane pāṇippahāre leḍḍuppahāre daṇḍappahāre satthappahāre jīvitāvoropaneti imesu sattasu.
tika-s0203t:777_9: “hatthacchedaṃ nāsikaccheda”nti evamādiṃ idañca aniṭṭhaṃ karissāmāti bhayadassanena tajjessanti.
tika-s0203t:778_0: Ghaṭikamuggarenāti daṇḍānaṃ kira aggapasse ghaṭākāraṃ dassenti,
tika-s0203t:778_3: “Indriyasaṃvarādīnaṃ etaṃ nāma”nti vatvā yattha yattha indriyasaṃvarādayo “damo”ti vuttā,
tika-s0203t:778_5: Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni dameti saṃvaretīti indriyasaṃvaro, damo.
tika-s0203t:778_7: Pāṇātipātādikammakilese dameti upasameti vikkhambhetīti damo uposatho.
tika-s0203t:778_11: tasmā damo ca so byāpādādīnaṃ vinayanaṭṭhena tesaṃyeva upasamanaṭṭhena upasamo cāti damūpasamo,
tika-s0203t:779_1: Tattha khantiyaṃ katādhikāro taṃ janapadaṃ gantvā mahājanassa avassayo hoti,
tika-s0203t:779_2: tasmā tadassa apadānaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:780_2: Janapadacārikaṃ caranto bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā janapadesu vikkayaṃ karonto.
tika-s0203t:781_2: “buddho”ti vacanaṃ assutapubbaṃ sotapathaṃ upagataṃ anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi
tika-s0203t:781_5: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhātīti bhāvanāvīthiṃ na otarati.
tika-s0203t:781_6: Mayhaṃ asappāyoti mayhaṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sappāyo upakāro na hoti.
tika-s0203t:782_0: Koci caṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi mahatā samuddavīcisaddena upaddutattā bhāvanāmanasikārassa anabhisambhuṇanato.
tika-s0203t:783_0: Uttamajavena gacchamānā yathādhippetaṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā aññataraṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0203t:784_0: Uppādikaṃ uṭṭhāpetvāti mahāvātamaṇḍalasamuṭṭhāpanena tasmiṃ padese mahāsamuddaṃ saṃkhobhento mahantaṃ uppādaṃ uṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0203t:785_1: “amhe āvajjeyyāthā”ti kaniṭṭhassa vacanaṃ saritvā antarantarā āvajjeti,
tika-s0203t:786_2: tena so thero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ etadagge ṭhapito.
tika-s0203t:792_1: Saṅghassa bhāraṃ akāsi upāyena nandakattherassa ovādena vinetabbānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t:792_8: Pariyāyena ovadantīti ovadituṃ samatthā bhikkhuniyo vārena ovadanti.
tika-s0203t:792_10: Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti pasīdati pubbacariyasiddhena gāravabahumānena gehassitapemavasena.
tika-s0203t:794_1: Kiṃ nu khoti pucchi ciratarakālaṃ puññakiriyāya paribhāvitasantānatāya,
tika-s0203t:794_3: Duggatehipi sakkā kātunti duggatehipi yathāvibhavaṃ katā kuṭi tumhākaṃ vasituṃ sakkāti pucchi.
tika-s0203t:795_0: Hatthakammaṃ dethāti hatthakammaṃ katvā dethāti attho.
tika-s0203t:795_1: Ānisaṃsaṃ ācikkhitvāti “tādisānaṃ mahesīnaṃ kataṃ veyyāvaccaṃ amhākampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya hoti.
tika-s0203t:795_2: Āvāsadānañca nāma mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne mahāsampattiāvahaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā ānisaṃsaṃ ācikkhitvā.
tika-s0203t:795_4: “imesu nāma karontesu tvaṃ kasmā na karosi,
tika-s0203t:795_6: Sabbehipi kariyamānassa hatthakammassa akaraṇe tuyhaṃ idañcidañca dukkhaṃ āgamissatī”ti bhayena tajjetvā.
tika-s0203t:795_7: Sataṃ sataṃ hutvāti sataṃ sataṃ dāsaputtā ekajjhaṃ hutvā ekañca ekañca kuṭiṃ katvā adāsi.
tika-s0203t:796_0: Nandakattheropīti tadā jeṭṭhakadāso etarahi nandakatthero pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto.
tika-s0203t:796_3: Ayamāyasmā nandakoti ayameva samudāgamato āyasmā nandakatthero.
tika-s0203t:796_4: Etāva tā bhikkhuniyoti etāvatā samudāgamato pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo.
tika-s0203t:797_2: Pubbabhāgā hi purimā purimā paṭipadā pacchimāya kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t:798_0: 401. Taṃ sabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvanti tassā vedanāya paccayabhāvena anurūpaṃ.
tika-s0203t:799_1: Paṭhamataraṃyeva aniccāti tassāpi chāyāya aniccabhāvo paṭhamataraṃyeva siddho.
tika-s0203t:799_2: Na hi kadāci aniccaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ kiñci niccaṃ nāma atthīti.
tika-s0203t:800_2: Kathaṃ pana maṃsakāyaṃ cammakāyañca avināsetvā itaresaṃ kantanaṃ hotīti byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:800_4: Cammaṃ alliyāpentoti camme laggāpento cammapaṭibaddhaṃ karonto.
tika-s0203t:800_5: Cammaṃ baddhaṃ katvāti vivarakāle na phālento cammabaddhe katvā.
tika-s0203t:800_6: Evaṃ akatvāti evaṃ maṃsacammakāyānaṃ vināsanaṃ akatvā,
tika-s0203t:800_13: Antarakilesamevāti antare citte jātattā sattasantānantogadhatāya abbhantarabhūtakilesameva.
tika-s0203t:801_2: Tathā hi purisena kuṭhārinā chejjaṃ chindite chejjaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0203t:801_7: evaṃ paññāya kilese chindantassa yogino vīriyabalena saddhiṃ sati- pīti-
tika-s0203t:802_1: Tena kāraṇenāti yena tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ sā dhammadesanā sappāyā,
tika-s0203t:802_2: āsevanamandatāya pana ajjhāsayena paripuṇṇasaṅkappā na jātāyeva;
tika-s0203t:802_3: puna tathā desanāya sati āsevanabalavatāya paripuṇṇasaṅkappā bhavissanti;
tika-s0203t:802_4: tena kāraṇena tvampi tā bhikkhuniyo teneva ovādena ovadeyyāsīti.
tika-s0203t:803_2: anariyā tattha kāci natthīti attho. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:803_5: Yadi evanti akhīṇāsavāpi tādisā bhikkhunī atthi.
tika-s0203t:803_6: Evaṃ sati sukkhavipassakabhāvenapi sati khīṇāsavabhāve ariyassa vinaye aparipuṇṇasaṅkappāvāti adhippāyena codeti,
tika-s0203t:803_13: Etena pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānānaṃ visadisatāya puggalassa vipassanākāle pavattaajjhāsayavasena ariyamagge
tika-s0203t:806_1: Vimuttiṃ paripācentīti kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhivimuttibhūtaṃ arahattaṃ sabbaso pācenti sādhenti nibbāpentīti vimuttiparipācanīyā.
tika-s0203t:806_5: Saddhindriyādayo visujjhamānā maggapaṭipāṭiyāva sabbaso assaddhiyādīhi cittaṃ vimocentā aggaphalavimuttiṃ sampādenti.
tika-s0203t:806_6: Tesaṃ pana visuddhi bālaparivajjanena paṇḍitapayirupāsanena pasādāvahadhammapaccavekkhaṇāya ca hoti.
tika-s0203t:806_7: Tato idha pannarasa dhammā adhippetāti dassento,
tika-s0203t:807_1: Te hi nissāya na kadāci saddhā sambhavati,
tika-s0203t:807_2: tesaṃ pana diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena aññadatthu asaddhiyameva vaḍḍhati,
tika-s0203t:807_3: tasmā te paṭibhayamaggo viya dūrato vajjetabbā.
tika-s0203t:807_4: Assaddhiyanti ca saddhāya paṭipakkhabhūtā asaddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimuccanākārena pavattā saṃkilesadhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:807_6: Te hi nissāya saddheyyavatthusmiṃ anuppannā uppajjati,
tika-s0203t:807_8: Saddheyyavatthūti ca buddhādīni ratanāni kammakammaphalāni ca.
tika-s0203t:807_9: Sevatoti labbhamānaṃ saddhāsampadaṃ uppādetuṃ vaḍḍhetuñca nisevato.
tika-s0203t:807_15: Te hi paccavekkhato buddhādīsu anuppannā pasannā upajjati,
tika-s0203t:807_17: Imehi tīhākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0203t:807_18: Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato paccekaṃ sūpahārato ca āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ labhanti.
tika-s0203t:807_19: Saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati maggaphalāvahabhāvena acchati visuddhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0203t:808_3: Sammappadhāneti anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanādivasena pavatte cattāro upāyappadhāne.
tika-s0203t:808_5: Te hi paccavekkhato līnaṃ abhibhavitvā sammadeva ārambhadhātuādi anuppannānaṃ vidhinā satisampadāya uppādāya bhiyyobhāvāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0203t:808_7: Samāhite upacārasamādhinā appanāsamādhinā ca sammadeva samāhitacitte.
tika-s0203t:808_9: Tesañhi paccavekkhaṇā uparūpari accantameva samādhānāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0203t:808_12: Paññavanteti vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya ca samannāgate.
tika-s0203t:809_1: “vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā”ti vuttānīti idha saddhādike aññe ca dhamme dassento,
tika-s0203t:809_4: aniccasaññādīnaṃ pana vimuttiparipācanīyatāya vattabbameva natthi vipassanābhāvato. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:809_6: Kalyāṇamittatādayoti kalyāṇamittatā sīlasaṃvaro abhisallekhakathā vīriyārambho nibbedhikā paññā ime kalyāṇamittatādayo pañca dhammā.
tika-s0203t:809_9: Lokaṃ volokentassāti buddhaveneyyasattalokaṃ buddhacakkhunā visesato olokentassa.
tika-s0203t:810_1: Āyasmato rāhulassa indriyānaṃ paripakkattā saddhiṃ paṭṭhapitapatthanā devatā udikkhamānā tiṭṭhanti, –
tika-s0203t:810_2: “kadā nu kho uttari āsavānaṃ khaye vinessatī”ti.
tika-s0203t:810_4: tāvadeva samānajjhāsayatāya sabbakālaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ āgamentiyo tā devatāyo taṃ samavāyaṃ disvā ekasmiṃ andhavanasmiṃyeva sannipatitā.
tika-s0203t:810_5: Upālissa gahapatino dīghanakhaparibbājakassa catusaccadhammesu dassanakiccena pavatto sotāpattimaggoti
tika-s0203t:810_8: brahmāyuno pana phalañāṇāni heṭṭhimāni tīṇi sātisayānīti brahmāyusutte tīṇi phalāni “dhammacakkhu”nti vuttāni.
tika-s0203t:810_9: Idaṃ panettha āyasmato rāhulassa maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇañca dassanattho sātisayo,
tika-s0203t:810_10: tāhi ca devatāhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ,
tika-s0203t:810_14: Kiṃ pana sāvakānaṃ saccābhisamayañāṇe atthi koci visesoti?
tika-s0203t:810_16: So ca kho pubbabhāge vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya pavattiyākāravisesena labheyya kāci visesamattā.
tika-s0203t:810_17: Svāyamattho abhidhamme “no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassā”ti saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa kilesappahānaṃ pati visesakittanena dīpetabbo.
tika-s0203t:810_18: Kiṃ pana āyasmā rāhulo viya tā devatā sabbā ekacittā pageva cattāri phalāni adhigaṇhiṃsūti?
tika-s0203t:810_20: Kittakā pana tā devatāti āha “tāsañca panā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:813_1: Ādimhi kalyāṇanti ādikoṭṭhāse kalyāṇaṃ etassāti vā ādikalyāṇo,
tika-s0203t:813_11: dutiye pana atthavikappe desetabbadhammassa kalyāṇatā mukhyeneva kathitā itarassa atthāpattito.
tika-s0203t:813_13: Ayañca desanāya thomanā buddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇāvāti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:813_15: Dhammaggahaṇampi desanāya thomanā evāti “navahi padehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:814_9: Vipākavedanāpaccayā javanakkhaṇe uppannataṇhāti chattiṃsavipākavedanaṃ nissāya evaṃ assādentī anubhaveyyanti akusalajavanakkhaṇato uppannataṇhā.
tika-s0203t:815_1: Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti yathānusandhiādīnaṃ asambhavatoti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:815_7: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattāti khandhapañcake ca channaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena atthato anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
tika-s0203t:815_8: Na sarūpatoti sarūpatopi taṃ vibhāvetukāmo teneva chachakkānaṃ vasena ghanavinibbhoganayena byatirekato ca anvayato ca dassento bhagavā –
tika-s0203t:815_9: “cakkhu attāti yo vadeyyā”tiādimāhāti yathānusandhikāva desanā vibhāvitā.
tika-s0203t:815_11: Heṭṭhā pana channaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena vinibbhogadassanamattaṃ,
tika-s0203t:815_13: idha pana sarūpato anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāvitanti adhippāyena anusandhantarabhāvajotanā.
tika-s0203t:815_14: Yadipi anattabhāvo nāma catūsupi saccesu labbhateva,
tika-s0203t:815_16: ime panettha dvepi nayā sammasanavasena pavattāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t:815_18: Na upapajjatīti upapattisaṅkhātayuttiyā na sametīti ayamettha atthoti āha “na yujjatī”ti.
tika-s0203t:815_25: Sakkāyavatthu cakkhu anattā aniccabhāvato seyyathāpi ghaṭo,
tika-s0203t:816_4: tasmā “tiṇṇaṃ vā gāhānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ dassetu”nti āha.
tika-s0203t:817_0: Tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ paṭipakkhavasenāti taṇhādiggāhapaṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ dukkhāniccānattānupassanānaṃ vasena,
tika-s0203t:817_1: tāhi vā tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena viniveṭhanavasena anuppādanavasenāti attho.
tika-s0203t:817_3: Sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti ettha nirodhadhammo sarūpeneva dassitoti āha –
tika-s0203t:818_1: Taṇhādīnaṃ anupādiyanavacanāni taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva vuttāni taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃyeva abhinandanādivasena pavattisabbhāvato.
tika-s0203t:818_3: “anusetīti appahīno hotī”ti ariyamaggena hi appahīno thāmagato rāgādikileso anusayo kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanārahabhāvato.
tika-s0203t:819_4: Avijjaṃ pajahitvāti anavasesato avijjaṃ appavattidhammataṃ āpādetvā.
tika-s0203t:819_6: taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ avijjāya anavasesappahāyakaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0203t:819_7: aggamaggañāṇe pana uppanne avijjāya lesopi nāvasissatīti tadeva avijjāya pahāyakanti āha –
tika-s0203t:820_1: Sayameva tathāgate attano buddhānubhāvena desente saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattāti anacchariyametaṃ,
tika-s0203t:820_5: Pattā evāti saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā evāti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:820_7: satthu sammukhā sāvakā samudāgamā mahābhiññā pabhinnapaṭisambhidā tathā tathā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desentīti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:821_0: Mahāmaṇḍapeti lohapāsādassa purato eva mahābhikkhusannipāto jātoti tesaṃ pahonakavasena kate mahati sāṇimaṇḍapeti vadanti.
tika-s0203t:821_4: tathāpi vatthasampattiyā pasīditvā “tvaṃ pana nhāpehī”ti āha.
tika-s0203t:822_0: Heṭṭhāpāsādeti ca kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre uposathāgāre heṭṭhāpāsāde ekadā uparipāsāde ekadā,
tika-s0203t:822_2: Cūḷanāgassa tathā mahatī parisā devatānubhāvena abhiññāpādanaṃ ahosīti keci.
tika-s0203t:822_4: tasmā tāva mahatiṃ parisaṃ abhiññāpesīti apare.
