tika-s0203t:826_2: mahantatā ca tesaṃ mahantaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ abhibyāpetvā ṭhitattā ayoniso gayhamānānaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattanato,
tika-s0203t:826_3: yoniso gayhamānānaṃ mahato atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanato ca daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0203t:827_1: Sikhāppattāya vipassanāya jānanampi yathābhūtajānanameva maggena jānanassa āsannakāraṇabhāvatoti āha –
tika-s0203t:827_3: Vuḍḍhiṃ gacchantīti paccayasamodhānena bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsapāḷiyā aparāparaṃ parivuddhiṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0203t:827_4: Evaṃbhūtā paguṇabhāvamāpāditā samathavipassanādhammā viya suṭṭhutaraṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitā jhānābhiññā viya ca vasībhūtā hutvā uparūpari brūhentīti āha –
tika-s0203t:827_6: Tathā hi te kadāci bhavapatthanāya anuppāditāyapi appahīnabhāvenevassā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0203t:827_7: Akusalā dhammāva yebhuyyena dassanāyatanena vināsadassanato pavattanti parivaḍḍhanti ca.
tika-s0203t:827_10: Santāpāti darathehi balavanto sampayuttadhammānaṃ nissayassa ca santāpanakarā.
tika-s0203t:828_4: na yaṃ kiñci cetasikasukhaṃ tassa kāyikasukhaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-s0203t:828_5: Pañcadvārikajavanena samāpajjanaṃ vā vuṭṭhānaṃ vā natthīti idaṃ manodvārikajavanena tassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:828_8: Viññattimattampi janetuṃ asamatthaṃ samāpajjanassa kathaṃ paccayo hoti,
tika-s0203t:828_10: Tathāpi tassa āsannaṭṭhāne pañcadvārikacittappavattiyā asambhavo eva tādisassa pubbābhogassa tasmiṃ kāle asambhavato.
tika-s0203t:828_11: Eteneva yā kesañci ariyadhamme akovidānaṃ ghaṭasabhāvādīsu buddhitulyakāritāpatticodanā;
tika-s0203t:828_12: sā paṭikkhittāti daṭṭhabbā taṃtaṃpurimābhogavasena tena tena pañcadvārikābhiniyatamanoviññāṇassa parato
tika-s0203t:828_13: pavattamānamanoviññāṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesassa vinicchinitabbato.
tika-s0203t:828_14: Uppannamattakameva hotīti pañcadvārikajavanaṃ tādisaṃ kiñci atthanicchayakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0203t:829_6: Sabbatthakakārāpakaṅgānīti sīlavisodhanassa cittasamādhānassa vipassanābhiyogassa maggena pahātabbakilesapahānassāti
tika-s0203t:830_1: “yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhī”tiādinā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃyeva tasmiṃ ṭhāne gahitattā lokuttaramaggo pañcaṅgikoti vadati.
tika-s0203t:830_7: “Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ ariyamaggassa pañcaṅgikabhāvaṃ ujukameva paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0203t:830_8: Yadi evaṃ “yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhī”tiādinā tattha pañcannaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ gahaṇaṃ kimatthiyanti āha “uttari cā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:830_13: Saheva viratiyā pūrenti samucchedaviratiyā vinā dukkhapariññādīnaṃ asambhavato.
tika-s0203t:830_14: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddhāneva vaṭṭanti parisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitasseva bhāvanāya ijjhanato.
tika-s0203t:831_0: Sammāsati maggakkhaṇe kāyānupassanādicatukiccasādhikā hotīti taṃ catubbidhaṃ katvā dassento,
tika-s0203t:831_4: Aññamaññānativattamānā yuganaddhā yuttā viya ariyamaggayuganaddhā aññamaññaṃ paṭibaddhāti yuganaddhā. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:831_5: “ekakkhaṇikayuganandhā”ti ariyamaggakkhaṇe eva hi samathavipassanā ekakkhaṇikā hutvā samadhuraṃ vattanti.
tika-s0203t:831_8: aññasmiṃ vipassanāti idaṃ tesaṃ tattha tattha kiccato adhikabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:831_12: Ariyamagge pana ekakkhaṇikā samadhuratāya ekarasabhāvenāti attho.
tika-s0203t:834_3: Taṃ pana samavisamaṃ aññamaññaṃ viruddhattā visadisattā na ekasmiṃ kāle sambhavatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:834_5: Samacariyampi hi etanti pubbe samacariyāya jotitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:835_5: Tañhi yathādiṭṭhamatthaṃ diṭṭhabhāvena anveti anugacchatīti “anvayā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0203t:835_7: Ādisaddena cettha kīcakaveṇusaddamadhurasaphalāphalavasena saddarasānaṃ atthibhāvo veditabboti.
tika-s0203t:835_8: Campakavaseneva pana phassagandhānampi atthibhāvo vuttoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:835_10: “Itthirūpādīni sandhāyetaṃ kathita”nti vatvā indriyabaddhā vā hontu rūpādayo anindriyabaddhā vā,
tika-s0203t:835_11: sabbepi cete kilesuppattinimittatāya kāmaguṇā evāti codanaṃ sandhāya visabhāgitthigatā rūpādayo savisesaṃ kilesuppattinimittanti dassento,
tika-s0203t:836_5: Purisassa cittanti purisassa catubhūmakaṃ kusalacittaṃ pariyādāya gahetvā antomuṭṭhigataṃ viya katvā.
tika-s0203t:836_7: “aniccasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”tiādīsu khepanaṃ pariyādānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:836_23: sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaso olokento aññaṃ ekarūpampi na samanupassāmī”ti.
tika-s0203t:836_24: Yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti yaṃ rūpaṃ rūpagarukassa purisassa sabbampi kusalacittaṃ
tika-s0203t:836_25: pavattituṃ appadānavasena pariyādiyitvā gahetvā khepetvā ca tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0203t:836_28: idha pana itthiyā catusamuṭṭhāne rūpāyatane vaṇṇadhātuyaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:836_31: purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti idaṃ purimasseva daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:839_4: etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmī”ti vuttattā “paṭisallānāti phalasamāpattito”ti āha.
tika-s0203t:840_2: Nanu tāni indriyāni sabhāvato vippasannāni hontīti?
tika-s0203t:840_4: Na hidaṃ tādisaṃ pasannataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t:840_5: idaṃ pana santapaṇītasamāpattisamuṭṭhitānaṃ paccupaṭṭhitānaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ vasena sesatisantatirūpānaṃ seṭṭhataraṃ paṇītabhāvāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:840_7: Mahantānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ purisānaṃ vihāro mahāpurisavihāro. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t:840_10: Vihārato paṭṭhāyāti parikkhitte ca vihāre parikkhepato paṭṭhāya,
tika-s0203t:840_15: Yāva nagaradvārena nikkhamanāti nagaradvārena yāva nikkhamanapadesā.
tika-s0203t:840_18: Ārammaṇe paṭihaññanākārena pavattamānampi paṭighasampayuttaṃ citte paṭihanantaṃ viya pavattatīti āha –
tika-s0203t:840_20: Divasañca rattiñca anusikkhantenāti etaṃyeva rāgādippahāyiniṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ divā ca rattiñca anu anu sikkhantena uparūpari vaḍḍhentena.
tika-s0203t:841_1: Pahīnā nu kho me pañca kāmaguṇāti ettha kāmaguṇappahānaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānaṃ.
tika-s0203t:841_6: “pahīnā nu kho me pañca kāmaguṇā”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā nānāpaccavekkhaṇā honti.
tika-s0203t:841_9: Idāni tameva saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t:841_12: kathaṃ pana paccavekkhatīti āha “pahīnā nu kho”tiādi.
tika-s0203t:841_13: Vīriyaṃ paggayhāti catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyaṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhitvā.
tika-s0203t:841_15: Phalānantaraṃ magganti tasmiṃ anāgāmimagge ṭhito phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya aggamaggatthāya vipassanaṃ
tika-s0203t:841_16: ārabhitvā tasmiṃyeva āsane na cireneva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattamaggaṃ gaṇhanto nirodhadhammānuppattiyā
tika-s0203t:841_17: vipassanāparivāsābhāvato phalānantaraṃ maggappatto nāma hotīti katvā.
tika-s0203t:842_1: Maggānantarato hi vuṭṭhito maggato vuṭṭhito viya hotīti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:842_2: “Phalānantaraṃ magga”nti ettha phalaṃ anantaraṃ etassāti phalānantaraṃ.
tika-s0203t:842_3: “Phalānantaraṃ magga”nti padadvayenapi anāgāmimaggaphalāni ceva vadatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0203t:842_5: “pahīnā nu kho me pañca nīvaraṇā”tiādinā yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t:842_8: Nānāpaccavekkhaṇā hotīti tā paccavekkhaṇā nānāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:842_9: Etāsu pana paccavekkhaṇāsūti etāsu kāmaguṇapaccavekkhaṇādīsu dvādasasu paccavekkhaṇāsu.
tika-s0203t:842_10: Ekaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati dvādasasu nayesu ekeneva kiccasiddhito.
tika-s0203t:842_15: nānābhikkhūnaṃ nānāpaccavekkhaṇāti evaṃ catukkapaccavekkhaṇampi ettha sambhavati.
tika-s0203t:842_16: Imassa pana dvayassa vasena abhisamayo natthīti tadubhayaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0203t:845_1: Evaṃnāmaketi “gajaṅgalā”ti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmake majjhimapadesassa mariyādaṭṭhānabhūte nigame.
tika-s0203t:845_3: Tato aññaṃ evāti pana adhippāyena “ekā rukkhajātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t:845_5: tañca kho sabbaso adassanena asavanenāti āha –
tika-s0203t:845_8: Sati hi dassane savane ca tāni adantāni abhāvitānevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t:845_9: Cakkhusotāni ca asampattaggāhitāya durakkhitānīti brāhmaṇo tesaṃyeva visayaggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0203t:846_1: Vipassanupekkhāti āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattabhūtā vipassanāsaṅkhātā upekkhā.
tika-s0203t:846_2: Sā pana yasmā bhāvanāvisesappattiyā heṭṭhimehi vipassanāvārehi santā ceva paṇītā ca,
tika-s0203t:848_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. ;
tika-s0203t:849_1: Ayaṃ bhikkhūti ayaṃ āraddhavipassako bhikkhūti yojanā.
tika-s0203t:849_4: Majjhatte manāpāmanāpanti iṭṭhamajjhatte manāpabhāvena amanāpabhāvena ca pavattanakaṃ manāpāmanāpaṃ nāmāti.
tika-s0203t:849_7: “neva manāpa”nti iminā manāpabhāvo majjhatto ca ubhayaṃ ekadesato labbhatīti,
tika-s0203t:849_9: Evaṃ ārammaṇe labbhamānavisesavasena tadārammaṇassa cittassa pākatikaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni tappaṭisedhena
tika-s0203t:849_13: tassa cittaṃ iṭṭhe ārammaṇe rajjituṃ vā aniṭṭhe ārammaṇe dussituṃ vā majjhatte ārammaṇe muyhituṃ vā.
tika-s0203t:849_15: Pariggahetvāti parijānanavasena ñāṇena gahetvā ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi parijānitvā.
tika-s0203t:849_16: Vipassanaṃ majjhatte ṭhapetīti anukkamena vipassanupekkhaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ saṅkhārupekkhaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
tika-s0203t:850_1: Īsakaṃ poṇeti majjhe uccaṃ hutvā īsakaṃ poṇe,
tika-s0203t:851_5: Tattha paṭikūle aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ sattasaññite mettāpharaṇena vā dhātuso upasaṃhārena vā saṅkhārasaññite pana dhātuso upasaṃhārena vāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t:851_6: Appaṭikūlasaññī viharatīti hitesitāya dhammasabhāvacintanāya ca nappaṭikūlasaññī hutvā iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
tika-s0203t:851_7: Appaṭikūle iṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ sattasaññite kesādiasucikoṭṭhāsamattamevāti asubhapharaṇena vāti asubhato manasikāravasena.
tika-s0203t:851_8: Idaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhatanti aniccato upasaṃhārena vā. Tato eva,
tika-s0203t:851_11: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle cā”tiādinā āgatesu sesesu dvīsu padesu.
tika-s0203t:851_12: Tattha hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhavatthūni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ yathā sattānaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭikūlato upaṭṭhitameva
tika-s0203t:851_13: pacchā gahaṇākāravasena avatthantarena vā appaṭikūlato upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0203t:851_14: Yañca appaṭikūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā paṭikūlato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0203t:852_0: Tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvāti sabhāvato bhāvanānubhāvato ca upaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭikūlasabhāvaṃ appaṭikūlasabhāvaṃ vāti taṃ ubhayaṃ pahāya aggahetvā.
tika-s0203t:852_11: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena,
tika-s0203t:852_13: Neva sumano hoti gehassitasomanassapaṭikkhepena nekkhammapakkhikāya kiriyāsomanassavedanāya.
tika-s0203t:853_5: ariyo hoti bhāvitindriyo”tiādinā ca āgatesu tividhesu nayesu.
tika-s0203t:853_6: Manāpaṃ amanāpaṃ manāpāmanāpanti ettha manāpaggahaṇena somanassayuttakusalākusalānaṃ,
tika-s0203t:853_10: Paṭhamanaye hi puthujjanassa adhippetattā saṃkilesakilesavippayuttampi yujjati.
tika-s0203t:853_17: Sekkhavāre pana “cakkhumā puriso”tiādikā upamā ekameva atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ āha.
tika-s0203t:853_18: Tasmā cakkhudvārassa uppanne rāgādike vikkhambhetvā vipassanupekkhāya patiṭṭhānaṃ ariyā indriyabhāvanāti.
tika-s0203t:853_25: tatiyanaye asekkhassa vasena kiriyābyākataṃ vuttanti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
